La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Srta. Carmen Soledad; ella tiene 27 aos de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, ella tiene un estudio contable donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de su trabajo la socia quiere seguir saliendo adelante, la socia quiere seguir estudiando y mejorar en su profesin de contadora. La socia solicita el prstamo para pagar la maestra de su carrera que est realizando en la universidad.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Carmen Soledad belongs to Hatun Rumiyoc Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
She is 27 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with her job as an accountant. She has an accounting office where she works from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. By means of her job, Carmen Soledad wants to continue getting ahead. She wants to continue studying and improve in her profession as an accountant.
She is requesting the loan to pay for the master's degree in her field that she is pursuing in the university.
She is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loan.use: pay for the master's degree in her field that she is pursuing in the university.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to purchase tomato and green pepper seeds.

loan.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
La seora Maria tiene 42 aos de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos.
Ella es una mujer muy luchadora, desde hace seis aos se dedica a la elaboracin de pupusas, ella manifiesta que trabajo para otra persona y fue ah donde aprendi a elaborar las pupusas. Pero Maria es visionaria y quiere tener su propio negocio, para lo cual manifiesta que necesita construir un chalet, donde las vender y elaborara.
La seora Maria antes de aprender a elaborar pupusas, trabajaba como jornal en una finca de caf, cortando el caf, limpindolo y podando fincas, etc. Hoy en da ella tiene el objetivo de tener su chalet, por lo que esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar cemento, arena, bloque y pago de mano de obra, para construir el chalet y la otra parte la utilizara para comprar insumos para elaborar las pupusas y surtir el chalet y tener ms producto que ofrecer a los cliente, ya que ella ha visto una gran oportunidad de obtener buenos ingresos, ya que en donde ella vive no hay un chalet donde vendan pupusas.
Por tal razn ella podr brindarles a sus hijos una mejor condicin de vida y de desarrollo, creando una cultura de ahorro, ya que de los ingresos que obtenga mejorara su casa construyendo una habitacin ms y que sus hijos continen con sus estudios.
La seora Maria manifiesta seguir trabajando con Fundacin Campo, su sueo es tener un negocio ms fuerte y con mayores ingresos, al mismo tiempo continuar trabajando en las cortas de caf ya que la temporada se acerca, de esta manera obtendr otra fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 years old. She is a single mother with three children.
She is a fighter and has been in the business of making pupusas (tortilla rellenas). She says she began in this field by working for someone else, and it was there she learned to make pupusas. But Maria is a visionary and she wants to have her own business for which she declares that she needs to build a little caf where she could prepare and sell them.
Before Maria learned to make pupusas, she worked as a day laborer at a coffee plantation, harvesting coffee, cleaning, and pruning and doing other miscellaneous chores. Today she has the objective of getting her caf and this is the reason she is asking for a loan through Fundacin Campo, in order to buy cement, sand, blocks and to pay to have the work done to build the caf and also in order to buy supplies to make her pupusas and to stock the caf and to have more products to offer her customers. She has already seen a great opportunity to earn a good income because nobody else is selling pupusas in her neighborhood.
In this way she could give her children a higher standard of living and she would create a culture of saving, since the income that she earns would improve their house from constructing an extra room where her children could continue with their studies.
Maria says she plans to continue working with Fundacin Campo. Her dream is to have a strong business with higher income and at the same time continue working harvesting coffee, as the season is approaching, and in this way have another source of income.

loan.use: to buy cement, sand, blocks and to pay the worker to build a little caf, and the supplies she needs to make tortilla rellenas

loan.name: Maribel Cirila

texts.es:
La socia Maribel tiene 40 aos de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene 2 hijo, ella naci en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades econmicas, ella tiene su negocio de venta de anticuchos y vende en su local anticuchos de carne, corazn res y entre otros mas y todo estn cocidos en base de carbn a la parrilla, ella trabaja conjuntamente con su familia con pap y hermana y formaron una sociedad.
La socia Maribel solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms insumos para su negocio de anticucheria como por ejemplo aceite, carnes, carbn entre otras cosas ms.
La socia Maribel pertenece al banco comunal UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Maribel est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maribel, 40, is married and has two children from this relationship. She was born in the city of Cusco, where she works. She has a business selling "anticuchos," grilled meat on a skewer. In her place she sells meat and beef heart anticuchos, among other types, and all are cooked on a charcoal grill. She works together with her family, with her father and her sister, and they formed a partnership.
Maribel is requesting the loan to buy more ingredients for her anticucho business, such as oil, meats, and charcoal, among other things.
Maribel belongs to Unin, Fuerza y Amistad Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
She is happy about the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loan.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for her business selling "anticuchos" (grilled meat on a skewer).

loan.name: Jose David

texts.es: Jos, Continua en su taller de carpinteria, en esta ocacion solicita un prestamo para comprar madera de credo, pino y aceituno, este es su principal material para realizar su trabajo, confeccionando muebles para los clientes. Jose ha logrado mantenerse en sus actividades por la ayuda del prestamo anterior, ya que los materiales que compro le sirvieron para ejecutar trabajos,l espera que con la compra mejore la capacidad de respuesta a los clientes en los muebles que deseen y continuar trabajando de la misma manera en los prestamos.
texts.en: Jose continues to have his carpentry shop. At this time he requests a loan to purchase cedar, pine, and olive wood. These are the primary materials that he uses in his work, building furniture for his clients. Jose has managed to keep up his activities thanks to the previous loan. The materials which he purchased helped him to carry out project. He hopes that with this purchase he will be able to improve his ability to respond to his clients, in giving them the furniture which they require. He hopes to continue his work with the help of these loans.

loan.use: to purchase cedar, pine, and olive lumber.

loan.name: Juana

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Juana; La socia tiene 53 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 9 hijos los cuales solo 2 estn con ella porque aun son estudiantes de 15, 13 aos de edad, La socia se dedica a la venta de lea, la socia tiene acopiado en casa leos los cuales estn terminando de secar; la socia comprara palos para copiar en su almacn en casa y poder vender en trozos como lea. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de palos para la lea. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: The member belongs to the IMASUMAC II communal bank, located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. This is Mrs. Juana. She is 53, married, and has 9 children. Only two of her children live with her because they are still in school; they are 15 and 13 years old. Juana sells firewood. She has accumulated firewood in her home, and it is drying out. She will buy wood to stock her store, which is in her home, and to then sell in bundles for firewood. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of wood to be used as firewood. She is grateful for this loan and promises to repay her quotas as planned.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of wood for firewood.

loan.name: Marcos Del Carmen

texts.es: Marcos, se decidi por un nuevo prstamo, ya que su negocio tiene bastante movimiento en el negocio y salen al mercado, nuevos estilos en cosmticos y artculos de uso femenino, los cuales le gusta mantener en su puesto de venta. Este prstamo lo invertir en compra de mercadera como prendedores, diademas, labiales, maquillajes, sobras para ojo, cepillo para el cabello, y cremas, esto le ayudara como siempre a mantener surtido el negocio y poder servirle a los clientes de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
Marcos decided to request a new loan. Her business has quite a bit of movement. New types of cosmetics and feminine articles come out in the market and she likes to keep them on her stand for sale.
This loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise such as hair clips, hair bands, lipsticks, make-up, eye-shadows, hair brushes, and skin lotions. This will help her to always keep a good variety in her business and to serve her clients in a better way.

loan.use: to purchase merchandise such as hair clips, hair bands, lipsticks, make-up, and eye-shadows.

loan.name: Souadou

texts.fr: Souadou abite au sud du sngal,elle est age de 35 ans.Elle s'est marie l'age de 25 ans sans enfant,jusque nos jours.Elle achete des legumes dakar. Pendant 15 ans,elle fait le commerce pour soutenir sa maman et assurer ses visites medicale car elle pense toujours a avoir des enfants dans sa vie Souadou avec son commerce,elle a achet un terrain Brin dont elle veut construir dans l'avenir.
texts.en:
Souadou lives in the south of Senegal and is 35 years old. She got married when she was 25 years old and has no children to date. She buys vegetables in Dakar. For the past fifteen years she has been trading in order to support her mother and pay for her own medical appointments, since she is still thinking of having children during her life.
Thanks to her business Souadou has bought a piece of land in Brin and wants to build on it in the future.

loan.use: to buy vegetables: cabbages, potatoes, gombos, aubergines,etc.

loan.name: Yana

texts.en: Yana is from Novaya Kahovka, Kherson region. For seven years, she has been running a small business of selling embroidery goods and equipment, such as canvases, threads, frames, etc. She sells at the local shopping house, called "Tsentralniy" (Central). Currently, Yana's revolving capital amounts to 20,000 hryvnia. Her monthly profit is 5,000 hryvnia. Yana plans to use the loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia to obtain a new assortment of embroidery merchandise and accompanying goods. Yana likes to deal with this specific group of goods because she is a needlewoman herself and can sew and embroider well. Thanks to her own experience, she is always able to give a valuable advise to a customer, which helps her win more and more new clients.

loan.use: to obtain a new assortment of embroidery merchandise and accompanying goods

loan.name: Yeny

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Yeny; La socia tiene 29 aos de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo de 6 meses de edad; la socia es enfermera tcnica y desea invertir el crdito en un negocio propio de venta de CDS, discos; la socia tambin desea utilizar la otra mitad en gastos personales en casa para el bebe; La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de discos compactos como Cds para vender en su negocio propio y la otra parte del dinero invertir en gastos personales para su bebe. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yeny is a member of the community bank "IMASUMAC II," which is located in the Huanchac district in the Cusco province and department.
Yeny is 29 years old, has a live-in partner, and a six-month old child; she is a vocational nurse. Yeny wants to invest the loan in her own business selling CDs. She also wants to use the other half for personal and household expenses for the baby.
The member is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of discs, like CDs, to sell in her own business, and the other part of the money she will use for personal expenses for her baby.
Yeny appreciates the loan and promises to make her payments in agreement with her payment schedule.

loan.use: to buy CDs to sell in her own business, and also to use for personal expenses for her baby.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables.

loan.name: Jhon Ferley

texts.es:
Desde hace 5 aos Jhon Ferley se dedica a la cerrajera, labor que aprendi en un instituto de capacitacin del municipio de Medelln en el departamento de Antioquia, hoy en da hace escaletas industriales, puentes, ventanas, rejas, y mas productos que sus clientes requieran. Jhon genera 1 empleo; su mayor sueo es llegara tener un gran negocio donde genere mas empleos y que sea reconocido en el sector, pues as sabe que sus ingresos se incrementarn y podr ayudarme a mucha mas gente.
Una de sus necesidades prioritarias en el momento es la compra de herramientas de trabajo, pero no cuenta con el capital para hacer dichas compras, por lo cual hoy solicita un crdito que le permita agilizar sus procesos de produccin, y entrega del trabajo final, as los clientes estarn mas satisfechos con el servicio las ventas mejorarn y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida ser mas prometedora.
texts.en:
For five years Jhon Ferley has been in the locksmith business. He learned his trade at the municipal training institute in Medelln in the department of Antioquia. Now he makes items such as industrial steps, bridges, windows, grilles and other products required by his customers. Jhon generates one place of employment. His greatest goal is to one day have a business that will generate more employment and be recognized in the sector. He knows that that will increase his income and allow him to help many people.
On of his top priorities is to buy work tools, but he does not have the capital to do so. Therefore, he is requesting a loan that will allow him to speed up his production process and delivery of the work orders so the customers will be satisfied with his service. Sales will increase and his quality of life will be more pomising in proportion.

loan.use: To buy work tools for his locksmith shop.

loan.name: Joaquina

texts.es: Joaquina es socia del Banco Comunal Rikchary, tiene 52 aos, no tiene hijos y es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 10 aos, Joaquina vende pollos y huevo, tiene una tienda donde tambien vende licores y abarrotes en general, reparte a las bodegas pollo y huevo. Joaquina ha pasado por muchos negocios como restaurante. El primer prstamo ue recibi lo utiliz para poder comprar una congeladora para su negocio, poco a poco pudo progresar, y hacer su negocio, ahora con las capacitaciones y el ahorro que le ensearon esta progresando y se siente muy orgullosa de ello. Con el prstamo que recibir lo invertir en la compra de pollo y bebidas. Su gran meta es poder comprarse su casa, lo que desea es poder tener una buena estabilidad econmica para poder adoptar a un nio que es lo que mas desea.
texts.en:
Joaquina is a member of the communal bank Rikchary. She is 52 years hold, has no children, and has been a member of FINC Peru for ten years.
Joaquina sells chickens and eggs, which she delivers to other merchants, and has a store where she sells liquor and groceries. She has also had other business such as a restaurant. The first loan she received was used to buy a freezer for her business. Little by little she has been able to get ahead and establish her business. Now with the training and saving skills she was taught she feels proud. She will use the loan to buy chickens and beverages.
Her greatest goal is to buy a house and have good economic stability so she can adopt a child.

loan.use: To buy chickens and beverages.

loan.name: Irina

texts.en: Irina is from the town of Khoost in the western Ukraine. She sells fabrics and furniture at the local department store and has no significant competition. Her merchandise is in demand, and she has her own client base. Irina has been in this business for 10 years. Her current net profit amounts to 7,000 hryvnia. Irina needs additional funds in the sum of 5,000 hryvnia in order to travel and buy merchandise and refill her revolving capital. She is well known among customers because she always brings in quality merchandise and would never offer a second-rate fabric. She values her reputation as an honest entrepreneur. After obtaining the additional profit, Irina hopes to develop her business further, improve living conditions and actively expand merchandise selection.

loan.use: to travel and buy merchandise and refill her revolving capital

loan.name: Salvador

texts.es: El seor Salvador, tiene 22 aos, esta acomapaado y tiene un hijo de 2 aos de edad. Hace 2 aos tomo la decisin de empezar y establecer su propio negocio de panadera (elaboracin de pan francs). l antes de poner este negocio, fue ayudante de panificador por 8 aos y fue as como aprendi el negocio y decidi independizarse ya que vio la oportunidad de satisfacer una demanda insatisfecha en su colonia. El prstamo, ser utilizado para reparar la galera en donde tiene el horno artesanal y su taller, resulta que el piso es de tierra y la lmina est daada lo que provoca infiltracin de agua en el invierno y tambin la generacin de partculas de polvo en verano y charco o lodazal en invierno; es as como se hace necesario comprar laminas para techo y materiales como arena, cemento para fraguar el piso de tierra, tambin se comprarn bandejas para incrementar la produccin de pan. El seor salvador se traslada tres veces por semana a la cabecera departamental a comprar la materia prima para el trabajo, estos das madruga ya que tiene que caminar 1 kilmetro para llegar hasta la calle principal que es donde pasa el autobs tardndose 2 horas en el viaje (ida y regreso). Cuando se baja del bus en el desvi, ya est su esposa esperndolo para trasladar el producto a su casa ya que no hay calle y lo hacen caminando por veredas y cargando el producto en sus espaldas. La elaboracin del pan la realiza por la tarde y tiene el apoyo de su esposa y un ayudante adicional. Para vender el pan lo hace de manera personal sin ningn medio de transporte, utilizando un canasto caminando a pie por toda la colonia y logrando as la venta del pan. Por ser un pan caliente y artesanal es preferido por sus vecinos y por esa razn tiene un mercado potencial. Don salvador nunca ha obtenido crditos, toda la inversin la realizo cuando trabajo de forma dependiente, pero hoy necesita el crdito para poder fortalecer su unidad productiva y de esa forma ser mas competitivo y lograr crecer con la venta de pan en lugares vecinos sobretodo mejorando la salubridad del taller. El anhelo es que en un futuro pueda adquirir su propia casa ya que en este momento vive en casa de su suegro y siente incomodidad por lo que suea con darle mejores condiciones a su esposa, su hijo actual y otros que Dios le regale.
texts.en:
Mr. Salvador is 22, has a common-law wife and a 2-year-old son. Two years ago he decided to set up his own bakery to make French bread. Before starting the business he worked for eight years as a baker assistant and learned the trade. He decided to become independent when he saw the opportunity to satisfy a demand not being met in his residential area.
The loan will be used to repair the galley where he has an artisan oven and workshop. The floor is of dirt and the roof is damaged which causes water infiltration in the winter. In summer it generates dust particles and in winter mud puddles, making it necessary to buy roofing sheet and materials such as sand and cement to put in a concrete floor. He also wants to buy baking trays to increase bread production.
Salvador travels three times a week to the department capital to buy raw material for his work. On such days has to get up very early and walk a kilometer to get to the main street where the bus stops. The round trip takes two hours. When he returns his wife is waiting for him at the bus stop so they can carry the goods home on their backs through pathways since there is no street.
He bakes bread in the afternoon with the help of his wife. He sells it door-to-door throughout the area from a basket he carries. Since the bread is warm and specially made his neighbors prefer his product and there is a potential market.
Salvador has never received any loans. He carried out his investment as a result of the work he used to have. But now he needs a loan to strengthen his production capacity and become more competitive. By improving his workshop's hygiene he can increase bread sales to nearby locations. In the future he wants to buy his own house since now he lives with his father-in-law. He is uncomfortable because he wants to provide the best living conditions for his wife, their son and any more children they may be blessed with.

loan.use: To buy roof sheet, sand, and cement to repair the bakery galley and to buy bread trays.

loan.name: Sonia

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Sonia; La socia tiene 28 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 13 meses de edad; la socia es comerciante minorista, la socia tiene su stand en uno de los centros comerciales de la ciudad, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa, la socia viaja a las diferentes ciudades a comprar de las fabricas ropa de bebes y los trae a vender en su stand. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa para bebe. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "IMASUMAC II", which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and deparment of Cusco.
The member is Ms. Sonia who is 28, married and has a 13-month-old son. She is a retail merchant and has a stand in the city shopping center where she sells clothing. She travels to different cities to buy baby clothes that she sells at her stand. She is requesting a loan to buy infant clothing.
She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To buy baby clothes.

loan.name: Ludmila

texts.en: Ludmila is married and has adult children. She lives and runs her business in the town of Kahovka in the Kherson region. Ludmila has been selling women's clothing at the local Kahovka market for 18 years. Currently, the quantity of her merchandise is valued at 60,000 hryvnia. Ludmila needs a loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia in order to buy warm clothing using this sum. Specifically, she plans to buy sweaters, cardigans, jackets at wholesale prices and sell these goods at retail prices in her store. Business development and stable income will provide our client with the opportunity to support her family.

loan.use: to buy warm clothing, specifically, to buy sweaters, cardigans, jackets at wholesale prices and sell these goods at retail prices in her store

loan.name: Mateo

texts.es:
El socio Mateo pertenece al banco comunal UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta das en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento de Cusco.
El socio Mateo naci en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 67 aos de edad y est casado y fruto de esta unin tiene 7 hijos pero uno de ellos falleci hace un tiempo atrs, l alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de anticucheria, l tiene su local donde vende anticuchos de corazn y carne estos hechos a la parrilla a base de carbn. Su local est abierto de lunes a sbado por las tardes, Mateo es quien administra en sociedad con sus dos hijas el negocio.
El socio solicita el prstamo para la compra de ms insumos para su negocio de anticucheria como carne, aceite, carbn, sal entre otros ms.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Sr. Mateo belongs to the Communal Bank Union Fuerza Y Amistad (Union, Strength, and Friendship), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.
He was born in the city of Cusco, is 67 years old, married, and has seven children but one of them died some time ago. Mateo divides his time between his daily activities and managing an anticucheria (a restaurant that serves grilled meats) where he serves skewered hearts and beef that are cooked over charcoal. His establishment is open Monday through Saturday in the afternoons. Mateo manages his business with his two daughters
He is requesting a loan to buy more supplies for his restaurant business such as meat, oil, charcoal, salt, and other items.
Mateo is happy with the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loan.use: To purchase meat, oil, charcoal, salt, and other items.

loan.name: Janet

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Srta. Janet; ella tiene 32 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de contadora, la socia tiene un estudio contable donde trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere implementar su consultorio contable. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar una computadora para su consultorio contable.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the HATUN RUMIYOC communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, in the province and department of Cuzco.
Her name is Janet. She is 32 years old, married and has one son. She alternates her other daily activities with being an accountant. She has an accounting business where she works from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. With this job she gets her son ahead. She wants to outfit her accounting office and is asking for the loan to buy a computer for it.
Janet is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments on time.

loan.use: to buy a computer her accounting business.

loan.name: Erenia Maritza

texts.es: Erenia de 50 aos, vive en una zona suburbana llamada Suburbio. El negocio de ella lo inicio hace 13 aos, es un bazar ubicado en la parte delantera de su vivienda., Ella inicio esta actividad con un pequeo negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas, e la cual con un pequeo capital incremento su negocio, ahora es un bazar. El horario de ella es de lunes a viernes, inicia de las 8:00 hasta las 22:00. La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia ya que su sector se ha tomado peligroso. Ella solicita el prstamo para la compra de mercadera como: lpiz, cuaderno, borrador, plumas, etc. El sueo de ella es que con la bendicin de Dios y la ayuda de banco D-Miro empiece a incrementar su negocio en donde generar ms ingreso de dinero
texts.en:
Erenia is 50 years old and lives in a suburb called "Suburbio". She started her own business 13 years ago. She runs a bazaar located in the front part of her house. She started this business with a small business selling soft drinks and which with a small capital investment she grew into what is now a bazaar. She works Monday through Friday from 08:00 until 22:00. The problem she faces is crime as her area has become dangerous.
She is asking for a loan to purchase merchandise such as: pencils, notebooks, erasers, pens, etc. Her dream is that with 'la bendicion de Dios' ('God's blessing') and the help of the communal bank D-Miro she can start growing her business in the areas that are the most profitable.

loan.use: to buy merchandise such as pencils, notebooks, erasers, pens, etc.

loan.name: Ines Lucila

texts.es: Ins de 47 aos, una mujer muy trabajadora y honrada, vive en una zona suburbana llamada Suburbio. Su negocio es una pequea tienda ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda. Ya que desde muy pequea le gustaba el comercio. Su horario de trabajo es de lunes a domingo, inicia de las 6:00am hasta las 23:00pm. Su dificultad es que le falta mercadera, no tiene muchos suministros necesarias para la venta. Ella solicita el prstamo para el incremento de su negocio, para la compra de mercadera como: arroz, aceites, atn, etc. y el mejoramiento de su pequeo local que est ubicado en su vivienda. Su sueo es que su tienda crezca y as pueda tener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ins is 47 years old. She is a very hardworking and honest woman who lives in a suburb called "Suburbio". She has a small business located in the front part of her house, as since young she has liked business. She works from Monday to Sunday from 6:00am until 23:00pm. Her difficulty is that she doesn't have enough merchadise or supplies necessary to sell.
She is asking for a loan to grow her business, to buy merchandise such as: rice, oil, tuna, etc., and improve the small locale located in her house. Her dream is that her business grow so that she can have a better income.

loan.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, oil, tuna, etc.

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Los Claveles, tiene 30 aos y 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 7 aos. Mercedes fabrica ladrillos y los vende en Compaa, tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella empez ayudando a sus padres, siempre tuvieron este negocio, ahora Mercedes tiene su propio capital, trabajan con mquinas pesadas que con mucho esfuerzo ha podido comprarse. En los momentos mas difciles FINCA Peru le brind el apoyo que necesitaba, solo trabaja con Finca y ya no es necesario ir a otro Banco, ahora el prstamo lo invertir para poder contratar a dos peones mas para que puedan trabajar mas rpido porque ya vienen la poca de lluvia y ah es mas lento el trabajo. Su meta es poder construir su casa en Ayacucho.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the communal bank Los Claveles. She is 30 years old and has 2 children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last 7 years.
Mercedes makes bricks and sells them in Compaa. She has a grocery store. She started out by helping her parents as they always had this business. Now Mercedes has her own capital, working with heavy machinery that was purchased with a lot of hard work. In her most difficult moments, FINCA Peru gave the support she needed. She only works with FINCA and no longer needs to go to another bank. She will invest the current loan in hiring 2 more manual labourers so that they can work more quickly as the rainy season is coming and business is slower then. Her goal is to be able to build a house in Ayacucho.

loan.use: to hire 2 manual labourers.

loan.name: Bibiana

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Bibiana; La socia tiene 60 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo uno de ellos esta con la socia y estudia en la universidad l tiene 19 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras y de frutas, la socia tiene un stand en la esquina de sus barrio y ella compra muy temprano por la maana o semanalmente frutas y verduras frescas, las cuales las vende en su stand y toda la maana, la socia requiere el crdito para invertir en la compra de frutas y verduras del terminal frescas. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank IMASUMAC II. The communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Sra. Bibiana. She is 60 years old, married and has 7 children, only one of which lives with her and studies at the university. He is 19 years old. The member buys and sells fruit and vegetables. She has a stall at the corner of her neighbourhood. She buys her fresh fruit and vegbetables early in the mornings or weekly and then sells them at her stall all morning. The member needs the loan to purchase fruit and vegetables from the fresh produce terminal.
The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to make her repayments according to the schedule of payments.

loan.use: to buy fruit and vegetables from the fresh produce terminal.

loan.name: Alexander

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Alexander; el tiene 29 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de servicio de taxi, el es propietario de un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo el socio quiere salir adelante, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi que brinda al pblico en general. El socio solicita el prstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank HATUN RUMIYOC. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Sr. Alexander. He is 29 years old and single. The member divides his time between daily activities and his taxi service business. He owns a car which he uses as a taxi. The member works from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. The member wants to get ahead by means of this work. The member wants to improve his taxi service which he offers to the public in general. The member is asking for a loan to pay for the maintenance of his car and buy spare parts.
The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments.

loan.use: to pay for the maintenance on his car and buy spare parts.

loan.name: Las Rosas Del Puente Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las rosas del puente, decidieron ponerle este nombre porque una de las integrantes tiene un vivero de rosas. La historia es acerca de la seora Sofa, ella tiene 43 aos de edad, esta casada con el seor Juan Miranda, tienen 6 hijos, de los cuales solo Remedios y Juan estudian, ellos estn cursando segundo ao de prepa y tercer grado de primaria. Sofia se dedica a la venta de cosmticos y perfumes por catalogo.
Sofa decidi iniciar con este negocio, por que, quera buscar la manera de sacar a sus hijos adelante y para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y su educacin, al igual que para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, invirti el prstamo recibido en la compra de mas mercanca como son: catlogos, labiales, sombras, rubores, rimeles, mascaras, delineadores y cremas, desodorantes, perfumes, etc. para poder tener mas variedad de productos.
Ella esta muy contenta por que dice que le va muy bien con su negocio, ya que sus ventas han incrementado bastante al igual que sus clientes, y por lo mismo sus ingresos tambin han aumentado satisfactoriamente, tanto que hasta est ahorrando para asegurar la educacin de sus hijos.
La meta que tiene doa Sofa es la de continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios para que puedan terminar una carrera profesional y as tengan un mejor futuro, tambin quiere hacer crecer mas su pequeo negocio, ya que quiere ampliar un poco mas su negocio, esta pensando en vender tambin ropa, para tener ms variedad de artculos y mas surtido su negocio, para as mejorar e incrementar sus ganancias.
Esta muy agradecida con fundacin realidad y los prestatatarios de kiva por el apoyo incondicional que le estn brindando, ya que gracias a esta ayuda ha mejorado su calidad de vida y la de su familia, al igual que continuar invirtiendo en su negocio.
Estos son los nombres de las personas y las actividades alas que se dedican cada una de las integrantes del grupo las rosas del puente. Julieta, Rosa, Judith, Romula, Sofa, Rolanda, Josefa, Carmela, Irene y Marisela quienes se dedican a diferentes actividades como son: abarrotes, venta de cosmticos, tamales, refrescos, ropa y pollos.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Las Rosas del Puente, meaning "The Roses of the Bridge". They decided upon this name because one of the members has a rose greenhouse. The story is about Sofia. She is 43 years old and she is married to Juan Miranda. They have 6 children together, and only Remedios and Juan are in still in school. They are in grade 10 and in grade 3. Sofia sells cosmetics and perfumes by catalogue.
Sofia decided to start out his business because she wanted to find a way to move her children forward and to help her husband with the household expenses and the educational expenses. She also wanted to improve the quality of life for her children. She invested the loan she received in the purchase of more merchandise, such as: catalogues, lipsticks, eye shadows, compacts, nail polish, mascara, eye liners, skin lotions, deodorants, and perfumes in order to add more product variety.
She is very happy because she says that her business has done very well. Her sales have increased significantly and so have her clients. Consequently her income has also increased, so much so that she has been able to save money to ensure her children's education.
Sofia's goal is to keep supporting her children in their studies, enabling them to complete a professional career and to have a better future. She also wants to expand her small business even more. She wants to expand her business and she is thinking of selling clothing, too. She will have a wider variety of articles and her business will have a better selection. it will improve and increase her profits.
She is very thankful to Fundacion Realidad (Kiva Field Partner) and the Kiva lenders for their unconditional support that they have provided. It is thanks to this support that she has been able to improve the quality of her life and that of her family. She will also continue to invest in her business.
These are the names of the individuals and the business activities in which the members of the group, Las Rosas del Puente, are involved in.
Julieta, Rosa, Judith, Romula, Sofia, Rolanda, Josefa, Carmela, Irene, and Marisela. They are involved in a variety of activities, including: grocery store, cosmetics sales, tamales sales, soft drink sales, clothing sales, and poultry sales.

loan.use: to purchase merchandise such as catalogues, lipsticks, eye shadows, compacts, nail polish, mascara, eye liners, skin lotions, deodorants, and perfumes.

loan.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es:
Miriam de 50 aos, una mujer trabajadora que a pesar de ser mujer viuda ha sabido cmo salir adelante. Ella a los 20 aos quedo viuda, un amigo de ella le dio la oportunidad de que aprenda a manejar.
Ahora ella ejerce la profesin de taxista, el horario de ella es de lunes a domingo. Desde las 10:00am y termina la jornada a las 22:00pm. La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia. Es soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 20, 24, 30 y 34 aos, actualmente todos son independientes.
Ella solicita el prstamo para darle mantenimiento a sus vehculos. Su sueo es cada da siga creciendo en su actividad, ya que actualmente tiene una empresa de Renta-car (Taxi amigo).
texts.en:
Miriam is 50 years old and she is a hardworking woman. Despite being widowed she has known how to move forward. She was widowed at the age of 20. A friend of hers gave her the opportunity to learn how to drive.
Today she is a taxi driver. The schedule that she keeps is from Monday to Sunday. She starts working at 10:00 am and she finishes her day at 10:00 pm. The difficulty she faces is theft. She is single and she has 4 children, aged 20, 24, 30, and 34 years old. They are all independent.
She requests a loan to provide maintenance repairs to her cars. Her dream is to keep her business growing more each day. She currently has a taxi company, named Taxi Amigo.

loan.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to her cars.

loan.name: Flor De Mara

texts.es: Flor es socia el Banco Comunal Los Claveles, tiene 24 aos y 2 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 2 aos. Flor vende papa en el Mercado, desde muy pequea siempre trabajo vendiendo papa, le ayudaba a sus padres, ahora ella tiene su propio capital y se pudo comprar un carro, le encantara tener otro carro mas moderno, ella se esta esforzando por ahorrar mas y poder cumplir sus metas. Con este prstamo comprar mas papa.
texts.en:
Flor is a member of the communal bank named Los Claveles. She is 24 years old and she has 2 children. She has been a member of Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 2 years.
Flor sells potatoes in the market. Ever since she was a young girl she has been selling potatoes. She used to help her parents and today she has her own capital fund. She was able to purchase a car. She would love to have another, newer car. She is making and effort tot save more and to accomplish her goals. She will purchase more potatoes with this loan.

loan.use: to purchase potatoes.

loan.name: Justo

texts.es:
El socio Justo pertenece al banco comunal UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta dias en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento del Cusco.
El socio Justo naci en la provincia de Anta del departamento del cusco, l tiene 53 aos de edad y tiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene 2 hijos, l alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de granos como por ejemplo trigo, habas, entre otros mas, l viaja a las ferias por el Valle Sagrado para vender sus productos a sus clientes, l tambin tiene un carrito con el que brinda servicio de taxi de las ciudades de Cusco hacia Anta y viceversa, l sale a trabajar de vez en cuando sea es un trabajo extra que el realiza con su carro.
El socio Justo solicita el prstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro.
El socio Justo est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Justo is a member of the communal bank "Union, Fuerza y Amistad", meaning "Unity, Strength and Friendship". The communal bank meetings are held every thirty days in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
Justo was born in the province of Anta in the department of Cusco. He is 53 years old and he lives with his common-law wife with whom he has 2 children. He alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling grains such as wheat, lima beans, and others. He travels to the fairs in the Valle Sagrado to sell his products to his clients. He also has a car with which he provides taxi services between the cities of Cusco to Anta and vice versa. He sets out to work every once in a while, that is, this is an extra job that he does with his car.
Justo requests a loan to carry out maintenance repairs to his car.
Justo is happy for his loan and he is committed to making his payments.

loan.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to his car.

loan.name: Donatilda

texts.es: Donatilda es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 47 aos y 4 hijos, es socia desde hace 8 aos. Donatilda tienen un Restaurante, todo ese tiempo ella pudo aprender mucho acerca de cmo administrar su negocio, y tambin pudo crecer, recuerda que antes venda anticuchos y salchipapas y as poco a poco pudo progresar, todo lo que aprenda lo hacia en el negocio, con el ahorro pudo lograr que su negocio pueda crecer, ahora el prstamo lo invertir en la compra de sillas, su sueo es poder comprar su casa.
texts.en:
Donatilda is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 47 years old and she has 4 children. She has been a member for the past 8 years.
Donatilda has a restaurant, and all this time she has been able to learn a great deal about administering a business and she managed to expand it. She remembers the time when she used to sell shish-kebabs and salchipapas (a common Peruvian meal consisting of sausages and potatoes) and this is how she gradually progressed. Everything that she learned she practiced in her business. With her saving she managed to expand her business. She will invest her loan in the purchase of chairs. Her dream is to buy a house.

loan.use: to purchase chairs.

loan.name: Hilaria Ursula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Hilaria Ursula; ella tiene 51 aos de edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesana, ella vende bisutera como aretes, collares y pulseras, ella tiene un tienda donde trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesana. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera de artesana como aretes, collares y pulseras al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Hatun Rumiyoc". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
Her name is Hilaria Ursula. She is 51 years old, a widow, and she has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her handicrafts business. She sells jewelry such as earrings, necklaces and bracelets. She has a store which she opens for business from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. It is through this business that she has been able to provide for her children. She wants to expand and improve her handicrafts business. She requests a loan to purchase artisan merchandise, such as earrings, necklaces, and bracelets in wholesale.
She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loan.use: to purchase merchandise such as earrings, necklaces, and bracelets in wholesale.

loan.name: Ruth Magaly

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Ruth; La socia tiene 28 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 3 aos de edad; La socia es ejecutiva de Esika es una revista de venta de productos de belleza por catalogo, la socia ahora desea invertir el crdito en la compra de cerveza como un deposito y vender al por mayor. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de cerveza para vender al por mayor. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Imasumac II". It is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
Her name is Ruth. She is 28 years old, married, and she has a 3-year old son. She is an executive of Esika, a magazine catalogue of beauty products. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of beer to start out a depot and sell in wholesale. She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of beer to sell in wholesale.
She is thankful for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments according to the agreed schedule.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of beer in order to sell in wholesale.

loan.name: Zenovia

texts.es: Zenovia es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 32 aos y 2 hijos. Zenovia vende abarrotes, recuerda que empez con 300 soles y con ese primer prstamo compr las cosas que le faltaban para su tienda, y con todo lo que pudo esforzarse pudo construir su casa, ahora con este prstamo comprar atn, azcar y jabn que es lo que le falta. Da gracias a Finca por toda la ayuda que le brindaron, le ensearon a ser responsable, le daba las ganas para poder seguir trabajando, el ahorro siempre le ayudo a poder cumplir sus metas, pudo educar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Zenovia is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 32 years old and she has 2 children. Zenovia sells groceries. She recalls that she started out with 300 soles and with this first loan she purchased the items that her store required. And with it all she managed to have a house built for her. With this loan she will purchase tuna, sugar, and soap, which is the merchandise that she lacks. She is thankful to Finca (Kiva Field Partner) for all of the help they have given her. They taught her to be responsible and she gained the strength to keep working. The savings have always helped her attain her goals and she has been able to keep her children in school.

loan.use: to purchase tuna, sugar, and soap.

loan.name: Nouha

texts.fr: Nouha est de la rgion sud du sngal age de 40 ans,il pratique ce metier pendant 15 ans. IL achte ses outils de travail dans la meme rgion.Pendant la priode de la chaleure,il est charger dans son atelier pour les bobinage de ventilateur chambre,de rfrigrateur,de groupoe lectrogne. Nouha mari depuis juin 2010,avec son metier,il assure la restauration de sa famille et la location de sa chambre.
texts.en:
Nouha, age 40, is from Southern Senegal. He's been repairing electronic devices for 15 years. He gets his work tools from the same region.
In his workshop, during the hot season, he's in charge of windings for fans, refrigerators, and diesel generators.
Nouha has been married since June 2010 and, with his job, he pays his family food expenses and rent.

loan.use: to buy work tools and counters from Senelec

loan.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: Alejandrina es socia del Banco Comunal Anabella, tiene 64 aos y 8 hijos, es casada, es socia D. FINCA Peru desD. hace 15 aos. Aljandrina tiene un Estudio Fotogrfico, que es uno D. los estudios mas antiguos D. Ayacucho y es muy recurrido por todo Ayacucho, siempre estuvo en Finca y siempre tuvo su negocio, recuerda que con el primer prstamo pudo comprar una filmadora, y as poco a poco pudo seguir adelante gracias a todas las capacitaciones que ha recibido en temas como el sobreendeudamiento. Alejandrina esta muy agradecida por el ahorro, por ello pudo cumplir sus metas, como hacer su casa, ahora su meta es poder comprarse una computadora e impresora para las impresin D. las fotos, ahora el prstamo comprara mas papel fotogrfico.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the communal bank "Anabella". She is 64 years old and she has 8 children. She is married and she has been a member of Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 15 years.
Alejandrina has a photography studio. It is one of the longest established studios in Ayacucho and it is highly visited by all of Ayacucho. She has always been with Finca and she has always had her business. She recalls that with her first loan she managed to buy a camera and this is how she gradually started to move forward. It is thanks to all of orientation that she has received on topics such as indebtedness.
Alejandrina is very thankful for the savings and it is through them that she has attained her goals, including having a house built for her. Her new goal is to buy a computer and a printer to print photos. The loan will be used to buy photographic paper.

loan.use: to purchase photographic paper

loan.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Juan Jose; el tiene 31 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de multiservicios donde se realizan fotocopias, anillados y otros servicios, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de multiservicios. El socio solicita el prstamo para el comprar materiales como papel y repuestos para la fotocopiadora.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Hatun Rumiyoc". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
His name is Juan Jose. He is 31 years old and he is single. He alternates his daily activities with his print store where he makes photocopies, binds books and other services. He works from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. He wants to expand his print store. He requests a loan to purchase materials such as paper and parts for the photocopier.
He is happy for this loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loan.use: to purchase products such as paper and parts for the photocopier.

loan.name: Haydee

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Haydee; La socia tiene 38 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 17, 15, 13, 5 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la elaboracin de diferentes potajes y a la venta de los mismos, la socia tiene un stand en el cual ella ofrece sus diversos platos, la socia en esta ocasin desea invertir el crdito en la compra de insumos para continuar con sus negocio y de esta manera mejorar sus ventas, la socia desea invertir en la compra de insumos como arroz al por mayor, aceite, para las frituras y otros productos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para elaborar sus potajes. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank IMASUMAC II which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member is Sra. Haydee. She is 38 years old, married and has 4 children aged 17, 15, 13 and 5 years. The member makes and sells different kinds of stew. The member has a stall at which she sells her various dishes. On this occasion, the member wants to use the loan to purchase supplies to continue with her business and in this way improve her sales. The member wants to invest in the purchase of supplies such as: wholesale rice, oil for frying and other products. The member is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of supplies to make her stews.
The member is grateful for the loan and agrees to make the repayments in accordance with the schedule of payments.

loan.use: to buy supplies with which to make her stews.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to purchase traditional clothing for sale.

loan.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia Esther pertenece al banco comunal UNION, FUERZA Y AMISTAD y las reuniones D. las socias son cada treinta das en la ciudad del Cusco. Cusco perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.
La socia Esther naci en la ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 52 aos D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unin tiene 2 hijos, ella tiene su negocio D. venta D. ropa para damas, caballeros y nios, ella tambin venD. polos, chompas, pantalones, camisas entre otros ms, ella venD. por las maanas en la feria dominical del distrito D. San Sebastin y esta es la nica actividad que realiza por el momento ya que los dems das se dedica a su casa. La socia Esther tambin se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza D. las marcas D. Esika y Avon. En esta oportunidad Esther requiere el prstamo para comprar ms ropa.
La socia Esther est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Esther belongs to the communal bank Union, Fuerza Y Amistad (Union, Strength, and Friendship). The members meet every 30 days in the city of Cusco. Cusco belongs to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.
The member Esther was born in the city of Cusco. She is 52 years old, married and has 2 children from the marriage. She has a business selling clothes for women, men and children. She also sells polo shirts, sweaters, trousers, shirts and many other items. She sells in the mornings at the Sunday fairs in the district of San Sebastian. This is her only business activity at the moment as she dedicates the rest of the week to household chores. The member Esther also sells beauty products by Esika and Avon. On this occasion, Esther needs the loan to buy more clothes.
The member Esther is happy for the loan and agrees to make her repayments.

loan.use: to purchase more merchandise for her business.

loan.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, tiene la edad 45 de aos, est soltero y vive con sus padres actualmente que son su prioridad. El con el dinero va comprar vacas para la produccin de leche. El tiene un potrero para el mantenimiento en buenas condiciones de estos animales y as obtener de esta los mejores resultados. El tiene como meta con el ingreso de leche para el hogar liberar algunos gastos y as tener dinero para comprar otras cosas necesarias del hogar. Tambin pretende con la leche que no se consuma en el hogar venderla y as tambin colaborar con ms ingresos para el bienestar familiar. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Jorge is 45 years old and single. He lives with his parents and they are his priority. With the money, he will buy cows for milk production. He has a well maintained field for these animals and therefore he will get good results. With the income earned from the milk, his goal is to get rid of some expenses and to have money to purchases other things for the home. He also plans on not consuming the milk but to sell it and therefore he will have more income for his familys well-being. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any loan with other state banks. FUDECOSUR offered the best terms and much lower interest rates.

loan.use: purchase dairy cows.

loan.name: Efren Humberto

texts.es:
A sus 42 aos de edad Efrn es un hombre emprendedor, un esposo responsable y un padre que se siente orgulloso de sus 4 hijos, desde hace varios aos tiene un negocio familiar que les ha ayudado a cumplir con las necesidades bsicas de su hogar, y entre sus hijos su esposa y l se encargan de sacar adelante su microempresa donde venden arepas de queso en un sector muy comercial de Bello, un municipio del departamento de Antioquia.
Actualmente suean con ver progresar el negocio, y comenzar a distribuir las arepas a otras microempresas que se encarguen de su venta, pero esto requiere producir en mayor cantidad, pero hoy en da no cuentan con el capital necesario para comprar la materia prima al por mayor para que la produccin y comercializacin de las arepas sea mas efectiva, Efrn solicita un prstamo para hacer dichas compras, mejorar y aumentar las ventas para lograr tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: At 42 years of age, Efrn is an entrepreneurial man, a responsible husband and a father who feels proud of his four children. For several years, Efrn has had a family business which has helped him to cover his household's basic needs. Between his children, his wife and himself, they work to get ahead in their micro-business selling cheese 'arepas' in a very commercial area of Bello, a town in Antioquia department. They are currently dreaming of making progress in their business and starting to distribute their 'arepas' to other micro-businesses to sell. However, this requires them to produce in larger quantities. Right now, they don't have the capital they need to buy their supplies wholesale which would make their production and sales of 'arepas' more effective. Efrn is requesting a loan to make these purchases, and to improve and increase their sales so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy supplies for making food

loan.name: Celedonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Celedonio; el tiene 44 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio por medio de este trabajo saca adelantes a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de taxi. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar mantenimiento de su carro para comprar llantas.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Celedonio is a member of the "Hatun Rumiyoc" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Celedonio is 44 years old, lives with his partner, and has three children. He divides his time between his daily activities and his taxi service. He works from 5.00am to 6.00pm. He has a car which he uses to provide a taxi service. Through this work, he supports his children. Celedonio would like to expand and improve his taxi business. He is requesting this loan to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy tires.
Celedonio is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to have maintenance work carried out on his car and to buy tires

loan.name: Orlando

texts.es: Orlando tiene 65 aos, es un hombre amable y muy talentoso, convive con su pareja, l an no tiene hijos pero su pareja s, que ya son mayores e independiente. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. El trabajo al que se dedica es la ebanistera, es un artista diseanado muebles, pues trabaja con la madera, le da forma y arma sus lindos productos, su especialidad son las sillas, mesas, sofa, entre otros. Tiene un taller que monto en su casa, ah es donde trabaja todos los das para cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Tiene 16 aos realizando esta actividad, pero hay momentos que tiene mucho pedidos que necesita contratar personas para que lo ayuden. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo, es independiente y no tiene que rendir cuentas a nadie, por ello disfruta su trabajo, y gracias a ello logr educar a sus hijos polticos, como hijos si fueran sus hijos. Este ser el crstamo nmero once con MFP le esta yendo bien y esta muy contenta de trabajar con su grupo ya que son muy responsables, esta muy agradecida pues los prestamos recibidos anteriormente le fueron de mucha ayuda y fueron muy bien invertido, espera contar nuevamente con su ayuda. Con el monto solicitado, comprar madera para que pueda tener ya fabricados su muebles.
texts.en:
Orlando is 65 years old. He is a kind and very talented man who lives with his partner. He doesn't have children himself but his partner does. They are grown up and live independently. Orlando and his partner live together in their own home.
Orlando is a carpenter. He is an artist who designs furniture. He works with wood and forms and assembles his beautiful products. His specialities are chairs, tables, sofas, etc. He has a workshop which he set up in his home. This is where he works every day in order to fill the orders from his customers. He has been in this business for 16 years and there are times when he has a lot of orders and needs to hire people to help him.
What Orlando enjoys about his work is the fact that he chooses how to spend his time, he is independent and he doesn't have to account to anybody. For this reason, he enjoys his work and it has enabled him to educate his stepchildren as if they were his own children. This will be his eleventh loan from MFP. His business is doing well and he is very happy to be working with his group as they are all very responsible people. He is very grateful as the previous loans that he received were very helpful and very well invested. He hopes to be able to count on your help once again. He will use the sum he has requested to buy wood so that he can make his furniture.

loan.use: to buy wood

loan.name: Arthur

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Arthur; el tiene 28 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como docente del nivel secundario y tambin es socio de una academia de preparacin pre universitaria, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medios de su trabajo y de su negocio el socio quiere salir adelante, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de academia. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar carpetas e implementar la academia pre universitaria.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Arthur is a member of the 'Hatun Rumiyoc' community bank which is located in Cusco district, province and department.
Arthur is 28 years old and single. He divides his time between his daily activities and his work as a high school teacher. He is also a member of an academy which prepares students for university. He works from 7.00am to 8.00pm and, through his work and his business, he would like to get ahead in life. He would like to expand and improve the pre-university prep school business. He is requesting this loan to buy folders and equip the academy.
Arthur is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy folders and equip the pre-university prep school

loan.name: Janny

texts.es: Janny, de 27 aos es una mujer luchadora. Ella convive con Omar, su esposo desde hace 7 aos. Ambos tienen una hija: Andrea, a la que quieren mucho y cuidan en casa de su madre, ubicada en el barrio de Chupaca. Su rostro apacible y tranquilo, muestra la serenidad que la caracteriza. A sus cortos 20 aos enfrent muchas responsabilidades. Uno de ellos es la llegada de su pequea hija, a la que quiere mucho. Ella continu estudiando a pesar de ello y ahora trabaja como asistente administrativa en el gobierno local de su comunidad, donde gracias a su trabajo recibe un sueldo mensual de parte del estado. Pero como ella desea mejorar su calidad de vida. Hace poco abri una tienda de comestibles en casa de su mam, que le ayuda a atender a sus clientes durante la maana, ya en la tarde y culminando su trabajo ella asume la atencin de su negocio. Adems cra vacas y becerros que enseba para luego comercializarlos a un mayor precio. Con todos estos ingresos, espera juntar el dinero necesario para brindar a su hija una buena educacin. Este es el segundo crdito con MFP, donde agradece la confianza que depositan en ella, motivo que la estimula a seguir progresando. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Janny de recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestibles, pues comenta que si compra en cantidad; tiene mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
27-year-old Janny is a tenacious woman. She lives with Omar, her husband of seven years. The couple have one daughter, Andrea, who they love very much and care for in her mother's house which is located in Chupaca neighborhood. Janny's calm and gentle face reflects the serenity for which she is noted.
At just 20 years of age, Janny faced many responsibilities. One of these responsibilities came with the arrival of her young daughter who she loves very much. She continued studying in spite of this and now works as an administrative assistant with the local government in her community. Thanks to her work, she receives a monthly salary from the State. However, as she would like to improve her quality of life, she recently opened a grocery store in her mom's home. Her mom helps her to serve her customers in the mornings and afternoons and, when she finishes work, Janny takes over. In addition, she also raises cows and calves which she fattens and then sells at a higher price. With all these sources of income, she hopes to be able to put together the money she needs to provide her daughter with a good education.
This is Janny's second loan from MFP and she is grateful for the trust that has been placed in her. This drives her to continue making progress and she pledges to make her loan repayments on time. With your support, Janny will invest the money she has requested in buying basic household products for her grocery store because she says that if she buys in bulk she makes more profits.

loan.use: to buy basic household products to stock her store

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase beans and other ingredients necessary to make refried beans.

loan.name: Mnatsakan

texts.en: Mnatsakan needs funds to build an additional greenhouse. He needs to buy metal fixtures and plastic, which are the necessary materials for building a greenhouse. Mnatsakan used his previous loan to build a greenhouse. He expands every year. He made a profit - this year, Mnatsakan was able to earn a gross income of 90 thousand hryvnia from sales, despite the fact that prices were very low during this season. His younger daughter was accepted to attend a college, and the oldest son already works and lives independently.

loan.use: to build an additional greenhouse

loan.name: Georgina

texts.es: Georgina, D. 52 aos es una mujer luchadora que junto a William, su esposo desD. hace 28 aos. Cuidan a 3 D. sus 5 hijos; en su casa propia ubicada en la ciudad D. Huancayo. Ella es una mujer luchadora, su principal virtud es el ingenio que tiene en cualquier negocio que emprenD.. La venta D. productos D. belleza en todo tipo D. marcas, es su principal actividad econmica. Adems brinda el servici D. lavado D. ropas y limpieza D. casas, donD. le va muy bien, pues durante este tiempo logr obtener buenos clientes. Pero como ella gusta D. estar ocupada y activa; en festividades del mes D. octubre, venD. turrones en las calles acompaando a la procesin del cristo moreno. Adems D. panteones en navidad y la preparacin D. comida los das domingo en una esquina D. su casa. Las ganas D. progreso D. est mujer son impresionantes, tengo que trabajar para sacar a mis hijos adelante, afirma, ya que uno D. ellos estudia una carrera universitaria y su mayor deseo es ver a todos sus hijos como unos profesionales, responsables y con xito. Este es el dcimo crdito con MFP, se siente aliviada, pues tiene el apoyo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago D. sus cuotas. La casa D. Georgina necesita D. algunos arreglos, por ello D. recibir su apoyo; invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra D. puertas, ventanas y pago al personal para revestir sus paredes con un material fuerte.
texts.en: Georgina, 52, is a hard-working woman who alongsiD. William, her husband for 28 years, cares for three of her five children in their own house located in the city of Huancayo. She is a hard-working woman. Her principle virtue is the knack that she has with whatever business she starts. Selling beauty products from all types of brands is her main economic activity. Additionally, she provides a laundry and a house cleaning service which do well and during this time she has managed to obtain good customers. But she likes to be busy and active. In the festivities of the month of October, she sells candies in the street accompanying the procession of the black Christ, in addition to cemetaries at Christmas and preparing food on Sundays in a corner of her home. This woman's desire to get ahead are impressive, "i have to work to get my children ahead" she affirms since one of them studies at university and her greatest wish is to see all of her children become professionals, responsible and with success. This is her tenth loan with MFP. She feels relieved since she has the support she needs to achieve her objectives. Additionally, she promises to be punctual with her repayments. Georgina's house needs some repairs for which she needs your support. She will invest the money requested in the purchase of doors, windows and to pay the people to recoat her walls with a strong material.

loan.use: to purchase doors and windows for her house, as well as pay the construction workers.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to pay for his tuition and professional seminars.

loan.name: Silveria

texts.es: La seora Silveria cuenta con la edad de 72 aos, es viuda desde hacen 10 aos, tiene 6 hijos, de los cuales ya todos estn casados, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, desde hace 3 aos. Ella dice que empez con esta actividad, por que quiere mejorar su calidad de vida y tener una buena solvencia econmica, tambin para empezar a ahorrar y asegurar su futuro, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de refrescos, jugos y aguas, para tener un poco mas surtido su negocio. Una de las metas que tiene doa Silveria, es la de hacer crecer muchsimo su negocio, puesto que quiere construir un local, para poner un deposito de refrescos, y as mejorar e incrementar sus ingresos. Esta muy agradecida con FRAC y los donadores de kiva, por este gran apoyo que les estn ofreciendo, ya que gracias a esta ayuda su negocio y vida de su familia han cambiado bastante.
texts.en:
Sra. Silveria is 72 years old and has been a widow for 10 years. She has six children who are all married. Silveria has been selling soft drinks for three years.

She says that she started this business because she wanted to improve her quality of life and have good financial solvency. Silveria also wanted to start saving and securing her future. The loan she will receive will be invested in soft drinks, juices, and water so that her business will have a little more inventory.

One of Doa Silverias goals is to grow her business even more. She wants to build a shop where she can set up a soft drink repository and increase her earnings. Silveria is very grateful to FRAC and the Kiva lenders because of the overwhelming support they have offered. Thanks to the help she has received for her business, the life of her family has changed considerably.

loan.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, and water.

loan.name: Reyna

texts.es: La seora reina cuenta con 40 aos de edad, est casada con el seor filomon con quien tiene 3 hijas, luz, ngeles y Guadalupe, de los cuales solo 2 estudian, la mayor cursa el tercer ao de prepa, una mas cuarto de primaria, ya que la mas pequea apenas tiene 10 meses de nacida, ella tiene una papelera, desde hace mas de 9 aos. Dice que inicio con esta actividad, ya que quera poyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y la educacin de sus hijos, tambin para mejorar un poco su nivel de vida y contar con una solvencia econmica, mas estable, y as poder vivir cmodamente, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercanca como son: hoja, carpetas, papel Bond, cartulinas, cuadernos, libretas, lpices, lapiceros, resistol, marcadores, sacapuntas, etc. Y as tener ms surtida su tienda. El anhelo ms grande que tiene doa reina, es el de poder hacer crecer aun mas su negocio, y ampliar un poco mas su local, para as tener muy bien surtido e incrementar un poco mas sus ganancias. Le da las gracias a fundacin realidad, por toda la ayuda y la confianza que le estn ofreciendo, ya que gracias al apoyo recibido su vida ha cambiado mucho al igual que su negocio. GRACIAS
texts.en:
Sra. Reyna is 40 years old and married to Sr. Filomon. They have three daughters: Luz, ngeles, and Guadalupe. Only two of them are in school. The oldest daughter is starting her third year of preparatory school and another one is in the fourth grade. The youngest child is 10 months old. Reyna has a stationery shop that she has managed for more than nine years.

She says that she started this business because she wanted to help her husband with the household expenses and the education of her children. Reyna also wants to slightly improve their standard of living so that they can have better financial solvency, more stability, and the ability to live comfortably. The loan she is receiving will be invested in the purchase of more merchandise such as individual sheets, folders, bond paper, cards, notebooks, journals, pencils, ballpoint pens, glue, markers, pencil sharpeners, and other products so that her shop will be better stocked.

Doa Reynas greatest wish is to grow her business even more and to expand her shop slightly so that she can carry more inventory and increase her earnings. She thanks Fundacin Realidad for the assistance and the trust that have been offered to her. Thanks to the support she has received, her life and her business have changed greatly. She says, Thank you.

loan.use: to buy individual sheets, folders, bond paper, cards, notebooks, journals, pencils, ballpoint pens, glue, markers, pencil sharpeners, and other products.

loan.name: Lucia

texts.es: La seora lucia cuenta con 35 aos de edad, esta casada con el seor refugio, tienen 3 hijos adilene, eder y cenaido, los estudian segundo ao de prepa, tercer ao de secundaria y primer ao de primaria, se dedica ala venta de carne de res desde hacen 10 aos. Dice que inicio con este pequeo negocio, ya que quera buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo e hijos, para mejorar un poco sus gastos y tener una muy buena calidad de vida, el crdito que recibi lo invirti en la compra de ms carne y chorizo. Para as tener un mejor surtido. Ella est convencida que uno de sus sueos se podr cumplir, ya que es el de hacer crecer mucho mas su negocio, puesto que quiere construir un local, para poner su carnicera y as tenerlo ms surtido con una amplia variedad de productos, as incrementar y mejorar sus ingresos. Doa lucia dice que est muy agradecida con los donadores de kiva, por este gran apoyo que le estn brindando, pero sobre todo por la confianza, ya que con esta ayuda ha logrado mejorar el negocio y la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Lucia is 35 years old and married to Sr. Refugio. They have three children: Adilene, Eder, and Cenaido. They are in the second year of preparatory school, the third year of secondary school, and the first year of elementary school respectively. Lucia has been selling beef for 10 years.

She says that she started this small business because she was looking for a way to support her husband and children and to help a little bit with the expenses so that they can have a better quality of life. The loan she will receive will be invested in more meat and chorizo so that she can be well-stocked.

Lucia is convinced that she can accomplish one of her dreams, which is to grow her business even more. She wants to build a structure where she can establish her butcher shop. This will allow her to carry more inventory and offer a wider variety of products, as well as help her to increase and improve her income.
