Doa Lucia says that she is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for the overwhelming support they have provided because everything is based on trust. With their help, she will be able to improve her business and her familys life.

loan.use: to buy more meat and chorizo.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria,de 35 aos de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos dos de ellos estudian en un instituto de la capital, el negocio de ella es una pequea tienda donde vende productos Maxicanos como,cafe,cereal,aceite,frijol,jabon,etc. y ademas del producto Mexicano tambien vende ragalitos para toda ocacion,y mercaderia de libreria su negocio lo inicio hace 2 aos, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos Mexicanos y regalitos para la venta,y de esa manera agrandar mas su negocio.el sueo de Maria es que sus hijos crezcan con la educacion nesesaria para poder tener un mejor futuro y de mas oportunidades de superar.
texts.en: Maria is 35 years old, married, and she has 3 children. Two of them attend an educational institution in the capital city. Her business is a small store where she sells Mexican products such as coffee, cereals, cooking oil, beans, soaps, etc. In addition to Mexican products, she also sells gifts for all occasions and office supply merchandise. She started out her business 2 years ago. She requests this loan to purchase Mexican products and gifts for resale. This is how she will increase her business. Maria's dream is for her children to grow up with the necessary education to have better future and more opportunities for self-improvement.

loan.use: to purchase food products and gifts for all occassions.

loan.name: Florentina

texts.es: La seora florentina cuenta con 44 aos de edad, esta casada con el seor Aurelio, tienen 2 hijas, rub y Johana, quienes estudian primer ao de secundaria y sexto ao de primaria, se dedica a la matanza de marrano y venta de carne, desde hacen 3 aos. Ella dice que decidi iniciar con esta actividad, ya que quera buscar la manera de sacar a sus hijas adelante, y as ofrecerles una muy buena calidad de vida y tener una mejor solvencia econmica, para apoyarlos con sus estudios, el crdito que recibi lo invirti en la compra de ms marranos. La meta que tiene doa flor (como mejor la conocen en su comunidad), es la de hacer crecer mucho mas su negocio, ya que lo que en verdad quiere es poner una carnicera, para tener ms variedad y as mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le ayudara para apoyar a sus hijas con sus estudios profesionales. Le doy las gracias a FRAC y los donadores de kiva, por confiar en m y brindarme todo su apoyo MUCHAS GRACIAS.
texts.en:
Sra. Florentina is 44 years old and married to Sr. Aurelio. They have two daughters, Rub and Johana, who are in the first year of high school and in sixth grade respectively. Florentina has been butchering pigs and selling the meat for three years.

She says that she decided to start this business as a way of helping her daughters to get ahead, offering them a better quality of life and better financial stability, and supporting them with their studies. The loan she received will be invested in the purchase of more pigs. The goal of Doa Flor (as she is known in her community) is to grow her business more. What she wants most is to open a butcher shop so that she can offer more variety and improve her income. This would allow her to support her daughters with their professional studies.

Florentina says, I express my deepest thanks to FRAC and the Kiva lenders for trusting me and providing me all of their support.

loan.use: to buy more pigs for butchering.

loan.name: Cesar Fernando

texts.es: Csar de 23 aos, una persona que trata de seguir adelante a pesar de la economa de el pas. El negocio de l es de hacer fletes en su tricimoto, inicio esta actividad hace 2 aos. Su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 6:00am hasta las 16:30pm. La dificultad de l es que su tricimoto est en muy mal estado. Por eso el solicita este prstamo, para invertir en su tricimoto y as poder tener un ingreso en donde pueda ayudar a su familia. Su sueo es tener una casa propia donde l pueda independizarse, ya que vive con sus padres.
texts.en:
Csar, age 23, is a person who tries to continue forward despite the state of the national economy. His business involves hauling freight using his moto-tricycle. He started this business two years ago. Csar works Monday through Sunday from 6am to 4:30pm. His difficulty stems from his moto-tricycle being in very bad condition. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to invest in his vehicle so that he can have income to help his family.

His dream is to have a home of his own where he can be independent since he already lives with his parents.

loan.use: to buy tires, a radio, tubes, a seat, and other parts for his moto-tricycle.

loan.name: Natalya

texts.en: Natalya is coming to you with a loan request for the third time. Her son is getting married in October, and Natalya and her husband spent a lot of money on wedding preparations. They will cover the expenses with the second harvest; however, they now need money to buy seeds and to build a large greenhouse for growing seedlings. Adding her own funds to the obtained loan, Natalya plans to make the following investments into her business: 6000 hryvnia for a new greenhouse for seedlings, 5000 hryvnia for heating in the greenhouse, 4000 hryvnia for plastic and 3000 hryvnia for seeds. Her son and his wife are leaving after the wedding to live with relatives in the north of Russia, where there is a good job for him.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and build a greenhouse for seedlings

loan.name: Clara Violeta

texts.es: Clara de 48 aos, vive en una zona suburbana llamada Isla trinitaria. Sus negocios son talleres de costura. Empez hace 12 aos, la cual estn ubicadas en diferentes partes de la urbe. Su dificultad al iniciar sus negocios eran la delincuencia, pero ahora ella ya es conocida en el sectores de sus locales. El esposo la ayuda en la supervisin de los locales, aparte el vende botellas de aguas. Tiene3 hijos pero ya son mayores de edad, son independientes. Ella solicita el prstamo para invertir en sus negocios y para la compra de maquinas de coser. El sueo de ella es poder brindar empleos a las personas ms necesitadas.
texts.en:
Clara is 48 years old and lives in a suburban area called Isla Trinitaria. Her businesses consist of sewing workshops. She started 12 years ago and has several locations in different parts of the city. Her difficulty with starting her businesses has been dealing with the crime, but now she is well-known in the areas where she operates. In addition to selling bottled water, her husband helps with supervising each of the locations. Clara has three children who already grown and independent.

She is requesting a loan to invest in her businesses by purchasing sewing machines. Her dream is to provide jobs to people who need them the most.

loan.use: to buy sewing machines.

loan.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma, tiene la edad 47 de aos, est casada y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo. Ella va comprar con el crdito cerdos para el engorde y sus insumos. Ella cuenta con el local apto para el desarrollo de esta actividad y por lo cual quiere seguir creciendo con el negocio. Ella generar ms ganancias para su bienestar y tener los cerdos engordados para la temporada alta y venderlos para el mercado local y obtener la mayor de las ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar su nivel econmico cada da. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Vilma is 47 years old, married, and lives with her husband and three children. She will use her loan to buy pigs for fattening and the necessary supplies. Vilma has an adequate space for engaging in this activity and wants to continue growing with her business. She wants to generate more income for her well-being, have fattened pigs in time for the peak season, sell them at the local market, and generate more profits for the benefit of her family and improving their financial standing each day.

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. Vilma has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loan.use: to buy pigs for fattening and the necessary supplies.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loan.name: Solidario Las Esmeraldas Group

texts.es: Solidario las esmeraldas, integrado por doa ngela Daniela de 21 aos, Vera Judith de 27 aos y Eva Judith de 47 aos. Doa ngela la lider del duo se dedica a la vente de cosmticos y ahora tambin a la venta de pan en su casa todos los das es la misma rutina claro ella lo hace para asegurar la vida de sus futuros hijos, vende en su local todos los das mantiene abierto todo el da pero hay veces que sale tambin a vender sus productos por catlogos para tener un mayor ingreso toca puertas busca a sus conocidas y esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra de pan para su panaderia. En cuando a doa vera Judith sigue con su venta de regalos y piatas ella las hace asegura que ha sido de ayuda el crdito anterior no duda que este le ayude aun mas, doa Eva tambin sigue con su librera todos los das desde temprano atiende a sus clientes y procura mantener variedad para que la visiten seguido. Las tres seoras han visto un cambio en su vida y ahora desean refinanciar y as incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Solidario las Esmeraldas is composed of ngela Daniela who is 21 years old, Vera Judith who is 27 and Eva Judith who is 47.
ngela, the leader of the group, makes a living selling cosmetics, and now also bread, out of her home. Every day is the same routine. Of course, she does it to secure the lives of her future children. She sells in her shop every day. She stays open all day but there are many times that she also leaves to sell her products through catalogues in order to have a greater income, knocking on doors and seeks out acquaintances. She is asking for this loan to buy bread for her bakery.
As for Vera Judith, she continues with her sale of the gifts and piatas that she makes. She assures that the previous loan has been helpful and she does not doubt that this one will help her even more.
Eva also continues with her bookstore. Every day, starting very early, she serves her clients and tries to maintain variety so that they visit often.
The three women have seen change in their lives and now want to refinance and thereby increase their profits.

loan.use: to buy bread to sell.

loan.name: Mauricio Gonzalo

texts.es:
Mauricio de 37 aos, vive en una zona suburbana llamada Isla trinitaria. Su negocio es un taller de bicicleta en la cual arregla todo tipo de bicicletas. Trabaja todo el da, segn el ritmo de los clientes que le van llegando.
El solicita este prstamo para implementar mas accesorios de talleres de bicicleta como: aros, tapa cubos, llantas, etc.
Su sueo es tener todos los implementos necesarios para el uso de su taller y poder comprar una computadora para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 37 years old and lives in a suburban area called Isla Trinitaria. His business is a bicycle workshop where he repairs all types of bicycles. He works every day according to the pace by which his customers arrive at his shop.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more bicycle accessories such as rings, hubcaps, tires, and other items. His dream is to have all of the necessary tools that he uses in his workshop and to buy a computer for his children.

loan.use: to buy more bicycle accessories such as rings, hubcaps, tires, and other items.

loan.name: Eloina

texts.es: La seora eloina cuenta con 32 aos D. edad, est casada su esposo se llama Daniel, quien es taxista, tienen 3 hijos Daniel, scar y Griselda, quienes estudian primero, segundo y cuarto ao D. primaria, ella tiene una tienda D. abarrotes, desD. hace mas D. 10 aos. Doa eloina dice que decidi iniciar con esta actividad, ya que quera buscar la manera D. apoyar a su esposo con los gastos D. la casa y con la educacin D. sus hijos, tambin para tener una mejor solvencia econmica, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra D. mas mercanca, para tener ms surtida su tienda como son: aceite, sal, leche, refrescos, azcar, jabn, papel higinico, etc. Ella tambin tiene una meta para su negocio, desea hacerlo crecer muchsimo, ya que quiere ampliar su local para tenerlo mejor surtido, con una amplia variedad D. productos, y as contar con mejores ingresos. Esta muy agradecida con los donadores D. kiva y FRAC, por todo el apoyo y confianza que le estn brindando, ya que gracias a esta ayuda ahora pueD. continuar invirtiendo en su negocio y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Eloina is 32 years old and married to her husband Daniel, who is a taxi driver. They have three children: Daniel, scar, and Griselda. They are in the first, second, and fourth grades respectively. Eloina has been managing a grocery store for more than 10 years.

She says that she started this business because she wanted to help her husband with the household expenses and their childrens education. In addition, Doa Eloina wants to have better financial solvency. The loan she will receive will be invested in the purchase of more merchandise so that her store will be well-stocked. She plans to buy oil, salt, milk, soft drinks, sugar, soap, toilet paper, and other items.

Eloina is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and to FRAC for all of the support and trust that have been given to her. She is thankful that the help she now has will allow her to continue investing in her business and supporting her family.

loan.use: to buy oil, salt, milk, soft drinks, sugar, soap, toilet paper, and other items.

loan.name: Valentina

texts.es: La seora valentina tiene 28 aos D. edad, est casada con el seor Adrin, tienen 3 hijos Eva, Jos y rosario, quienes estudian, la mayor est cursando el primer ao D. secundaria, los ms pequeos segundo y quinto ao D. primaria, se dedica a la venta D. pollos y refrescos, desD. hace mas D. 3 aos, para tener un poco mas surtido su negocio. Ella decidi iniciar con este negocio, buscando apoyar a su esposo con los gastos D. la casa y a su familia, tambin para mejorar un poco mas su solvencia econmica, as asegurar el futuro y educacin D. sus hijos, el crdito que recibi decidi invertirlo en la compra D. pollo, refrescos, aguas y jugos. El deseo ms granD. que tiene doa valentina para su negocio, es D. incrementar su inversin, para hacerlo crecer rpidamente, ya que quisiera poner una pollera, para as mejorar e incrementar an ms sus ganancias, y continuar apoyando a su familia. Esta muy satisfecha por contar con el apoyo D. los donadores D. kiva, ya que gracias a esto ahora goza D. una mejor produccin y surtido en el negocio, que le ayuda, para continuar ahorrando parte D. sus ganancias, puesto que as asegurara la educacin superior D. sus hijos.
texts.en:
Valentina is 28 years old and married to Adrin. They have three children, Eva, Jos and Rosario, who are all in school. The eldest is in her first year of high school and the two younger children are in the second and fifth year of elementary school. Valentina's business is selling chickens and soft drinks. She has been in this business for more than three years and would like to better stock her business. She decided to start working in this business as she wanted to support her husband with their household and family expenses. She also wanted to improve their financial situation a little more so that they could guarantee their children's future and education. Valentina invested the loan that she received in buying chicken, soft drinks, water and juice.
Valentina's biggest wish for her business is to increase her investment so that she can make it grow quickly as she would like to set up a poultry store so that she can improve and increase her profits even further and continue supporting her family.
Valentina is very happy that she can count on the support of Kiva lenders because, thanks to this, her business is now more productive and better stocked. She is also able to continue saving some of her profits so that she can guarantee her children's higher education.

loan.use: to buy chicken, soft drinks, water and juice

loan.name: Norma

texts.es: La seora norma cuenta con 21 aos de edad y est casada con el seor aleido, quien es campesino con el cual tiene 1 hijo, cleiri de 4 aos de edad, est cursando el primer ao de preescolar, se dedica a la venta de dulces desde hace apenas 4 meses. Ella dice que decidi iniciar con este pequeo negocio, ya que quera buscar la manera de apoyar a su esposo, con los gastos de la casa y para la educacin de su pequeo hijo, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de mas dulces como son: paletas, chicles, frituras (palomitas, chicharrones, cacahuates), jugos y refrescos, para as tener un poco ms surtida su tienda. Doa norma dice que uno de los sueos que tiene, es el de hacer crecer aun mas su pequeo negocio, puesto que quiere construir un local, para ampliar su dulcera y as tener un amplio surtido y variedad de productos, obtener mejores ingresos, para poder apoyar a su hijo con sus estudios. Est muy contenta por esta gran ayuda que FRAC y kiva le estn brindando, ya que gracias a eso, ahora goza de un mejor nivel de vida y un buen negocio.
texts.en:
Norma is 21 years old and married to Aleido, who is an agricultural worker. The couple have one child, 4-year-old Cleiri, who is in the first year of pre-school. Norma has been running her business selling sweet treats for just four months. She says that she started out in this small business as she wanted to find a way of supporting her husband with their household expenses and to pay for their young child's education. Norma will invest the loan that she received in buying more sweet treats such as lollies, chewing gum, popcorn, fried pork rinds, peanuts, juice and soft drinks. This will help her to stock her store a little more.
Norma says that one of her dreams is to further grow her small business as she would like to be able to build premises so that she can expand her store and offer a wider range of products. This will enable her to support her son with his education.
Norma is very happy for this great help that she is receiving from FRAC and Kiva as it enables her to enjoy a better standard of living and have a good business.

loan.use: to buy lollies, chewing gum, popcorn, fried pork rinds, peanuts and juice

loan.name: Angela

texts.es: La seora ngela cuenta con 47 aos de edad, es viuda y tiene 6 hijos de los cuales solo 3 estudian, el mayor esta en primer ao de prepa, otro en primer grado de secundaria y el ms pequeo en segundo ao de primaria, puesto que los dems estn casados y tienen su propia vida, tiene una pequea farmacia desde hacen 20 aos. Dice que decidi iniciar con este buen negocio ya que es muy rentable y le deja buenas ganancias, las cuales le ayudaran para apoyar a su esposo, con los gastos de la casa y a sus hijos, tanto para tener una mejor solvencia econmica, como para tener un buen nivel de vida, lo cual logro con mucho esfuerzo, el crdito que recibi lo continua invirtiendo en la compra de mas medicamentos, sueros, vitaminas, analgsicos, pastillas, antigripales, etc. Doa ngela dice que una de las metas para su negocio, es la de continuar invirtindole mucho mas, ya que tiene como objetivo ampliar su farmacia, y as mejorar e incrementar sus ganancias, para continuar ahorrando y as poder asegurar la carrera profesional de sus hijos. Ella est muy agradecida con fundacin realidad, pero sobre todo con los donadores por la confianza que le estn brindando, ya que dice gracias a esta ayuda ahora tiene un mejor negocio y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
ngela is 47 years old. She is a widow and has six children, only three of whom are still in school. The eldest is in his first year of senior high school, another is in the first year of high school and the youngest is in the second year of elementary school. The rest are married and lead their own lives. ngela has a small pharmacy which she has been running for 20 years.
ngela says that she decided to start out in this business as it is very profitable and would make her good money which would help her to support her husband with their household expenses and family expenses. The business has put her in a better financial position and she is able to enjoy a good standard of living. She has achieved all this through a lot of hard work. ngela will use the loan that she received to continue investing in the purchase of more medicines, saline solution, vitamins, painkillers, tablets, flu remedies, etc.
ngela says that one of the goals she has for her business is to continue investing in it a lot more as her goal is to expand her pharmacy and thereby improve and increase her profits so that she can continue saving and thereby guarantee her children's higher education.
ngela is very grateful to Fundacin Realidad and, above all, the lenders, for the trust that they are placing in her. She says that thanks to this help she now has a better business and quality of life.

loan.use: to buy more medicines, saline solution, vitamins, painkillers, tablets, flu remedies, etc.

loan.name: Martina

texts.es: La seora Martina tiene 67 aos de edad, est casada con el seor Carmelo con quien tiene 4 hijos, de los cuales ya todos estn casados y tiene su propia familia, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes desde hacen 3 aos. Dice que se animo a iniciar con este negocio, ya que quera buscar la manera de ayudar a su esposo a solventar los gastos del hogar, para mejorar su calidad de vida y hacerse de una mejor solvencia econmica, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de mas mercanca como son: azcar, sal, leche, arroz, frijol, agua, refrescos, aceite, jabn, galletas, papel higinico, etc. para tener un mejor surtido. Una de las metas que dice tener para su negocio, es la de invertirle mucho mas, para hacerlo crecer rpidamente, ya que quiere ampliar su tienda, para tambin empezara ahorrar parte de las obtener ms y mejores ganancias, para asegurar su futuro junto al a su esposo. Doa Martina est muy agradecida con fundacin realidad y los donadores de kiva, por todo el apoyo y sobre todo confianza que le estn brindando.
texts.en:
Martina, age 67, is married to Carmelo, and they have four children. All of the children are married and have their own families.
Martina has been selling groceries for three years. She says that she decided to start this business because she wanted to look for a way to help her husband pay the household expenses, to improve her quality of life, and to improve their financial standing.
She will use the loan she received to buy more merchandise like sugar, salt, milk, rice, beans, water, soft drinks, oil, soap, cookies, and toilet paper, etc. She will do this to be better stocked.
One of the goals that she says she has for the business is to invest a lot more in it. She will do this in order to make it grow rapidly. She wants to expand her store, and she also wants to start saving part of her greater and improved earnings. She wants to do this in order to assure her future and her husbands future.
Martina is very grateful to the Fundacin Realidad and the Kiva lenders for all of the support. Above all, she is grateful for the trust they are placing in her.

loan.use: to buy sugar, salt, milk, rice, beans, water, soft drinks, oil, soap, cookies, and toilet paper, etc.

loan.name: Tatyana

texts.en: Tatyana decided to request a loan because she urgently needed additional revolving capital. Tatyana bought a retail outlet and urgently needs additional merchandise. She plans to buy children's jackets, jumpsuits, warm suits and dresses. Tatyana repaid her previous loan early, paying off 2000 hryvnia more than she planned. Using the profit from the previous loan, Tatyana bought a new television set. She is also paying for the teacher, who prepared her daughter for college entrance exams.

loan.use: to buy children's jackets, jumpsuits, warm suits and dresses

loan.name: Judith

texts.es: Doa Judith tiene 27 aos de edad, est casada con el seor Arturo, quien es campesino, y aun no tiene hijos, ella tiene una taquera desde hace mas de 4 aos. Dice que decidi iniciar con esta actividad, puesto que buscaba la manera de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, aparte de que este negocio genera muy buenas ganancias, tambin porque quieren terminar de construir su casa, el crdito que recibi lo va a utilizar, para comprar insumos como: carne, chiles, jitomates, cilantro, cebolla, platos, servilletas, tortillas, etc. y as continuar con las ventas. Ella dice que la meta ms importante que tiene y quiere lograr, es la de poner una taquera mas grande y tenerla muy bien surtida, para empezar a ahorrar y asegurar su futuro junto al de su esposo, tambin por cualquier problema que llegaran a enfrentar. La seora Judith est muy agradecida con los donadores de kiva y FRAC, por todo el apoyo y confianza, que le estn brindando.
texts.en:
27-year old Doa Judith is married to Seor Arturo. They live in the countryside and as yet do not have any children. Judith has run a taco stand for more than four years.
She decided to start the stand because she was seeking a way to help her husband with the household expenses, a taco stand generates a good income, and they wanted to finish building their house. The loan money will be used to buy meat, chilies, tomatoes, cilantro, onions, plates, serviettes, tortillas etc.
Judiths primary goal is to open a bigger, well-stocked taco stand so she can begin saving, ensure a secure future for her and her husband, and be ready to face whatever difficulties arise.
Judith is very grateful to Kivas donors and to FRAC for all their support and belief in her.

loan.use: to buy meat, chilies, tomatoes, cilantro, onions, plates, serviettes, tortillas etc.

loan.name: Socorro

texts.es: La seora socorro tiene 46 aos de edad y est casada con el seor caricio, con el cual tiene 4 hijos, Emanuel, Yesica, miguel ngel y Moiss, de los cuales solo 2 estudian, estn cursando el primer y segundo ao de prepa, ya que los otros dos estn casados, ella va a iniciar con una frutera. Dice que decidi invertir en esta actividad, porque quiere ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, ya que ve trabajaba demasiado en el campo y no gana lo suficiente, para tener una buena solvencia econmica, tambin para continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios, para que puedan tener una muy buena carrera profesional, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de jitomates, chiles, cebollas, papas, zanahorias, pltanos, manzanas, duraznos, naranjas, etc. para as iniciar con el negocio. Una de las metas que tiene para su negocio, es la de hacerla crecer muchsimo, ya que est pensando en mas a delante construir un local, para ampliar su frutera y tener ms surtida su tienda, ya que as mejorara e incrementara mucho mas sus ingresos, ya que estos les sern de mucha utilidad, puesto que seguir apoyando a su esposo e hijos. Le da las gracias a fundacin realidad y a los donadores de kiva, por todo el apoyo y confianza que le estn brindando, ya que esto le srvira de mucho, puesto que ahora puede continuar invirtiendo en su negocio y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
46-year old Seora Socorro is married to Seor Caricio and they have four children, Emanuel, Yesica, Miguel ngel, and Moiss. Two of the children are at school (one in primary and the other in high school), while the other two children are married. Socorro is planning to open a fruit and vegetable stand.
She decided on this venture to help her husband with household expenses. She sees him working too hard in the countryside and not earning much money. She wants to ensure there is enough money to pay for their childrens education so that they can get good jobs.
Socorro plans to use the loan money to buy tomatoes, chilis, onions, potatoes, carrots, bananas, apples, peaches, oranges etc. for her new business. One of her goals is to see the business grow. In the future she is thinking of building a permanent stand for the fruit and vegetables and keeping it well-stocked. In this way she would earn more money which would be very useful in her goal of helping her husband and children.
She is grateful to Fundacin Realidad and to Kivas donors for all their support and trust. The loan will help her greatly achieve her goals of expanding her business and supporting her family.

loan.use: to buy tomatoes, chilis, onions, potatoes, carrots, bananas, apples, peaches, oranges etc.

loan.name: Leonor

texts.es: La seora Leonor cuenta con 29 aos de edad, est casada con el seor Aquileo quien es taxista, tienen 6 hijos Bibiana, cristal, lvaro, corina, alexia y betzy, de los cuales 5 estudian, la mayor est cursando segundo ao de secundaria, tres ms primero, tercero y sexto ao de primaria, la menor esta en segundo ao de preescolar, ya que la ms pequea apenas tiene unos meses de nacida, ella se dedica a la venta de maz, hace apenas 4 meses. Doa Leonor dice que decidi iniciar con esta actividad, ya que quera buscar de manera de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa y a sus hijos con sus estudios, tambin porque quiere mejorar su calidad de vida, el crdito que recibi lo va a invertir en la compra de insumos como: chiles, jitomates, cebollas, carnes, pollo, queso, aceite, lea, sal, etc. para continuar con las ventas en su negocio. La meta que ella tiene para su negocio, y espera poder cumplirla es la de invertirle muchsimo ms, para hacerlo crecer rpidamente, ya que quiere construir un local, para poner una pequeo restaurante, y as mejorar e incrementar un poco mas sus ingresos, puesto que podr asegurar el futuro y educacin de sus hijos. Le da las gracias a FRAC y a los donadores de kiva, por la confianza que le han estado brindando, ya que gracias a ese apoyo ahora puede ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y continuar con la inversin en su negocio, para que sea el mejor.
texts.en:
29-year old Seora Leonor is married to Seor Aquileo who is a taxi driver. They have six children, Bibiana, Cristal, lvaro, Corina, Alexia and Betzy of whom five are in school (the oldest in second year of high school, three in grades 1, 3, and 6 of primary school, one in the second year of pre-school). The youngest is just a few months old.
Leonor earns her living by selling corn, a job shes been doing for almost four months. She started doing this to help her husband pay for the household expenses and their childrens education. She also wants to improve their standard of living. She plans to use the loan money to buy supplies such as chilis, tomatoes, onions, meat, chicken, cheese, oil, firewood, salt etc. for her stall.
Her goal is to invest more money in her business so it will grow rapidly. She plans to build a permanent store and open a restaurant so that she can earn more money and ensure a good economic future and pay for her childrens education.
Leonor is grateful to FRAC and Kivas donors for the trust they have placed in her. Thanks to this help she can provide a better quality of life to her children and invest in her business.

loan.use: to buy chilis, tomatoes, onions, meat, chicken, cheese, oil, firewood, salt etc.

loan.name: Mahoulomin Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOULOMIN est compos de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui vivent dans le mme quartier au Bnin. C'est la deuxime fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALID, afin d'lever le niveau de son activit. La reprsentante du groupe, du nom de Dossi Laure est celle qui a la main leve sur la photo. Dossi Laure est ge de 34 ans et est marie Valentin un maon. Le couple trois enfants tous scolariss et encore leur charge. Dossi Laure n'a jamais t l'cole. Afin de subvenir ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants, Dossi Laure vend depuis cinq ans des sacs de mas. Dossi Laure sapprovisionne dans le nord du Bnin. Dans la qute de la satisfaction de sa clientle et pour accrotre son chiffre daffaires et son revenu, Dossi Laure sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOULOMIN, un deuxime crdit.Le premier crdit reu a t bien rembours.
texts.en:
The MAHOULOMIN group has three members who are friends and who live in the same neighborhood in Benin. This is the second time that this group has requested financial help from ALID in order to boost their businesses. The group's representative, called Dossi Laure, is the lady raising her hand in the photo.
Dossi Laure is 34 years old and married to Valentin who is a builder. The couple have three children still in their care who are all in school. Dossi Laure never went to school. In order to cover her needs and those of her children, she has been selling sacks of corn for five years. She stocks up in the north of Benin. With the goal of satisfying her customers and increasing both her sales and her income, Dossi Laure is requesting, together with the other members of the MAHOULOMIN group, a second loan. They repaid their first loan on time.

loan.use: to buy sacks of corn

loan.name: Begg Diam Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit Begg Diam est cr en janvier 2010; il est compos de quinze femmes qui s'activent dans le commerce.
Madame Ramata la responsable est ge de 41 ans, elle est marie mre de quatre enfants. Elle est debout droite sur la photo habille en boubou gris-noir et a lev la main gauche.Elle s'active dans le petit commerce de divers produits et a une bonne exprience. Elle achte ses produits dans les grandes villes et revend au march central.
Son prt lui permettra d'augmenter la quantit revendre afin de se faire plus de revenus.
Elle participe aux charges familiales.
texts.en: The 'Begg Diam' community bank was formed in January 2010. The group is made up of 15 women who work in commerce. Ramata is the leader of the group. She is 41 years old, married, and has four children. She is standing on the right of the photo, wearing a gray/black boubou (kaftan) and raising her left hand. She has a small business selling miscellaneous products and has good experience in this. Ramata's loan will enable her to increase the quantity of merchandise she sells so that she can make more income. Ramata contributes towards her family's expenses.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for resale

loan.name: Pseudomyclian

texts.en:
Pseudomyclian is 23 years old and single with no children. Pseudomyclian owns and operates a business baking and selling biscuits in the local community. She has one year of experience in this business. Pseudomyclian needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase an oven, sacks of flour, sacks of sugar and baking powder. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve her business.
In 2011, Pseudomyclian joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Pseudomyclian's first loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase an oven, sacks of flour, sacks of sugar and baking powder.

loan.name: Salaneta

texts.en:
Salaneta is 51 years old and married with seven children. She plants and harvest taro for sale. She has five years of experience in this business. Salaneta needs a loan of WST $2700 to purchase farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 800 talas or US $333 per week) to improve and expand her business.
In 2006, Salaneta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Salaneta's fifth loan from SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment.

loan.name: Me

texts.en:
Me is 34 years of age and married with four children. She plants and harvests taro for sale. Me has two years of experience in this business. She needs a loan of WST $1500 to purchase land to raise additional crops. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 700 talas or US $292 per week) to improve and expand her business.
In 2010, Me joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Me's second loan from SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase land to raise additional crops.

loan.name: Toiata

texts.en:
Toiata is 54 years old and married with five children. She provides general alteration and tailoring services to the local community. She has 10 years of experience in this business. Toiata needs a loan of WST $2700 to purchase additional fabric and materials. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 800 talas or US $333 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.
In 2001, Toiata joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Toiata's ninth loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase additional fabric and materials.

loan.name: Tafiau

texts.en:
Tafiau is 32 years old and married with five children. She plants and harvests taro for sale. She has many years of experience in this business. Tafiau needs a loan of WST $2700 to purchase farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 650 talas or US $271 per week) to improve and expand her business.
Tafiau joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Tafiau's fourth loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment.

loan.name: Susitina

texts.en:
Susitina is 50 years old and married with two children. She plants and harvests taro for sale. She has one year of experience in this business. Susitina needs a loan of WST $1500 to purchase land to expand her farm. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $146 per week) to continue to improve and expand the business.
Susitina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Susitina's second loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase land in order to expand her taro farm.

loan.name: Ricardo Israel

texts.es: El seor Ricardo Israel esta agradecido por su cooperacin en el anterior crdito el cual su negocio ha tenido mas ingreso. Esta solicitando un prstamo para invertir en compra de ropa de invierno para mujer, hombre, nios y juguetes nuevos, ya que no quiere descapitalizar el ingreso del negocio Y sus clientes le estn solicitando este tipo de mercanca. Planea pagar el crdito con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas del negocio, con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en una fabrica ser para pagar los gastos familiares y escolares de sus dos hijo que estudian la primaria. Desea aumentar los ingresos del negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Ricardo Israel is very grateful for your help with his previous loan, which has made his business more profitable. He is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing winter clothing for women, men, and children and new toys, since he doesn't want to deprive his business of capital and his clients are requesting this kind of merchandise. He intends to pay off the loan with the earnings he'll make from sales. He will use the salary he earns from his job in a factory to pay for his family's expenses and the education of his two children, who are in elementary school. He hopes to increase his business's profits and improve his family's life.

loan.use: to buy winter clothing for his business.

loan.name: Virginia Guadalupe

texts.es:
Virginia de 47 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Isla trinitaria. Ella empez su tienda de viveres haces muchos aos, trabaja sola en el turno de la maana y el esposo en el turno de la noches.
Ya que el esposo es taxista. La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia de su sector. Ella solicita el prstamo para comprar mercadera para la tienda, vivieres como:arroz, papas, cebollas, bebidas. El sueo de ella es agrandar su negocio y poner otros locales en el mismo sector de ella.
texts.en:
Virginia is 47 years old and lives on the outskirts of Guayaquil in a neighborhood called Isla Trinitaria.
She opened her shop many years ago. She works by herself for the morning shift, while her husband takes the night shift because he also works as a taxi driver.
Her biggest problem is the crime in her area. She is requesting a loan to buy products for her shop such as potatoes, onions, and beverages. Her dream is to expand her shop and open other locations in the same neighborhood.

loan.use: to purchase rice, potatoes, onions, and beverages

loan.name: Miramar Femenina 1 & 2 Group

texts.es:
Deyeana es la coordinadora del Grupo Miramar Femenina 1 & 2, Este grupo est compuesto por 10 mujeres dedicadas a las ventas D. ropas, zapatos, cosmticos, entre otros, algunos D. modo ambulante y algunos tienen sus negocios en sus casas.
Deyeana est muy emocionada D. recibir su 13th prstamo en Esperanza Internacional, desD. los inicios D. su negocio ella ha tomado prstamos con nosotros, llevando ya alrededor D. 7 aos invirtiendo los prstamos a su negocio. El actual ser invertido en la compra D. materiales para la elaboracin D. empanadas (comida realizada con harina amasada, rellena y luego frita o horneada), comprara Harina, Carnes, vegetales, aceite para cocinar, entre otros productos.
Sus planes para el futuro es poder tener un local propio para su negocio, ya que realiza sus ventas en la escuela D. su comunidad, tambin desea construir una cocina para su casa y comprar un vehculo, este ltimo es su reto mas difcil. A Deyeana gusta cantar, asistir a la iglesia y compartir con sus amistades.
Este grupo se encuentra ubicado en la ciudad D. Samana, una ciudad turstica, rodeada por el ocano atlntico y un paisaje natural D. mucha vegetacin y montaas, en una comunidad D. pocos recursos econmicos y servicios, es una zona totalmente rural, donD. los principales negocios pertenecen a los miembros D. este grupo.
texts.en:
Deyeana is the coordinator of Grupo Miramar Femenina 1 and 2. The group is maD. up of ten women who have businesses selling clothing, shoes, and cosmetics, among other things. Some of them sell door-to-door while others run their businesses out of their homes.
Deyeana is very excited to receive her thirteenth loan from Esperanza Internacional. She's been getting loans from us and investing them in her business ever since she started it seven years ago. She will use the current loan to buy ingredients for maK. empanadas (dough stuffed with meats and vegetables and then fried or baked) such as flour, meats, vegetables, cooK. oil.
In the future she would like to have a shop where she sells empanadas. She currently sells them at the local school. She also wants to build a kitchen in her house and buy a car, which is her biggest challenge. She enjoys singing, going to church, and sharing with her friends.
This group is in the town of Samana, a popular tourist destination on the Atlantic Ocean that's surrounded by a lush, mountainous landscape. The community has few economic resources and services, since it's a very rural area. The main business in town belong to the members of this group.

loan.use: to buy flour, meats, vegetables, cooking oil, etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy construction materials.

loan.name: Carlos Noel

texts.es: Carlos Noel tiene 54 aos su actividad es la compra y venta de ropa nueva. Desde hace 10 aos que tiene este negocio, Carlos es un hombre que le encanta el comercio, el vende pantalones, sueteres, pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos y trajes para damas. Su forma de venta es en su vivienda y algunas veces que sale a ofrecer estos productos. Este el motivo por el cual realiza el crdito para la compra materia necesaria que le solicitan sus clientes. Trabaja todos los das desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 7 de la noche, pues siempre busca el medio de generar ingresos.
texts.en: Carlos Noel, 54, is a clothes merchant. Hes had the business for ten years. Carlos is a man who loves commerce. He sells pants, sweaters, shirts, skirts, dresses and ladies outfits. He sells from home and sometimes goes out to sell these products. The reason for the loan request is to buy the items his customers are requesting. He works every day from 7am until 7pm because hes always seeking ways to generate income.

loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Kelia Judith

texts.es: La joven Keyla tiene 25 aos y se dedica a la venta de dvd's de pelculas, cd's musica en formato mp3, conciertos y videos de musica en dvd's, sus principales clientes son las pesonas que visitan el mercado de Nacaome. su negocio le genera ganancias para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de dvd's y cd's ya grababados, sus clientes la prefieren ya que la calidad de video y sonido que vende son buenos. El sueo de Keyla es mejorar y ampliar su casa de habitacion.
texts.en: Keyla, 25, sells movie DVDs, music CDs in MP3 format, concert and music videos on DVD. Her main customers are people who visit the Nacome market. Her business generates profits to cover household expenses. She will use the loan to buy previously recorded DVDs and CDs. Her customers prefer her because the quality of video and sound she sells is good. Keylas dream is to improve and enlarger her house.

loan.use: to buy film DVDs and music CDs and DVDs.

loan.name: Juan Jos

texts.es:
El seor Juan tiene 35 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida y tres hijos.
l trabaja la carpintera desde que tenia siente aos de edad, su pap fue quien le enseo, ya que toda su familia se desempea este oficio. Anteriormente don Juan trabajaba en la agricultura y viajaba a Estados Unidos, fue de esa manera que pudo comprar las herramientas para la carpintera. La madera para elaborar los muebles, los compra en otras comunidades y tambin en el mismo lugar donde vive.
En este momento Juan solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar madera, la cual es su principal materia prima y la otra parte la utilizara para completar el dinero que le falta, para comprar una cepilladora que sirve para desbastar la madera.
De esta manera l podr elaborar los muebles ms rpido con su nueva herramienta, ya que su taller tiene bastante demanda y eso le facilitara la entrega de los muebles a sus clientes y podr elaborarlos en mayor cantidad. Lo que le generara mayores ingresos para su familia. l ahorrara para darles a sus hijos el estudio y para construir una galera en donde guardara todas sus herramientas, para que no se mojen y as estn ms seguras y l podra trabajar bajo el sol y la lluvia sin problemas.
texts.en:
Juan, 35, lives with his companion and their three children. Hes worked in carpentry since he was seven years old. His father taught him since the entire family was in this occupation. Juan used to work in farming and would go to the United States and this is how he was able to buy his carpentry tools. He buys the wood he uses to make furniture in other communities but also in the place where he lives.
At present, Juan is asking Fundacin Campo for a loan to buy wood which is his prime raw material and the other part of it to make up the rest of the money he needs to buy a sander which will be very useful for smoothing the wood. In this way hell be able to make the furniture faster with his new tools since his shop has quite a bit of demand and this will make it easier for him to deliver the furniture to his customers and to make them in larger quantities which will generate higher income for his family. He will save up to provide his children with an education and to build a covered storage area to keep his tools so that they wont get wet and will be more secure and allow him to work either in sunshine or during the rain problem free.

loan.use: to buy lumber to make furniture and to buy a sander.

loan.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Alfonso tiene 61 aos, es un hombre sencillo y trabajador, su actividad es brindar el servicio de venta de repuestos de vehculos y reparacin. Hace ms de 15 aos, que lleva dedicndose a este medio de vida fue con este medio de vida que les pudo proporcionar a sus hijos alimento, comida y vestimenta pues todava tiene 1 hijo de 19 aos a su cargo. A pesar de los problemas de salud que atraviesa como es problemas en la columna esto no lo desanima para seguir adelante con su negocio. Este crdito es para la compra de caja de cambios, motores, parachoques, motores de arranque entre otros.
texts.en: Alfonso, 61, is an unassuming, hardworking man. He sells vehicle spare parts and repairs vehicles. Hes been in this line of work for over 15 years and the business has made it possible for him to provide food and clothing for his children; he still has a 19-year-old son in his care. Despite the health problems hes currently undergoing, like problems with his spinal column, hes not discouraged to continue with his business. This loan is to buy a transmission box, engines, shock absorbers and starters, among others.

loan.use: to buy car engine parts.

loan.name: Lucila Teresa

texts.es: Lucila Teresa tiene 42 aos, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. desde hace mas de 6 aos que tiene este negocio, la necesidad de proveerle ingresos a su familia ha hecho que ella busque la forma de tener este trabajo ella se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general, ella ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante. El crdito es para la compra de ropa en general, cosmticos, calzado, cremas, tratamientos, shampoo entre otros. Su gran meta es poder terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en: Lucila Teresa, 42, has two minor children in her care. Shes had her business for over six years. The need to provide family income motivated her to find a way of earning a way of living. She peddles general merchandise. This loan is to buy clothing in general, cosmetics, footwear, creams, treatments and shampoo, among others. Her great goal is to be able to finish building her house.

loan.use: to buy clothing, cosmetics, footwear, creams, treatments and shampoo, among others.

loan.name: Amador Group

texts.es: El grupo Amador lo conforman tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la seora Dina del Socorro quien vende ropa por encargo y con el crdito compra de mercadera en especial por la fechas hay muchos encargos. Las otras integrantes son Gloria Mara quien vende ropa desde hace 5 aos y Janeth del Carmen vende ropa y joyas desde hace 2 aos.
texts.en:
The Amador group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial women. One of them is Dina del Socorro who sells clothes to order. She will use her loan to buy merchandise as she has a lot of orders at this time of year.
The other members of the group are Gloria Mara, who has been selling clothes for five years, and Janeth del Carmen, who has been selling clothes and jewelry for two years.

loan.use: to buy merchandise (shirts, blouses, pants, etc.)

loan.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 36 aos es una mujer alegre. Ella vive junto a Juan, su esposo desde hace 18 aos. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Rudy, Rene y ngela; a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el barrio de Chilca. Para el futuro de sus hijos, ella ayuda a su esposo en los gastos del hogar: los dos tenemos que trabajar, porque no alcanza el dinero, menciona con optimismo. Ya que comenz hace algunos aos a trabajar en la compra y venta de granos verdes y verduras, en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad y Lima, la capital del pas. Asimismo su esposo, trabaja como albail en construccin de casas, segn cuenta percibe una ganancia de 1500 soles mensuales, como mnimo; todo depende de los contratos, afirma. Adems, los dos se dedican a la siembra de papa, olluco y maz en sus terrenos agrcolas, que se ubican en la ciudad de Pampas, donde viajan cada vez que puedan, pues siempre estn al cuidado de su familia que es su razn de progreso. Este es el cuarto crdito con MFP y se siente desarrollada, pues tiene al aliado perfecto para sus objetivos. Adems agradece el apoyo de todos ustedes, prometiendo ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. La casa de Carmen no cuenta con bao propio, por ello de recibir su apoyo, invertirn el dinero solicitado en la compra de los materiales para construir un bao fuerte y de calidad.
texts.en:
36-year-old Carmen is a cheerful woman. She lives together with Juan, her husband of 18 years. The couple have three children, Rudy, Rene and ngela, who they care for in their own home, which is located in Chilca neighborhood.
For the future of their children, Carmen helps her husband with the household expenses. "We both have to work because the money doesn't stretch far enough", she says with optimism. Some years ago, Carmen started work buying and selling green grains and vegetables in the wholesale market in her town and in Lima, the capital of Peru. Carmen's husband works as a builder, building houses. She says that he makes a minimum of 1,500 soles profit a month. "It all depends on contracts" she says. In addition, the two of them also grow potatoes, 'olluco' (a native tuber) and corn on their farmland which is located in the town of Pampas. They travel there whenever they can. They are always caring for their family which is their reason for making progress.
This is Carmen's fourth loan from MFP and she feels happy because she has the perfect ally in achieving her goals. She is also grateful for your support and pledges to make her loan repayments punctually. Carmen's house does not have its own bathroom and so, with your support, she will invest the money she has requested in buying supplies in order to build a strong, good-quality bathroom.

loan.use: to buy construction supplies for building a bathroom

loan.name: Felipa Isabel

texts.es: La seora Felipa tiene 36 aos de edad y se dedica a la venta de carne asada, su negocio esta cerca de la parada de buses del mercado municipal y los principales clientes son las personas que viajan frecuentemente, este negocio es rentable y le genera ganancias. muchos de sus clientes la prefieren por la forma en que condimenta la carne, le da un buen sabor, ademas que su negocio luce limpio. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de comida para la preparacion de sus platos de carne asada. la meta de Felipa es mejorar su negocio de manera que pueda cubrir con todos los pedidos de sus clientes y asi trabajar de manera eficiente.
texts.en:
Felipa is 36 years old and sells barbecued meat. Her business is located near the bus stop at the town market and her main customers are people who travel frequently. This business is profitable and makes her money.
Many of Felipa's customers are loyal to her business because of the way she seasons her meat, making it taste good, and also because her business is clean.
Felipa will use her loan to buy food in order to prepare her barbecued meat dishes. Her goal is to improve her business so that she can cover all the orders her customers make and thereby work efficiently.

loan.use: to buy beef, pork, chicken, tomatoes, green chilis, onion, lemon, tortillas, soft drinks, salt, spices, charcoal, matches and water

loan.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo, de 27 aos es un hombre alegre. Vive en compaa de Noemi, su esposa desde hace 9 aos. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Joel y Jocelyn, a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo de Huaytacorral. A diferencia de los dems agricultores, l cuenta con terrenos propios, que le fueron heredados por su madre. Son 4 hectreas de terrenos agrcolas, donde siembra papa, maca y cebada en gran cantidad. Ya tiene 9 aos de experiencia en la agricultura y lo que ms le gusta son las temporadas de cosecha, pues ve como el tiempo de esfuerzo y trabajo dan fruto. Adems ya cuenta con clientes fijos, quienes le comprar a buen precio los alimentos maduros que produce. Como siembra una vez al ao, comparte su actividad con la crianza de vacas, que producen leche fresca, que vende a los pobladores de su localidad. Ahora tendr una becerrita, pues una de sus vacas est preada. Desea para su futuro tener ms animales y mejorar la calidad de sus cosechas, de esa manera obtendr un dinero extra. l pertenece al grupo solidario Los ngeles y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Wilfredo de recibir su apoyo, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 kilos de semilla de maca y si el dinero le alcanza, pagar a los peones que le ayuden a voltear la tierra para su prxima siembra.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 27, is a cheerful man. He lives with Noem, his wife of nine years. They have two children: Joel and Jocelyn. They care for them in their own house located in Huaytacorral. Unlike other farmers, he owns his land which was passed down to him by his mother. Its four hectares of farmland where he grows potatoes, maca root and barley in large quantities. He has nine years experience in farming and what he likes is harvest season because he sees the fruits of his labors. He has steady customers who pay good prices for the mature foodstuffs he produces.
Because he plants just once a year, he also raises cows that produce fresh milk that he sells to local residents. He will soon have a calf because one of his cows is pregnant. In the future, hed like to have more animals and to improve the quality of his crops to obtain extra money.
He belongs to the Los ngeles communal bank and this is the first MFP loan where he hopes to have support from all of you to continue with his objectives. He promises to be punctual with his installment payments. If Wilfredo were to receive your support, hell use the requested funds to buy three kilograms of maca root seeds and if theres enough money hell pay day laborers to help him till the soil for his next planting.

loan.use: to buy maca root seeds and to hire day workers.

loan.name: Manuel De La Cruz

texts.es:
Manuel De La Cruz tiene 57 aos de edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de treinticuatro, veintiocho, veintisis aos de edad en el cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz.
Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte,fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda para poder cambiar y tener un buen rendimiento de los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia y negocio. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueo es poder mejorar el estado econmico para poder ayudar a los dos nietos que tiene para que puedan culminar los estudios.
En los tiempos libres le gusta trabajar, hacer deporte y disfrutar en compaa de los nietos que tiene.
texts.en:
Manuel De La Cruz, 57, is married and has three children. He lives with his wife and children who are 34, 28 and 26 years of age in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish that belongs to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Manuel farms corn, rice and beans. His purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Hes asking for the loan to buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed poison to keep his crops in good condition.
The loan will be of much help to change and have good income produced for his familys and his business wellbeing.
The challenges he faces are frequent: competition and pests. His dream is to be able to improve his economic state to help his two grandchildren finish their schooling. In his free time he enjoys working, playing sports and enjoying the company of his grandchildren.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Jairon Aurelio

texts.es:
Jairon Aurelio tiene treintaidos aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de siete y cuatro aos de edad en el Cantn Ventanas provincia de los Ros.
LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz.
Jairon se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio.
El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda para poder cambiar y tener un buen rendimiento de los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia y negocio.
Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo es poder mejorar el estado econmico para poder ayudar a los hijos para que culminen los estudios.
En los tiempos libres le gusta viajar en moto y practicar la mecnica automotriz.
texts.en:
Jairon Aurelio, 32, is in a common law relationship and has two children. He lives with his wife and children who are 7 and 4 years of age in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish that belongs to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Jairon farms corn, rice and beans. His purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Hes asking for the loan to buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed poison to keep his crops in good condition.
The loan will be of much help to change and have good income produced for his familys and his business wellbeing.
The challenges he faces are frequent: competition and pests. His dream is to be able to improve his economic state to help his children finish their schooling. In his free time he enjoys riding his motorcycle and to do auto mechanics.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El seor Julio tiene 48 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida.
l se dedica desde hace dos aos a la venta de mariscos, junto con su compaera de vida decidieron emprender este negocio, debido a la necesidad de obtener ingresos para subsistir.
Don julio y su compaera de vida compran pescado y camarones en un puerto del pas, cada ocho das, ellos preparan sus hieleras con suficiente hielo y depositan ah 50 libras de camarones y 50 libras de pescado. Ellos compran directamente a los pescadores, por lo que les queda un buen margen de ganancia.
l solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar ms cantidad de pescado y camarones, ya que los venden a un buen precio y muy rpido, debido a que han buscado mercado en la zona norte del pas donde los pescados y camarones son muy escasos. Para ir a vender ellos toman hasta tres autobuses con su mercadera y les lleva un da entero para vender su mercadera.
Don Julio ve en el negocio de mariscos una fuente de ingresos bastante buena, pero que al mismo tiempo requiere de mucho sacrificio, por lo que piensa ahorrar de los ingresos que obtenga y poder comprarse un carro y de esta forma tener su propio medio de transporte y vender ms rpido sus mariscos.
texts.en:
Julio, 48, lives with his life companion. Hes been selling seafood for the last two years. He and his life companion decided to go into this business together because of the need to earn income to subsist. Julio and his life companion buy fish and shrimp in one of the countrys ports every week. They prepare their coolers with enough ice and place 50 pounds of shrimp and 50 pounds of fish in them. They buy directly from the fishermen so they earn a good profit margin.
He is asking Fundacin Campo for a loan to buy larger amounts of fish and shrimp because they sell it quickly and at a good price because theyve staked out a market in the north of the country where fish and shrimp are scarce. To go sell there they take up to three buses with their merchandise and it takes an entire day to sell their merchandise.
Julio sees the seafood selling business as quite a good source of income but at the same time it requires much sacrifice so he plans to save up some of the income he earns to be able to buy himself a car to have his own means of transportation and sell his seafood faster.

loan.use: to buy more fish and shrimp.

loan.name: Rosalia Epifania

texts.es: Rosalia Epifania tiene treinta aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de ocho y cinco aos de edad. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Rosalia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque va ha poder trabajar y por ello va ha mejorar la situacin econmica para bienestar de la familia y negocio. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo es poder mejorar los cultivos y con la venta de los productos poder comprar una casa para vivir con la familia y mejorar los ingresos. En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar msica.
texts.en:
Rosala Epifania, 30, is in a common law relationship and has two children. She lives with her husband and children who are 8 and 5 years of age in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish that belongs to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Rosala farms corn, rice and beans. Her purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Shes asking for the loan to buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed poison to keep her crops in good condition to later sell them at good prices.
The loan will be of much help to change and have good income produced for her familys and her business wellbeing.
The challenges she faces are frequent: competition, pests and crop diseases. Her dream is to be able to improve her crops and use profits from sales to be able to buy a house to live in with her family and to improve income. In her free time she likes to listen to music.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Mujeres Divina 2 & 3 Group

texts.es:
Tina es L. coordinadora del Grupo Mujeres divina 2 & 3. Su familia est compuesta por 4 hijos y su pareja sentimental. Su grupo se encuentra ubicado en una zona D. muy escasos recursos situada al noreste D. L. ciudad D. Santo Domingo. Los miembros D. este grupo se dedican a L. venta D. diferentes artculos como: Ropas, cosmticos, calzados, salones D. belleza, tienda D. comestibles, entre otros.
Tina est muy emocionada D. recibir su tercer prstamo en Esperanza Internacional, luego D. haber pagado sus cuotas puntuales y haber invertido sus prstamos y ganancias en su negocio, Tina empez su negocio con un pequeo capital y luego tomo su primer prstamo con el cual inici a vender golosinas, con el tiempo y su anterior prstamo, expandi su negocio a un pequeo Colmado, el cual es una pequea tienda D. comestible, donD. sus vecinos asisten para comprar los productos D. primera necesidad para sus comidas diarias; invertir este prestamos en L. compra D.: un saco D. arroz, habichuelas, aceite, productos enlatados, azcar, entre otros.
A Tina le encanta negociar y nos dice que su reto mas difcil era su condicin econmica antes D. poner su negocio, actualmente se siente un poco estable y en miras a seguir expandiendo su negocio. Su sueo para el futuro es ayudar a sus hijos a salir adelante, educarlos y proveerles lo necesario para su crecimiento.
texts.en:
Tina is the coordinator of the 'Mujeres Divina 2 & 3' group. Her family consists of her four children and her partner. Her group is located in a very poor area in the north-east of the city of Santo Domingo. Some of the members of this group work selling different goods such as clothes, cosmetics and footwear. Others run beauty salons, grocery stores etc.
Tina is very excited to be receiving her third loan from Esperanza Internacional, having maD. her previous loan repayments on time and having invested her loans and profits in her business. Tina started her business with a small amount of capital and then took out her first loan and used it to start selling candies. She used her last loan to expand her business and turn it into a small grocery store where her neighbors come to buy the basic products they need for their daily meals. Tina will invest this loan in buying a sack of rice, beans, oil, canned goods, sugar, etc.
Tina enjoys being in business and tells us that her biggest challenge was her financial situation before she set up her business. She currently feels pretty stable and plans to continue expanding her business. Her dream for the future is to help her children get ahead in life. She would like to educate them and proviD. them with what they need to grow.

loan.use: to buy sugar, rice, oil, beans, canned goods, etc.

loan.name: Jacinto Rufino

texts.es:
Jacinto Rufino tiene 56 aos de edad vive en unin libre no tiene hijos vive con la esposa en el Cantn ventanas provincia de los Ros.
LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Jacinto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol, caf, cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque va a invertir en la agricultura y le va a generar ganancias. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo es poder contar con salud y seguir trabajando en la agricultura y seguir mejorando los ingresos. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte como indor futbol, gallos.
texts.en:
Jacinto Rufino is 56 years old. He lives with his common-law wife in Ventanas canton, in Los Ros province. He does not have any children.
The San Nicolas community bank is located in San Nicols, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn.
Jacinto is a farmer who grows corn, rice, beans, coffee and cacao. He makes his purchases and sales in San Jacinto. He is requesting this loan to invest in his farming. He will buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, Matamonte (a herbicide), fertilizers and weedkiller so that he can keep his crops in good condition.
This loan will be very helpful to Jacinto because he will invest it in his farming which will make him profits.
The challenges that Jacinto frequently faces are competition, pests and crop diseases. His dream is to enjoy good health, keep farming and continue improving his income.
In his free time, Jacinto enjoys taking part in sports such as indoor soccer and cockfighting.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, Matamonte (herbicide), fertilizers and weedkiller

loan.name: Maribel Alexandra

texts.es: Maribel Alexandra tiene treinticuatro aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de siete y cinco aos de edad en el cantn Ventanas provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Maribel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr comprar los insumos agrcolas sin ningn tipo de problema. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos es no tener deudas y poder comprar una casa para poder vivir cmodamente y un carro para transportar los productos. En los tiempos libres le gusta jugar pelota, coser y tratar de pasar mucho tiempo con los hijos.
texts.en:
Maribel Alexandra is 34 years old and is in a common-law marriage. She lives with her husband and their two children, ages 7 and 5, in the Ventanas canton in the province of Ros. The communal bank San Nicolas is located in the San Nicols precinct and the Puerto Pechiche parish in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of this bank work in agriculture and plant short cycle crops such as corn.
Maribel works in agriculture and grows corn, rice, and beans. She does her buying and selling in San Jacinto. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte [an herbicide], fertilizers, and weedkillers to keep her crops in good condition and thus, sell them for a good price. The loan will be a great help to her as she will be able to buy the agricultural supplies without any problems. The challenges that she frequently faces are: competition, insects, and crop diseases. Her dream for the next 5 years is to not have any debt and to be able to buy a house, where she can live comfortably, and a car to transport her products. In her free time, she likes to play ball, sew and try to spend a lot of time with her children.

loan.use: buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte [an herbicide], fertilizers, and weedkillers.

loan.name: German Julio

texts.es:
German Julio tiene 55 aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 33 y 29 aos de edad en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz.
German se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio.
El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr invertir en la agricultura para aumentar la produccin. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos es comprarse una casa para vivir con la familia y un carro para transportar los productos. En los tiempos libres le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
German Julio is 55 years old and lives with his common-law wife. He has two children. He lives with his wife and his 33-year-old and 29 year old sons in Ventanas canton, in Los Ros province.
The San Nicolas community bank is located in San Nicols, in Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn.
German is a farmer who grows corn, rice and beans. He makes his purchases and sales in San Jacinto. He is requesting this loan to invest in his farming, buying seeds and farming supplies such as urea, Matamonte (a herbicide), fertilizers and weedkillers, to keep his crops in good condition so that he can later sell them at a good price.
This loan will help German a lot as he will be able to invest in his farming and thereby increase his production. The frequent challenges that he faces are competition, pests and crop diseases. His dream for the next five years is to buy a house in which to live with his family and a car for transporting his produce.
In his free time, German enjoys playing indoor soccer.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, Matamonte (herbicide), fertilizers and weedkiller

loan.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Vilma tiene 40 aos es madre soltera de 2 hijos. Ella se dedica a una pulpera, empez el negocio realizando ventas de comestibles como pan, galletas entre otros productos, luego poco a poco fue vendiendo productos de consumo familiar como granos bsicos, azcar, harina, aceite, pan, galletas, entre otros productos. Ella comenta que su negocio es bien concurrido por sus clientes. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de artculos de primera necesidad como ser fideos, galletas, arroz, aceite, azcar, leche, huevos y otros productos necesarios para abastecer su local y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en: Vilma, 40, is a single mother of two children. She has a grocery store. She started the business selling foodstuffs like bread and cookies, among other items. Gradually she started selling basic family consumption items like sugar, flour, oil, bread and cookies, among other products. She comments that her business is well patronized by her customers. Shes asking for a loan to buy basic need items like noodles, cookies, rice, oil, sugar, milk, eggs and other products needed to stock her store and meet customer demand.

loan.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loan.name: Renee

texts.es: Renee, de 56 aos es una mujer alegre y luchadora. Vive en compaa de Tomas, su esposo desde hace 34 aos. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el asentamiento humano San Pedro. A pesar de su avanzada edad, esta mujer trabaja con dedicacin para mantener la economa de su casa. Desde muy joven comenz trabajando en sus terrenos agrcolas, se dedica a la siembra de papa y maz en grandes cantidades y ahora tiene una menor produccin, que le sirve para cubrir algunos gastos, pues comenta que ya no tiene la pujanza de antao. Pues su principal actividad es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una pequea bodega que se encuentra en su casa. Adems su esposo es albail, trabaja en la refaccin de casas, antes era cerrajero, tiene problemas en la vista por eso dejo el oficio, comenta. Con sus ganancias y las de ella, pueden solventar los gastos del hogar. Ahora desea expandir su negocio y as poder descansar, pues los aos pasan y ella quiere tener tranquilidad. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario San martn de Porres y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde est muy contenta, pues tiene el apoyo para salir adelante. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Renee de recibir su apoyo, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
