Renee, 56, is a cheerful, tenacious woman. She lives with Tomas, her husband of 34 years. They have three children that they care for in their own house located in San Pedro. Despite her advanced age this woman works with dedication to maintain her households economy. She started working in the fields when she was very young; she grew potatoes and corn in large amounts but now has a smaller production to cover some expenses because she says she no longer has the strength she once had.
Her main activity now is selling basic needs items in a small store she has at home. In addition, her husbands a bricklayer and works repairing houses. He used to be a cashier but due to problems with his eyesight he left that occupation, she comments. They are able to cover household expenses with her income. Shed like to expand the business so that she can rest because the years pass and she wants to have some peace and quiet.
Shes a member of the San Martn de Porres communal bank and this is the 4th loan with MFP where shes very happy because she has support to continue forward. She promises to be punctual with her payments. If Renee were to get your support, shell use the requested funds to buy basic need items to stock her grocery store.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Deisi Marilin De Los Angeles

texts.es: Deisi Marilin De Los ngeles tiene cuarentainueve aos de edad es casada tiene seis hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de treintaidos, treinta, veintiocho, veinticuatro, diecisiete y trece aos de edad en el Cantn ventanas Provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Deisi se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr comprar los insumos agrcolas sin ningn problema porque va a contar con dinero. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos es seguir mejorando y no tener deudas para poder comprar un carro. En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar msica, bailar y pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Deisi Marilin De Los ngeles, 49, is married and has six children. She lives with her husband and children who are 32, 30, 28, 24, 17 and 13 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Deisi grows corn, rice and beans. Her purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Shes asking for the loan to invest in farming. She will buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed killer to keep her crops in good condition and sell them at good prices. The loan will be very useful because she will buy farm supplies problem free because shell have the money.
The challenges she faces are very frequent. They are: competition, pests and crop diseases. Her dream for the next five years is to continue improving and be debt free so that she can buy a car. In her free time she enjoys listening to music, dancing and spending time with her family.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Nestor Alberto

texts.es: Nestor Alberto tiene treintainueve aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de trece, doce, cinco y tres aos en el Cantn ventanas Provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Nestor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr comprar los insumos agrcolas sin ningn problema porque va a contar con dinero. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos no tener deudas para poder solicitar otro crdito pero el monto ms alto. En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar jugar pelota, pescar.
texts.en:
Nestor Alberto, 39, is living in a common law relationship and has four children. He lives with his wife and children who are 13, 12, 5 and 3 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Nestor grows corn, rice and beans. His purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Hes asking for the loan to invest in farming. He will buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed killer to keep his crops in good condition and sell them at good prices. The loan will be very useful because he will buy farm supplies problem free because hell have the money.
The challenges he faces are very frequent. They are: competition, pests and crop diseases. His dream for the next five years is to be debt free in order to request another, larger loan. In his free time he enjoys playing ball and fishing.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Felipa Isabel

texts.es: Felipa Isabel tiene setentidos aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene cinco hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de treintaiocho, cuarenta, cuarentaiuno, cuarentaisiete, treintaicinco aos de edad en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Felipa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda para poder cambiar y tener un buen rendimiento de los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia y negocio. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueo es poder mejorar la estabilidad econmica para poder comprar una casa. En los tiempos libres le gusta cocinar y pasar mucho tiempo con la familia.
texts.en:
Felipa Isabel, 72, is living in a common law relationship and has five children. She lives with her husband and children who are 38, 40, 41, 47 and 35 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Felipa grows corn, rice and beans. Her purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Shes asking for the loan to invest in farming. She will buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed killer to keep her crops in good condition and sell them at good prices. The loan will be very useful to change and have good profits from her income for her familys and her business wellbeing.
The challenges she faces are very frequent. They are: competition and pests. Her dream is to be able to improve her economic stability in order to buy a house. In her free time she enjoys cooking and spending much time with her family.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Andres Epifanio

texts.es: El seor Andrs Epifanio tiene 41 aos tiene 2 hijos que estn bajo su cargo. El se dedica a la venta de combustible ya que l vive en una comarca donde este producto es muy solicitado. A pesar de tener competencia siempre est buscando el medio para atraer a sus clientes, Andrs tiene que viajar hasta la ciudad para comprar este producto y venderlo a precio accesible a sus mejores clientes. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de combustible. El siempre se ha preocupado por proporcionarle a su familia lo necesario. Andrs se encuentra contento por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Andrs Epifanio, 41, has two children in his care. He sells fuel, since he lives in an area where this product is in high demand. Despite being experienced, he is always looking for ways to attract his customers. Andrs has to go to the city to buy this product and sell it at an accessible price to his best customers.
The loan he is requesting is to buy fuel.
He has always been concerned about providing his family with the necessities. Andrs is happy about the loan and is committed to making the repayments.

loan.use: to buy fuel.

loan.name: Julian

texts.es: El Sr. Julin es un hombre trabajador y muy responsable , que vive de su trabajo, desafortunadamente su esposa muri hace un ao es por ello que actualmente vive solo con su hija y su nieto, ellos estn ampliando la vivienda haciendo un cuarto adicional y enseguida el cuarto de lavandera, este proyecto lo vienen realizando desde hace tiempo y solo les falta la losa y el enjarre, agradece el apoyo brindado para la realizacin de su proyecto ya que ve en el crdito la posibilidad de proporcionarle a su hija y a su nieto una excelente comodidad.
texts.en: Julin is a hardworking and very responsible man who lives off his work. Unfortunately, his wife died a year ago and that is why he is living alone with his daughter and grandson at this time. They are adding on to the house with an additional room and a laundry room. They have been doing this project for some time and they only hace to put in the floor and plastering the walls. He is thankful for the support offered to do this project since he sees in this loan the possibility of giving his daughter and grandson excellent comfort.

loan.use: to build a room in his house.

loan.name: Celsa Silvia

texts.es: Celsa Silvia tiene cincuenta aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de dieciocho, diecisis y veintin aos en el Cantn Ventanas provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Celsa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda para poder cambiar y tener un buen rendimiento de los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia y negocio. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueo es seguir produciendo y tener una mejor calidad de vida. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar deporte y jugar gallos.
texts.en:
Celsa Silvia is 50 years old and is in a common-law marriage with two children. She lives with her husband and children, ages 18, 16 and 21 in the Ventanas canton in the province of Ros. The communal bank San Nicols is located in the San Nicols precinct in the Puerto Pechiche parish in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of this bank work in agriculture growing short-cycle crops such as corn.
Celsa works in agriculture growing corn, rice, and beans. She does her buying and selling in San Jacinto. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte [an herbicide], fertilizers and weedkiller to keep her crops in good condition so she can sell them for a good price. The loan will help her greatly to change and have a good income for the well-being of her family and business. The challenges she frequently faces are: competition and insects. Her dream is to continue producing and to have a better quality of life. In her free time, she likes cockfighting and to practice sports.

loan.use: buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte [an herbicide], fertilizers and weedkiller.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to some home improvements.

loan.name: Segundo Ramon

texts.es: Segundo Ramon tiene setenta aos de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de cuarentaicuatro y cuarentaiuno aos de edad en el Cantn Ventanas provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Segundo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr comprar los insumos agrcolas sin ningn problema. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos es poder seguir trabajando y poder reunir para comprar una camioneta para transportar los productos para salir al pueblo a venderlos. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte y los gallos.
texts.en:
Segundo Ramn, 70, is single and has two children. He lives with his children who are 44 and 41 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Segundo grows corn, rice and beans. His purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Hes asking for the loan to invest in farming. He will buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed killer to keep his crops in good condition and sell them at good prices. The loan will be very useful because hell be able to buy his farm supplies problem free.
The challenges he faces are very frequent. They are: competition, pests and crop diseases. His dream for the next five years is to be able to continue working to save up enough to buy a pick-up truck to transport his products to town to be sold. In his free time he enjoys playing sports and cockfights.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: Ojo De Agua 1 Group

texts.es:
el grupo Ojo de Agua esta ubicado en la comunidad del Triunfo departamento de choluteca, dicho grupo esta intregrado por tres mujeres, las cuales se conocen desde hace mucho tiempo y han decidido formar dicho grupo para salir adelante con sus negocios y con sus familias, la cordinadora del grupo es la seora Fredys quien se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, ahi vende todo lo relacionado con la canasta basica. Fredys es madre de 4 hijas. Fredys en sus tiempos libres visita la iglesia.
Las otras dos integrantes del grupo son la Sra. Delia quien tambien tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion y la Sra. Cristina que vende refrescos y churros a los trabajadores de las empresas meloneras.
El credito lo utilizaran para la compra de abarroteria y refrescos. juntas trabajan duro para salir adelante.
texts.en:
The Ojo de Agua group is located in the community of Triunfo, Choluteca Department. This group is composed of three women who have known each other for a long time and have decided to form a group to get ahead with their businesses and families. The group coordinator is Fredys who sells daily consumption items. She has a home-based grocery store where she sells everything related to a familys basic needs. Fredys is the mother of four daughters. In her free time, Fredys goes to church.
The other two group members are Delia who also has a home-based grocery store and Cristina who sells refreshments and churros to employees at the melon processing plants. They will use the loan to buy groceries and refreshments. They all work hard together to get ahead.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: La Santa Cruz Group

texts.es:
Obdulia cuenta con 63 aos de edad, es soltera es comerciante de carnicera tambin vende tamales y pozole, ella invirti su prstamo en la compra de insumos que utiliza para elaborar tamales y pozole como son: maz, aceite, verduras, etc.
Obdulia pertenece al grupo la santa C. que est integrado por 10 mujeres las cuales todas cuenta con una actividad comerciante a continuacin son mencionadas:
Lorenza cuenta con 38 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende ropa lo cual invirti su prstamo en la compra de ropa nuevos modelos de blusas y pantalones.
Saida cuenta con 25 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos e invirti su prstamo en surtir refrescos de varios sabores.
Elizabeth cuenta 60 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende comida por las tardes e invirti su prstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para elaborar la comida como son: tortillas, verduras, aceite, pollo, etc.
Ma Flix cuenta 37 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende refrescos lo cual invirti su prstamo en la compra de refrescos, agua y jugos, etc.
Ma de Jess cuenta con 43 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende perfumes y cosmticos lo invirti su prstamo en la compra de cremas, perfumes, pinturas, labiales, etc.
Sonia cuenta con 36 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio de quesos e invirti su prstamo en los insumos que utiliza para preparar los quesos como son: leche, sal, etc.
Tania cuenta con 24 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio de ropa e invirti su prstamo en la compra de nuevos modelos de vestidos y blusas.
Margarita cuenta 34 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio vende abarrotes e invirti su prstamo en la compra de productos como son: leches, cremas, aceites, jabn, etc.
Nicolasa cuenta 53 aos de edad, ella se dedica al comercio de comida vende comida e invirti su prstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para elaborar la comida como son: aceites, verduras, carne, pollos, etc.
texts.en:
Obdulia, 63, is single and a meat merchant; she also sells tamales and pozole [corn-based soup]. She used her loan to buy ingredients needed to make tamales and pozole like corn, oil, vegetables, etc. Obdulia belongs to the La Santa C. group which consists of 10 women each with her own commercial activity. They are:
Lorenza, 38, who sells clothes and used the loan to buy new styles of pants and blouses; Saida, 25, who sells beverages and used the loan to stock up on beverages in assorted flavors; Elizabeth, 60, who sells food in the evenings and used the loan to buy ingredients like tortillas, vegetables, oil, chicken, etc.; Mara Flix, 37, who sells refreshments and used the loan to buy soft-drinks, water, juice, etc.; Mara de Jess, 43, who sells perfume and cosmetics and used the loan to buy creams, perfumes, nail polish, lipsticks, etc.; Sonia, 36, who sells cheese and used the loan to buy supplies to make cheese like milk, salt, etc.; Tania, 24, who sells clothes and used the loan to buy new styles of blouses and dresses; Margarita, 34, who sells groceries and used the loan to buy milk, cream, oil, soap, etc.; Nicolasa, 53, who sells food and used the loan to by ingredients she uses to prepare food like oil, vegetables, meat, chickens, etc.

loan.use: to buy tamale and pozole making ingredients.

loan.name: Walter Ufredo

texts.es: Walter Ufredo tiene treintaiocho aos de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con los padres y con el hijo de tres aos de edad en el Cantn ventanas provincia de los ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Walter se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque podr invertir en semillas de cacao y dar mantenimiento a la tierra y cultivos. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos seguir trabajando para poder mejorar la estabilidad econmica para comparar ms hectreas de terreno. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte el indor futbol y el juego de los gallos.
texts.en:
Walter Ufredo, 38, is single and has one son. He lives his parents and his son who is 3 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in Recinto San Nicols, Puerto Pechiche Parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn farmers.
Walter Ufredo grows corn, rice and beans. His purchases and sales take place in San Jacinto. Hes asking for the loan to invest in farming. He will buy seeds and farm supplies like urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizer and weed killer to keep his crops in good condition and sell them at good prices. The loan will be very useful because hell be able to buy cocoa bean seeds and provide maintenance to his fields and his crops.
The challenges he faces are very frequent. They are: competition, pests and crop diseases. His dream for the next five years is to be able to continue working to improve his economic stability and to buy more hectares of land. In his free time he enjoys playing Indor soccer and cockfights.

loan.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loan.name: G.s. Milagro De Jesus Group

texts.es: Maura Elena y Perfecta conforman el grupo solidario Milagro De Jess. Ellas son personas muy emprendedoras y disfrutan de este medio de vida. Perfecta se dedica a una pulpera, hace ms de 13 aos que tiene este negocio los esfuerzos constantes que realiza para obtener ingresos para su hogar. Ella se levanta todos los das desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 9 de la noche. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de granos bsicos, cremas, carnes, fsforos, sopas, enlatados, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Maura Elena and Perfecta make up the 'Milagro de Jess' community bank. They are very entrepreneurial people and they enjoy their work. Perfecta runs a grocery store. She has had this business for more than 13 years. She constantly works hard to make income for her household. She gets up every day at 7 o'clock in the morning and works until 9 o'clock at night. She is requesting this loan to buy basic grains, cream, meat, matches, soups, canned goods and other products.

loan.use: to buy basic grains, cream, meat, matches, soups, canned goods and other products

loan.name: Lus Ramon

texts.es:
El seor Lus tiene 70 aos de edad, es casado con cinco hijos.
l se dedica a la agricultura desde los 16 aos de edad, su pap fue quien le enseo a trabajar, ya que esta era la nica actividad que ellos desarrollaban.
Don Lus necesita de insumos, para que sus cultivos se puedan desarrollar, por lo que se traslada a la ciudad en busca de ellos, para llegar ah tiene que caminar a pie quince minutos hasta llegar a un lugar donde aborda un carro y se va en la palangana de este durante cuarenta minutos hasta llegar al lugar donde compra los insumos agrcolas.
l solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar: fertilizantes, herbicidas, insecticidas, entre otros. Con los cuales dar mantenimiento a tiempo a una manzana de maz (7000 metros cuadrados) que tiene sembrada. Con el prstamo el saldr a tiempo para no perder los frutos, y la produccin ser buena, con la que estara asegurando la alimentacin de su familia.
Don Lus, espera ampliar el rea de cultivo, para producir ms y por ende obtener mejores ingresos y poder dar a su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Luis is 70 years old and is married with 5 children. He has farmed since the age of 16. His father taught him this work, as it was the only work he knew. Luis needs supplies for his crops to develop. He must go to the city in search of them. It takes 15 minutes on foot to get to where he can board a car. Then it takes 40 minutes to get to the place where they sell farming supplies. He requests the loan from Fundacin Campo to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, and more, with which he will maintain an area of corn (7000 square meters) that he has planted. With the loan, he will be able to pick the fruit on time and the production will be good and he will be able to feed his family. Luis hopes to increase his crop area to produce more and get better income and be able to give his family everything they need.

loan.use: buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides, and other supplies needed to grow corn.

loan.name: Henry Mauricio

texts.es: Henry Mauricio tiene treinta y tres aos de edad vive en unin libre tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija de siete aos de edad en el cantn Ventanas provincia de los ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Henry se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda para adquirir los productos e insumos para preparar la tierra para sembrar. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos 5 aos es tener un buen estilo de vida. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Henry Mauricio, 33, lives in a common-law marriage and has a daughter. He lives with his wife and seven-year-old daughter in Ventanas canton, province of Los Ros.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in the San Nicols neighborhood, Puerto Pechiche parish, in Pueblo Viejo canton. This communal bank is devoted to short-cycle agriculture, growing corn.
Henry works in agriculture, growing corn, rice, and beans. He buys and sells in San Jacinto.
He is requesting the loan to invest in agriculture, to buy seeds and agricultural products like urea, brush killer, fertilizers, and weed killer to keep the crops in good condition and, later, to sell them for a good price.
The loan will be a big help in acquiring the products and ingredients to prepare the land for planting.
The challenges he frequently faces are competition, pests, and crop disease. His dream for the next five years is to have a good lifestyle.
In his free time he likes to play sports.

loan.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, brush killer, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loan.name: Las Margaritas Group

texts.es:
Adelfa cuenta 40 aos D. edad, es casada tiene 6 hijos los cuales 4 se encuentran estudiando, Mnica est cursando 5 grado D. primaria, Vctor 4 grado, citlali 3 grado y Alexis 3 grado D. preescolar, rumel solo tiene dos aos D. edad y tiene un bebe D. un mes que aun no tiene nombre, su esposo se llama Pedro se dedica al campo. ElL. se dedica al comercio D. pescadera lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. pescados elL. dice que el prstamo le ha beneficiado ya que es una ayuda que tiene para el gasto D. L. escueL. D. sus hijos.
Adelfa pertenece al grupo las margaritas D. el cual est integrado por 11 integrantes las cuales son puras mujeres que realizan una actividad comerciante a continuacin son mencionadas.
Silveria cuenta 51 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. pan lo cual invirti su prestamo en L. compra D. pan para vender.
Obdulia cuenta 55 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. productos D. abarrotes e invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. productos como son: aceite, detergentes, azcar, caf, refrescos, etc.
Norberta cuanta con 59 aos D. edad, se dedica al comercio D. productos D. abarrotes lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D.: aceites, galletas, azcar, huevos, leche, caf, etc.
Agustina cuenta con 61 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. pescadera lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. pescados.
Rosa cuenta 42 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. comida venD. comida lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. insumos para L. elaboracin D. comida como son: aceites, jitomate, verduras, carne, etc.
MarceL. cuenta con 57 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. productos D. abarrotes lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. productos como son: refrescos, jugos, agua, galletas, huevos, aceite, etc.
Lizbeth coral cuenta 20 aos D. edad, se dedica al comercio venD. ropa lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. ropa nuevos modelos D. blusas y faldas.
Mara Alejandra cuenta con 43 aos D. edad, se dedica al comercio venD. pan lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. pan para revender.
Victorina cuenta 35 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio D. comida lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. los insumos que utiliza para elaborar L. comida como es: aceite, verduras, carnes, etc.
Alba cuenta con 68 aos D. edad, elL. se dedica al comercio tiene una tienda D. abarrotes lo cual invirti su prstamo en L. compra D. productos como son: aceite, huevos, productos lcteos, etc.
texts.en:
Adelfa is 40 years old, married, and has 6 children, 4 of whom are in school. Mnica is in 5th graD., Vctor is in 4th graD., Citlali is in 3rd graD., Alexis is in the 3rd year of preschool, and Rumel is only 2 years old. She also has a 1-month old baby who has not yet been named. Her husband Pedro is a farmer. She has a retail fish business, and she used this loan to purchase fish. She says that this loan has been helpful to her because it frees up resources so that she can pay for the educational expenses of her children.
Adelfa belongs to the group "Las Margaritas," which has 11 members who are all women engaged in retail traD.; each of them is mentioned below:
Silveria, 51, has a business selling bread, and she used the loan to buy bread to sell.
Obdulia, 55, has a grocery store. She invested the loan in the purchase of products such as cooking oil, detergent, sugar, coffee, soft drinks, etc.
Norberta, 59, has a grocery store. She invested the loan in the purchase of products such as cooking oil, cookies, sugar, eggs, milk, coffee, etc.
Agustina, 61, has a business selling fish. She used the loan to buy fish to sell.
Rosa, 42, has a business selling food. She used the loan to buy supplies to make the food, including: cooking oil, tomatoes, vegetables and meat.
MarceL., 57, has a grocery store. She used the loan to buy soft drinks, juices, water, cookies, eggs, cooking oil, etc.
Lizbeth Coral, 20, has a business selling clothing. She used the loan to buy new styles of blouses and skirts to sell.
Mara Alejandra, 43, has a business selling bread. She used the loan to buy bread to resell.
Victorina, 35, has a business selling food. She invested her loan in supplies to make her dishes, including: cooking oil, vegetables and meat.
Alba, 68, has a grocery store. She invested her loan in the purchase of products including: cooking oil, eggs, dairy products, etc.

loan.use: to buy fish

loan.name: Paula Beatriz

texts.es: Paula Beatriz tiene cuarentaiocho aos de edad es soltera tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos de veintisis, catorce, diez, y ocho aos de edad en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros. LA VRC SAN NICOLAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Nicols, Parroquia puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantn Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maz. Paula se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz, frjol las compras y las ventas las realiza en san Jacinto. Solicita el Crdito para invertir en la agricultura, comprar semillas e insumos agrcolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos y posterior venderlos a un buen precio. El Crdito ser de mucha ayuda porque se va a sembrar ms y se va a obtener mejores utilidades. Los desafos que se le presenta muy frecuente son: la competencia, las plagas, enfermedades que se dan en los cultivos. El sueo para los prximos aos es seguir trabajando y mejorar la calidad de vida. En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte y jugar a los gallos.
texts.en:
Paula Beatriz is 48 years old. She is single, and has four children, aged 26, 14, 10, and 8. She lives with them in Ventanas Canton, in the Province of Los Ros.
The San Nicols communal bank is located in the San Nicols precinct, in Puerto Pechiche parish, which is part of the Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn.
Paula works in agriculture growing corn, rice and beans. She makes her purchases and sales in San Jacinto. She is requesting the loan to invest in her farming, buying seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizers, and weed killer to keep her crops in good condition and to be able to sell them later at a good price. The loan will be a great help for her, because she is going to increase her planting and gain more efficiency.
The challenges that she faces most frequently are: the competition, insect infestations, crop diseases. Her dream is to continue working for the next five years and to improve her quality of life.
In her free time she likes to play sports and cock fighting.

loan.use: to invest in her agriculture by buying seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, Matamonte brand herbicide, fertilizers and weedkiller.

loan.name: Hector

texts.es: El Sr. Hctor es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, que da con da a luchado por acondicionar su vivienda para poder brindarle a su familia un espacio cmodo donde puedan vivir, en este momento el requiere colocar vitropiso en su vivienda ya que con el que cuenta actualmente esta muy deteriorado, es por ello que acudi con nosotros para que lo apoyemos en la realizacin de su proyecto, agradece el apoyo brindado para hacer de su sueo realidad.
texts.en: Hctor is a very hardworking, responsible person who struggles daily to be able to furnish his house and provide his family with a comfortable place to live. At the moment he needs to install ceramic tile flooring because the current floor in his house is in poor condition. He, therefore, called upon us for support to carry out his project. Hes grateful for the support provided to make his dream a reality.

loan.use: to install ceramic tile flooring.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy pigs.

loan.name: Noche Mexicana Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Noche Mexicana, est conformado por las seoras Tita Gloria y Alicia va a comprar con su prstamo telas, hilos y aceites para las maquinas de coser para elaborar uniformes, la seora Celina va a comprar Topperware por mayoreo, la seora Mara del Rosario va a comprar zapatos por mayoreo, la seora Damariz Fabiola va a comprar forjas, limatones, limas, la seora Maribel va a comprar pollos para vender, la seora Yeni Isabel va a comprar cosmticos y ropa interior. La seora Maribel tiene 43 aos de edad, ella es casada tiene 3 hijos 2 mujeres y un varn, ella vende pollo asados al carbn, ella solicito su crdito para comprar pollos vivos, cacerolas, condimentos , ella inicio su negocio hace 2 aos, su esposo inicio el negocio, ella decidi independizase ahora ya tienes 2 negocios de pollos asados al carbn uno lo atiende su esposo y ella atiende el otro, su hija le ayuda en el negocio a asar los pollos, a ella le gusta atender amablemente a los clientes, su negocio es importante porque de ah se mantiene puede cubrir los gastos de su casa, a ella le gusta cocinar y atender bien a los clientes, ella ofrece a sus clientes pollos asados, tacos dorados y consom de pollo, ella se siente orgullosa cuando la gente est satisfecha con su comida, las ganancias del negocio las utiliza para volver a invertir y para ahorrar. Sus sueos y esperanzas son construir el 2. Piso de su casa que sus hijos tengan buen futuro, salud y educacin. Las integrantes del grupo le dan las gracias a Kiva y a Fundacin Realidad por su apoyo e inters de ayudarlos a seguir creciendo sus negocios.
texts.en:
This group is called Noche Mexicana and its members are Tita Gloria and Alicia who will use the loan to buy fabric, thread and oil for their sewing machines to make uniforms; Celina who will buy Tupperware at wholesale; Mara del Rosario who will buy shoes at wholesale; Damariz Fabiola who will buy forges, gross files and fine files; Maribel who will buy chickens to sell and Yeni Isabel who will buy cosmetics and underwear.
Maribel, 43, is married and has three children, two girls and one boy. She sells charcoal broiled chickens. She requested the loan to buy live chickens, pots and condiments. She started her business two years ago. Her husband started it and she decided to become independent and now has two charcoal broiled chicken businesses. Her husband runs one of them and she runs the other; her daughter helps her in the business. She likes to take care of her customers with kindness.
Her business is important because she supports herself and covers household expenses with it. She likes to cook and take care of her customers well. She offers customers broiled chickens, crisp fried tacos and chicken consomm. She feels proud when people are satisfied with her food. Profits form the business are used to reinvest in it and for savings. Her dreams and hopes are to build a second story on her house, that her children have a better future, good health and an education.
The group members thank Kiva and Fundacin Realidad for their support and interest in helping them continue to grow in business.

loan.use: to buy live chickens, condiments, cooking utensils, pots and spoons.

loan.name: Irma Deisy

texts.es: la sra. Irma tiene 48 aos de edad y vive en la comunidad de el Triunfo en el departamento de Choluteca, Irma se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, tiene muchos clientes ya que sus precios son bajos y sus productos son de buena calidad. Irma es madre de 6 hijas, todas son profesionales. Irma tiene la ayuda de su esposo, juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante. en sus tiempos libres visitan la iglesia. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio.
texts.en: Irma, 48, lives in the community of El Triunfo, Choluteca Department. She sells items of popular consumption. She has a grocery store located in her home. She has many customers because her prices are low and her products are good quality. Irma is the mother of six children all of which are professionals. Irma helps her husband and together they work hard to get ahead. In their free time they go to church. She will use the loan to buy groceries to stock her store.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Cornelio

texts.es: Cornelio, de 29 aos es un padre amoroso. Vive en el anexo Huaytacorral, junto a Alicia, su esposa desde hace 5 aos. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Elmer y Brayan, a los que cuidan en su casa propia. En la comunidad de Acostambo, donde vive Cornelio, todos se dedican a la agricultura. Cuando muy joven l adquiri 7 hectreas de terrenos agrcolas, que pertenecen a los pobladores. Con ello pudo comenzar a sembrar maca y papa en grandes cantidades. Ya tienen 7 aos de experiencia en la venta de sus cosechas, segn cuenta le va muy bien pues, cada 8 meses que es la siembra. Los comerciantes de la ciudad de Huancayo, compran sus alimentos maduros. Pero lo que ms le gusta a l es, lavar la maca madura en el ro canchas, donde los compradores le ofrecen mayor precio por el producto. Ahora desea juntar el capital necesario para tener cada ao, ms cantidad de produccin. l pertenece al grupo solidario Los ngeles y este es el primer crdito con MFP, donde agradece la oportunidad de progreso que le ofrecen. Adems promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Cornelio de recibir su apoyo, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de 8 kilos de semilla de maca y el pago al personal que voltear la tierra para el prximo sembro.
texts.en:
Cornelio, 29, is a loving father. He lives in Huaytacorral with Alicia, his wife of five years. They have two children: Elmer and Brayan who they raise in their own house. In the community of Acostambo where Cornelio lives everyone farms. While still young he acquired 7 hectares of farmland that belong to the townsfolk. With it he was able to start planting maca root and potatoes in large amounts. He has 7 years experience selling crops and according to him he does very well at each 8 month harvest. Merchants in the city of Huancayo buy his mature foodstuffs. But what he likes best is washing the mature maca root in the Canchas River where buyers offer the highest price for the product. Now, he wants to amass enough capital so that each year he will have more production.
He belongs to the Los ngeles communal bank and this is the first loan with MFP where hes grateful for the opportunity to progress they offer. He promises to be punctual with his installment payments. If Cornelio were to receive your support he will invest the money in the purchase of 8 kilograms of maca root seed and to pay labor costs for the staff that will till the soil for the next planting.

loan.use: to buy 8 kilograms of maca root seeds ant to hire day workers.

loan.name: Flor De Pino Group

texts.es: El grupo Flor de Pino est conformado por cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora del grupo es la seora Paula quien se dedica a la venta de cosmticos desde hace 4 aos y trabaja en un restaurante de Masaya. Ella est casada, trabaja junto a su esposo en el mismo restaurante l es cocinero y tiene un nio. Con el crdito comprara cremas y cosmticos. Las otras integrantes son Edda del Carmen quien vende ropa, Sandra del Carmen tiene una pulpera desde hace 4 aos y Rosibel vende ropa usada.
texts.en:
The Flor de Pino group is made up of four hard-working and entrepreneurial people. The group coordinator is Paula, who has worked selling cosmetics for 4 years. She also works in a restaurant in Masaya.
She is married, and works with her husband in the restaurant. They have one child. With the loan she will buy creams and cosmetics. The other group memebrs are Edda del Carmen, who sells clothing, Sandra del Carmen, who has had a small store for four years, and Rosibel who sells used clothes.

loan.use: to buy used clothing to sell

loan.name: Julia Mercedes

texts.es: Julia Mercedes tiene 48 es una persona muy luchadora. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos bsicos, desde hace ms de 10 aos que tiene este medio de vida. Este negocio lo inicio en su vivienda, pues con la ayuda de su esposo ya que l trabaja en una empresa y ella ofrece sus productos a estos trabajadores y obtiene el pago cada quincena, que ella misma se encarga de recoger. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, pinol entre otros.
texts.en:
Julia Mercedes, 48, is a real fighter. She has been making a living selling basic crops for more than ten years. She started this business in her home with the help of her husband. He works in a business and she offers her products to these workers, and picks up the payment for her goods every two weeks.
The purpose of the loan is to buy rice, beans, oil, "pinol" (toasted corn flour and a drink made from it), and other products.

loan.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, "pinol," and other products.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy cosmetics.

loan.name: Los Hernandez Group

texts.es: El grupo los Hernndez lo conforman tres personas trabajadora y emprendedoras una de ellas es Darling del Socorro quien se dedica a la venta de ropa usa y nueva desde hace 5 aos. Ella con el crdito comprar mercadera pantalones, blusas y ropa de nio. Las otros integrantes son Leonardo quien vende pan y Mayra Ernestina quien vende ropa usada desde hace 3 aos.
texts.en: The Los Hernndez group es composed of three hardworking, enterprising people. One of them is Darling del Socorro who has been selling new and used clothes for five years. She will use her loan to buy merchandise like pants, blouses and childrens clothes. The other group members are Leonardo who sells bread and Mayra Ernestina who has sold used clothes for three years.

loan.use: to buy pants, blouses and children's clothes.

loan.name: Nuevo Progreso 3, 4 & 8 Group

texts.es:
Mercedes es una de los miembros del Grupo Nuevo Progreso 3, 4 & 8; compuesto por 15 mujeres empresarias, dedicadas a diferentes actividades de negocio desde ventas miscelneas, de comestibles, salones de belleza, ventas de calzados, frutas y vegetales, entre otros. Sus ventas son realizadas en su comunidad y otras zonas cercanas, ubicada al noreste de la ciudad de Santo Domingo, donde cada da, estas microempresarias buscan mejorar su calidad de vida.
Mercedes est recibiendo su sptimo prstamo con Esperanza Internacional, ya hace casi 4 aos que se uni al programa, con la finalidad de inyectar capital a su negocio, el cual consiste en la venta de frutas, verduras y vegetales al por mayor y detalles. Mercedes vende a diferentes negocios y familias. Este prstamo ser utilizado para la compra de pltanos, yuca, frutas y vegetales diversos.
Mercedes y su grupo estn muy emocionados de recibir el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes, es una ayuda a alcanzar sus sueos. Mercedes desea poder tener un negocio bien establecido, con el cual pueda apoyar su familia, y realizar cambios profundos en su vida, poder tener una buena vivienda y una condicin econmica bien estable.
texts.en:
Mercedes is one of the members of the Grupo Nuevo Progress (New Progress Group) 3, 4 & 8. The group is made up of 15 businesswomen who run a variety of businesses from sales, cosmetics, beauty salons, shoe sales, fruit and vegetables sales, and others. They sell their wares in their community and in other nearby areas northeast of the capital city Santo Domingo. Every day these small businesswomen work to improve their quality of life.
Mercedes is receiving her seventh loan from Esperanza Internacional (Hope International). It has been nearly four years since she started the program. She will use the loan for operating capital for her business selling fruits and vegetables. She sells her goods wholesale and to individuals. She sells to various businesses and families. She will purchase plantains, yucca, fruits, and vegetables with the loan.
Mercedes and her group are excited to receive your support; your support will help them reach their dreams. Mercedes hopes to have an established business which will allow her to support her family and make profound changes in her life like having a good home and stable economic situation.

loan.use: Para comprar Verduras, Vegetales y frutas

loan.name: Cristian Enrique

texts.es: Christian Enrique es un hombre emprendedor de 32aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Tiene ms de 2 aos de poseerla, su actividad la realiza de manera ambulante fue con el paso del tiempo que l aprendi a tratar a sus clientes y adems que es su principal medio de vida para que el obtuviera un medio de ingreso para mantener a su familia. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de bolsos, cremas tratamientos, shampoo, sabanas, prenda de oro laminado y plata adems ropa en general.
texts.en: Christian Enrique is an enterprising, 32-year-old man. He sells general merchandise. Hes had the business for over two years. Hes a street vendor. In time, he learned how to treat his customers since this is his main source of income for family support. He requests the loan to buy purses, creams, treatments, shampoo, sheets, laminated gold and silver jewelry items and clothing in general.

loan.use: to buy purses, creams, treatments, shampoo, sheets, laminated gold and silver jewelry items and clothing in general.

loan.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: la sra. Maria tiene 56 aos de edad, es madre de 3 hijos y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pequea pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, Maria es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada a su negocio. sus hijos estan estudiando en el centro educativo de su comunidad, su esposo es albail, se dedica a la construccion. en sus tiempos libres visitan la iglesia. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio, en estos momentos no tiene capital suficiente para comprar la abarroteria y las exigencias de sus clientes son mayores.
texts.en: Mara, 56, is the mother of three children. Shes a grocer. She has a home-based grocery store. Mara is an enterprising woman who is devoted to her store. Her children are studying in a local school and her husband is a bricklayer working in construction. In their free time they go to church. She will use the loan to buy groceries to stock her store. She currently lacks sufficient capital to buy groceries and customer demand is higher.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: La Prueba Group

texts.es: El grupo la Prueba lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras una de ellas es la seora Zonia Esperanza quien vende verduras desde hace 15 aos y con el crdito comprara lechuga, pltanos, chiltoma y tomates. Las otras integrantes son Simona del Carmen quien se dedica a hacer y vender raspados (dulce que consiste en hielo cubierto con dulces) desde hace 7 aos, Mara Auxiliadora se dedica a la venta de tortilla, y Ruth del Carmen vende frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
The La Prueba group es composed of four hard working people. One of them is Zonia Esperanza who has sold vegetables for 15 years and will use the loan to buy lettuce, bananas, peppers and tomatoes.
The other group members are Simona del Carmen who has made and sold raspados (shaved ice covered in sweet syrup) for 7 years, Mara Auxiliadora who sells tortillas and Ruth del Carmen who sells fruit and vegetables.

loan.use: to purchase fruit and vegetables.

loan.name: Cecilia Ignacia

texts.es: Cecilia Ignacia tiene 55 aos, su actividad es una pulpera que administra desde hace 10 aos. Cecilia es una mujer luchadora siempre ha demostrado que le preocupa pagar sus cuotas en tiempo y forma. Ella ofrece los productos de grano bsicos, papel higinico, calzado, bolsos, cremas, tratamientos, sal, huevos, leche entre otros productos. Ella inicia su labor desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 9 de la noche que sus clientes llegan a comprar.
texts.en:
Cecilia Ignacia is 55 years old. She has had a grocery store for ten years. Cecilia is a fighter who has always seen to it that she makes her loan payments on time.
She sells basic grains, toilet paper, shoes, bags, creams, treatments, milk, eggs, milk and other products. She starts work at 7:00 AM every morning and works until 9:00 PM in the evening in order to be available to her clients.

loan.use: to buy basic grains, toilet paper, shoes, bags, creams, treatments, milk, eggs, milk and other products

loan.name: Sonia Priscila

texts.es:
La Seora. Sonia es socia del banco comunal Corazn de Jess, vive por la parroquia del Valle (Cuenca), lugar de hermosos paisajes, su gente es muy amable, gentil y trabajadora, se dedican al comercio, cra de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades.
La Seora. Sonia tiene 21 aos, es casada y fruto de su unin conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 3 aos de edad. Su esposo labora como carpintero, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Ella se dedica al cuidado de su hogar y de su hijo quien se encuentra a un pequeo, como pasa en casa va a comenzar el negocio de cra y venta de cerdos, y es para esto que pide el crdito, va a comprar cerdos para iniciar esta actividad.
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su tercer crdito y est muy contenta por la ayuda que le da la institucin.
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the Corazn de Jess communal bank. She lives in del Valle (Cuenca) parish, an area of beautiful scenery, friendly, gentile, and hard-working people who work in trade, raising animals, and farming. Many work in different jobs in the city.
Sonia is 21, married and she has a 3-year old son. Her husband is a carpenter and they live in a rented house because they dont have their own yet.
She is a housewife and takes care of her small son. Since she is at home, she is going to start a business of raising and selling pigs. That is why she is requesting a loan-to buy pigs to start her business.
The communal bank is on its third loan cycle and she is very happy with the help that the institution gives. Her goal is to have her own house.

loan.use: to buy pigs

loan.name: Dionicia

texts.es: La seora Dionicia es cliente antigua que esta retornando despus de un pequeo descanso de cuatro meses, es una de nuestras clientes bastante puntuales en sus pagos, ella vive en la zona de Cota Cota, su actividad es la venta de leche, su esposo trabaja como transportista con taxi trufis y tiene tres hijos en edad escolar, la Sra. Dionicia es bastante activa en su trabajo tiene tres vacas lecheras, dos toros, dos terneras preadas y dos pequeos terneros, adems de la venta de leche ella elabora bordados de labores bolivianas quienes les paga la mano de obra y le entregan todo el material los manteles son exportados al exterior, Ella realiza estos mismos manteles individuales y los vende muy aparte ya que tiene clientes que le realizan pedidos, El prstamo que ella esta solicitando lo utilizar para la compra de motor para el vehculo de su esposo. Razn por la cual solicita el crdito.
texts.en:
Dionicia is an old client that is returning after a little rest of four months. She is one of our clients who always makes her payments on time. She lives in the area of Cota Cota. She sells milks and her husband drives a taxi trufis (a taxi which has a number on it which indicates the established route assigned to it.) They have three children of school age. Dionicia is actively engaged in her work. She has three dairy cows, two bulls, two pregnant heifers, and two young calves.
Besides selling milk, she is paid to make handmade embroidered Bolivian tablecloths that are exported out of the country. She also makes individual tablecloths and sells them to her own customers who place orders. This loan that she is asking for is to buy an engine for her husbands vehicle. This is the reason she is asking for credit.

loan.use: to buy an engine for her husband's vehicle

loan.name: Manuel Alberto

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 20 aos de edad, vive con su compaera de vida y su bebe de dos aos de edad, en la casa que le dejo su mam.
l se dedica desde hace tres aos a la venta de mariscos (conchas y curiles), fue su mam quien le enseo esta actividad ya que ella se dedico a eso toda su vida. Hoy Maule es quien atiende a los clientes que dejo su mam y a hecho otros ms. Tiene un gran mercado, ya que vende a dos de las ciudades ms grandes del pas.
En la actividad que realiza Manuel, su producto es extrado del mar y para eso tiene a seis personas que salen todos los das a recolectar las conchas, en dos lanchas propiedad de Manuel de 6:00 a.m. a 11: a.m. Tambin l compra los curiles y conchas a los habitantes de la zona que se dedican a la recoleccin. Todo este producto Manuel lo carga en un vehiculo y lo trasporta a los mercados donde los vende, l se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. para realizar esta actividad.
l solicita un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para comprar ms cantidad de conchas a las personas que las venden y tambin para mejorar las lanchas, y para contratar a ms personas que le ayuden a recolectar conchas, ya que se acerca la poca en que estas se escasean. De esta forma l podr tener ms producto y satisfacer la demanda de los clientes y expandir su negocio a nivel nacional. Con esto Manuel podr brindarles mejores condiciones de vida a su pequea hija y a su querida esposa.
Manuel tiene dos objetivos bien definidos: el comprar su propio vehiculo para transportar la mercadera y el hacerle mejoras a su casa para que su familia viva en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Manuel is 20. He lives with his life partner and their two-year-old baby in the home that his mother left him.
He has sold seafood (conches and curiles-- a type of clam) for three years. His mother, who worked selling seafood her whole life, taught him this business. Maule now serves his mother's former customers and has obtained others as well. He has a large market, since he sells in two of the country's biggest cities.
In Manuel's business, his products are harvested from the sea. In order to do this, he has six people who go out on his two fishing boats to collect the conches. They work every day from 6:00 am to 11:00 am. Manuel also buys curiles and conches from the local residents who harvest seafood. Manuel packs his products into a vehicle and transports them to the markets where he sells them. He gets up at 4:00 am to go to work.
He is requesting a loan from Fundacion Campo to purchase more conches, to improve his fishing boats, and to hire more people to help him harvest conches; the season in which conches are scarce is approaching. This way, he will be able to have more products and satisfy his customers' demand and expand his business on the national level. With this investment, Manuel will be able to offer his beloved wife and little daughter a better quality of life.
Manuel has two well-defined goals: to buy his own vehicle for transporting his merchandise, and to make improvements to his home so that his family can have better living conditions.

loan.use: to buy more conches and to improve his fishing boats.

loan.name: Las Increibles De Jungapeo Group

texts.es: L a seora Alicia tiene 42 aos, ella es casada y tiene dos nias las cuales estudian la primaria. Ella se dedica a la venta de zapato, venta de cosmticos, cremas, perfumera por catalogo de diferentes marcas dice que con esos dos negocios tiene cuatro aos y tambin desde hace poco para tener una entrada mas de ganancias empez hacer tortillas a mano para vender. Dice que esta pidiendo un crdito para invertir en zapatos para dama y nios y tambin en compra de gas, maz para hacer sus tortillas a mano, platica Alicia que ella va a una ciudad donde hacen zapato de buena calidad a surtirse ya que ah le dan precios bajos para ella despus ganarle algo. Dice Alicia que esta agradecida con la financiera por el crdito que le estn otorgando por que as esta creciendo mas su negocio.
texts.en: Mrs. Alicia is 42, married, and has two daughters who are in elementary school. Alicia sells shoes, as well as cosmetics through a catalogue; creams and perfumes from various brands. She says that she has had both business for four years. She also recently started making tortillas by hand to sell in order to make more money. Alicia says she is requesting a loan in order to invest in shoes for women, men, and children, and to buy gas and corn for making her tortillas by hand. She tells us that she travels to a city where they make high-quality shoes in order to stock up, since they have low prices there. This way, she will make money. Alicia says she is grateful to the financing institution for the loan that they are authorizing, because this is how her business is growing.

loan.use: to sell perfume, shoes, and tortillas.

loan.name: Pura Vida Group

texts.es:
El grupo Pura Vida lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas Mara Margarita quien vende frutas desde hace 10 aos. Ella con el prstamo comprara limones y naranjas para su negocio.
Ella est casada su esposo es agricultor y tiene 5 hijos los cuales van a clase. Las otras integrantes son Francisca de los ngeles quien elabora tortilla y vende lea desde hace 8 aos y Javier Noel quien vende frutas en especial naranjas agrias y melones.
texts.en: The Pura Vida ("Pure Life") communal bank is comprised of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of them is Mara Margarita, who has been selling fruit for the past 10 years. With the loan she will purchase lemons and oranges for her business. She is married to a farmer and has five children who attend school. The other members are Francisca de los ngeles, who has been making tortillas and selling firewood for 8 years, and Javier Noel, who sells fruit, mostly sour oranges and melons.

loan.use: to purchase lemon and orange crops.

loan.name: Fernanda Del Carmen

texts.es: Fernanda Del Carmen se dedica a la venta de ropa. Hace ms de 35 aos que tiene este negocio, inicio ofreciendo su prendas de vestir ella tiene ubicado su negocio en el mercado lo que le resulta mucho ms favorable ya que siempre transitan una gran cantidad de clientes lo que le resulta muy favorable. El monto crdito est destinado para la compra de pantalones, short, faldas, trajes, vestidos entre otros productos.
texts.en: Fernanda Del Carmen sells clothing. She has had this business for 35 years. She started off selling her own clothing items. Her business is located in the market, which is good for sales; there are always a lot of people walking by. She will use this loan to buy pants, shorts, skirts, suits, dresses, and other items.

loan.use: to buy pants, shorts, skirts, suits, and dresses, among other items.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loan.name: Eva De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Eva de 50 aos, es una mujer soltera que ha sabido cmo salir adelante con sus hijos
Ella empez su negocio hace 10 aos que est ubicado en la parte de afuera de su casa, su negocio es una mini tienda que ah podido agrandar con la ayuda de Dios.
Ella necesita este prstamo para invertir en su negocio y la compra de vveres como: leche, huevos, queso, etc.
El sueo de ella es tener un local propio para su mini tienda y que su negocio aumente cada da ms con la ayuda de Dios.
texts.en:
Eva is 50 years old, single, and a woman who has learned how to come through for her children.
She began her business ten years ago and it is located in the front of her home. Her business is a mini shop that she has expanded with the help of God.
She needs this loan in order to stock her business and plans to buy supplies such as milk, eggs, cheese and other items.
Her dream is to have her own location for her mini shop, and that her business grows more every day with the help of God.

loan.use: to buy milk, eggs, drinks and other products

loan.name: Blanca Ermel

texts.es:
La seora Blanca, tiene 43 aos de edad, vive en la aldea rural de Pea Blanca con su esposo Jos y sus 5 hijos con edades de 27, 25,20, 18 y de 14 aos. Tiene 20 aos de dedicarse a la venta de mercadera de ropa de mujeres. Inicio su negocio de venta de ropa de manera ambulante. Luego la alcalda rento un predio para ubicar varios negocios, pero hubo problemas administrativos y fueron desalojados. Luego de gestionar nuevamente, lograron que sus negocios fueran reubicados en una va pblica alrededor del parque central con el apoyo de la alcalda, Actualmente funciona en este lugar donde ella construyo el cubculo de madera.
Doa Blanca, es muy perseverante, ha solicitado 5 prestamos con ODEF, los cuales ha trabajado muy bien donde ya cuenta con una buena clientela. Sus ganancias han aumentado lo que le ha permitido crecer su negocio. Adems ha podido pagar parte de los gastos educativos de sus hijos ya que su esposo tambin le apoya a travs de su trabajo como motorista en una empresa de energa elctrica. Su sueo es continuar con la educacin de sus dos hijos menores y en un futuro construir su propio local en el terreno de su casa.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 43, lives in the rural village of Pea Blanca. She lives with her husband, Jos, and their five children. The children are 27, 25, 20, 18, and 14 years old.
She has been selling womens clothes for 20 years. She started her business by selling clothes in an itinerant manner. Later, the village rented a property for various businesses. However, there were administrative problems, and they were evicted. After negotiating once more, they managed, with help from the village, to have their businesses relocated to a public thoroughfare around the central park. Her business currently operates there, where she has built a wooden stall.
Blanca is very perseverant. She has requested five loans from ODEF. They have worked very well, and she now has a good customer base. Her income has increased, and this has allowed her business to grow. She has also been able to pay part of the educational expenses for her children. Her husband also supports her through his work as a driver for an electrical power company.
Her dream is to continue with the education of her two youngest children. She also dreams of, in the future, building her own place on the land where her house is.

loan.use: to buy women's clothes to stock her inventory.

loan.name: Fritz Francisco

texts.es:
Fritz tiene 44 aos de edad y tiene dos hijos, l naci en la ciudad de Paucartambo y actualmente vive en la ciudad de Cusco, Per. Fritz trabaja en la Escuela de Bellas Artes Diego Quispe Tito de la ciudad del Cusco como administrador personal y tambin tiene una pequea tienda de abarrotes. Fritz y su esposa Roci tienen un pequeo negocio familiar de venta de comestibles como por ejemplo arroz, azcar, fideos, menestras y otras cosas ms. Ya son 10 aos que tiene el negocio y le va muy bien, l en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar mercadera como por ejemplo arroz, azcar, fideos y muchas cosas ms.
Fritz pertenece al banco comunal Unin, Fuerza y Amistad de la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Fritz is 44 years old and has two children. He was born in the town of Paucartambo and he currently lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. Fritz works in the "Diego Quispe Tito" School of Fine Arts in the city of Cusco as a personnel administrator. He also owns a small grocery store. Fritz and his wife Rocio run a small family business; they sell comestibles such as rice, sugar, noodles, soup and other things. He has owned the business for ten years already and it is going very well. On this occasion, he requests the loan in order to purchase goods such as rice, sugar, noodles and many other things. Fritz is a member of the "Unin, Fuerza y Amistad" ("Union, Strength and Friendship") communal bank of Asociacin Arariwa. He is thankful for the opportunity provided by this means and, at the same time, he promises to make the repayments according to the schedule.

loan.use: to purchase goods such as rice, sugar, noodles and many other things.

loan.name: Arelis Johana

texts.es: la sra. Arelis tiene 25 aos de edad, es madre de un hijo y se dedica a la venta de abarroteria en general, tiene una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, Arelis es una mujer emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, cuenta con el apoyo economico de su esposo para cubrir los gastos del hogar, su esposo es maestro de educacion primaria. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir su negocio, ya que lo tiene poco surtido y las exigencias de sus clientes son mayores. la meta de Arelis es hacer crecer su negocio y estar preparada para la epoca de navidad que es cuando mas se vende.
texts.en:
Sra. Arelis is 25 years old and the mother of one child. She sells groceries and has a store in her home. Arelis is an enterprising woman who has tremendous desire to succeed. She has the financial support of her husband with covering the household expenses. Her husband is an elementary school teacher.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise to restock her business. She has very little inventory and the demands from her customers are many. Arelis indicates that her goal is to grow her business and prepare herself for the Christmas season when she generates more sales.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Agueda De Jesus

texts.es: Agueda de 63 aos, es una persona muy trabajadora que a pesar de tener muchos problemas en su vida ha podido salir a delante con la ayuda de Dios. Su negocio de venta de arroz lo inicio hace 6 aos, con un pequeo capital que tena el esposo pudieron realizar esta actividad de venta de arroz. El trabajo lo realiza con su esposo, ella reparte el producto en Guayaquil y el esposo afueras de Guayaquil. La dificultad de ellos es la delincuencia ya que fueron vctimas de un robo. Tienen tres hijos, ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Ella solicita el prstamo para agrandar su negocio y para la compra de mercadera como: arroz por quintales. El sueo de ella es de mejorar su vivienda, la cual la quiere alquilarla para que haya un nuevo ingreso.
texts.en:
Agueda is 63 years old and a hardworking individual. Despite the many problems she has had to face in life, she has been able to press forward with the help of God.

She started a business selling rice six years ago using a little bit of capital that she received from her husband. Agueda and her husband work together. She distributes her product within Guayaquil and her husband makes deliveries outside of the city. One difficulty they must face is crime and they have been victims of a robbery. Agueda and her husband have three children, all of whom are grown and independent.

She is requesting a loan to expand her business and to buy merchandise, such as rice by the quintal (1 quintal = 46 kg). Her dream is to make improvements to her home because she wants to rent out rooms as a new source of income.

loan.use: to buy rice.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy essential goods.

loan.name: Saturnina Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila tiene 62 aos D. edad y tiene tres hijos, ella vive en la ciudad del Cusco, Per. Zoila tiene un pequeo taller D. confeccin D. ropa, ella confecciona chompas para nios, bebes, damas y caballeros a pedido del cliente y tambin venD. los domingos en la plaza Tpac Amaru D. la ciudad del Cusco sus productos. Ya son varios aos que tiene el negocio y le va muy bien, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo hilos, lana y otras cosas ms que se necesitan.
Zoila pertenece al banco comunal Unin, Fuerza y Amistad D. la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Zoila is 62 years old and has three children. She lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. Zoila has a small sewing workshop where she makes clothes. She produces sweaters for children, babies, women, and men based on orders from her customers. Zoila also sells her goods on Sundays at the Tpac Amaru Plaza in the city of Cusco. She has been in business for several years and has done very well. Zoila is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy materials such as thread, wool, and other items that she needs the most.

She is a member of the Communal Bank Unin, Fuerza y Amistad (Unity, Strength & Friendship), which is part of Asociacin Arariwa. Zoila is grateful for the opportunity being given to her and promises to complete her payments according to the schedule.

loan.use: to buy wool, thread, and other items.

loan.name: Luis Gonzaga

texts.es: Luis tiene 73 aos, su actividad es brindar el servicio de carpintera. Hace ms de 17 aos que tiene este medio de vida. Luis laboraba en el ingenio como carpintero fue con el paso del tiempo que el compro sus herramientas de trabajo y fue cuando dejo de trabajar en esa empresa que l se dedic a trabajar en su taller en donde la mayora de sus clientes conocen el trabajo que el realiza. Ahora solicita este crdito para la compra de madera, pega, clavos, maque, serruchos entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Luis, age 73, provides carpentry services. He has been in business for more than 17 years. Luis worked at a refinery as a carpenter and was able to buy his tools over time. When he left this job, he decided to start in his own business where most of his customers are familiar with the work that he does.

Now he is requesting a loan in order to buy wood, glue, nails, lacquer, saws, and other supplies.

loan.use: to buy wood, glue, nails, lacquer, saws, and other supplies.

loan.name: Olegario Luis

texts.es:
Olegario de 50 aos, un hombre muy trabajador y responsable en su negocio. Su negocio es una sastrera ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda, inicio esta actividad hace 30 aos. Su actividad la inicia desde que se levanta hasta la noche, dependiendo de la cantidad de trabajo que sus clientes le deja.
Est separado, tiene 2 hijos pero ya son mayores de edad.El solicita el prstamo para la compra de maquinas de coser y accesorios como: telas, hilos, agujas. Su sueo es mejorar su negocio, incrementarla y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Olegario, 50, is a hard-working man who is very responsible in his business. He has a tailor shop set up in the back part of his house and has been in business for 30 years. He works from the time he gets up in the morning until nightime, depending on the amount of work his customers give him.
He is separated and has two adult children. He is requesting a loan to buy sewing machines and accesories such as fabric, thread and needles. His goal is to improve his business by expanding it and to carry out home improvements.

loan.use: To buy sewing machines and accessories such as fabric, thread and needles.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Rosa Marlene

texts.es: Rosa de 47 aos, una mujer muy trabajadora y honrada, vive en una zona suburbana llamada Suburbio. Su negocio de venta de comidas lo inicio hace 3 aos, con el apoyo de su vecina que la impulso a poner este negocio. Ya que se di cuenta que tena el arte de la cocina en las manos. El horario de ella es de lunes, mircoles y viernes desde las 8:00am hasta las 22:00pm. Los das martes, jueves, sbado es empleada domesticas y el domingo descansa. La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia, hace 5 aos que se separ de su esposo. Ella solicita el prstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de cocina, arroz, azcar, etc. El sueo de ella es ampliar su negocio y obtener ms ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 47, is a hardworking and honest woman. She lives in a suburban area called Suburbio. Rosa started selling food three years ago after a neighbor convinced her that she should go into business. At that point, she realized that her hands were blessed with the art of cooking.

Her schedule is Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 8am to 10pm. On Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays she works as a housekeeper and on Sundays she takes a rest. The difficulty she faces is dealing with crime. Rosa and her husband have been separated for five years.

She is requesting a loan to invest in her business and to buy a stove, rice, sugar, and other items. Her dream is to expand her business and generate more income.

loan.use: to buy a stove, rice, sugar, and other items.

loan.name: Juana Manuela

texts.es: Juana Manuela es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien tiene una pequea venta. Ella inicio este negocio con la venta de golosinas, gaseosas y unos cuantos productos en la actualidad su negocio ha crecido poco a poco ahora vende granos bsicos, huevo, pan, enlatadosetc. Ella con el crdito comprar gaseosas, arroz, aceite y azcar entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Juana Manuela is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has a small store. She started her business by selling candy, sodas, and a few other products. Now that her business has grown gradually, she also sells basic grains, eggs, bread, canned good, and other items.

She is requesting a loan to buy sodas, rice, oil, sugar, and other products.

loan.use: to buy sodas, rice, oil, sugar, and other products.

loan.name: Maria Natividad

texts.es:
Maria tiene 47 aos de edad, tiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene tres hijos y vive en la ciudad de Cusco, Per. Maria se dedica a la venta de anticuchos de forma ambulatoria, ella tiene un puesto de venta improvisado en la esquina de la calle ms populoso de su barrio, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo carne, papa, salchichas y otras cosas ms. Ya son varios aos que se dedica a la confeccin de chompas y le va muy bien.
Maria pertenece al banco comunal Unin, Fuerza y Amistad de la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children. She lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. Maria sells grilled meats as a street vendor. She has an improvised stand at the corner of the busiest street in her neighborhood. Maria is taking this opportunity to buy supplies such as meat, potatoes, sausages, and other items. She has already spent several years making sweaters and has done very well.
Maria is a part of the Communal Bank Unin, Fuerza, y Amistad (Unity, Strength & Friendship), which is part of Asociacin Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments according to the schedule.

loan.use: buy supplies such as meat, potatoes, and sausages.

loan.name: Blanca Natalia

texts.es:
Blanca de 25 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada el fortn. Su negocio es una tienda ubicada en un local que est situada en la parte esquinera de su vivienda. Empez con esta actividad haces 5 aos, ya que su sector no haba este tipo de negocio, inicio con poco capital.
Actualmente su tienda est ms surtida. Su trabajo lo realiza sola, desde las 8:00am hasta las 22:00pm. No tiene dificultad, es soltera. Tienen 2 hijos uno de 6 y el otro de 2 aos, el de 6 estudia en escuela pblica.
Solicita este prstamo para la compra de mercadera como: leches, bebidas, arroz, azcar, etc. Su sueo es hacer un segundo piso a su vivienda y que su negocio incremente econmicamente.
texts.en:
Blanca is 25 years old. She lives in an urban zone called El Fortin. Her business is a store located in a corner of her house. She opened her store 5 years ago because the neighborhood did not have this type of business. She started with a small amount of capital.
Now her store is better supplied. She works alone from 8:00 AM until 10:00 PM. This is not difficult as she is single. She has 2 children. One is 6 years old and the other 2 years old. Her six year old attends public school.
She is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies such as milk, drinks, rice, sugar and other products. Her dream is to add a second floor to her house, and for her business profits to grow.

loan.use: to buy merchandise such as milk, drinks, rice, sugar and other products

loan.name: Mirian Francisca
