texts.es: La seora Mirian tiene 29 aos de edad, es madre de un hijo, vive en la aldea los Llanitos y se dedica a la produccion y venta de pan casero, sus clientes la prefieren por lo sabroso que son sus panes, ademas el precio de venta es accesible, Mirian vende sus panes por las maanas, ya que por las tardes se dedica a la venta de ropa usada. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los materiales para la fabricacion de los panes. Mirian trabaja muy fuerte para sacar adelante a su hijo y asi darle una mejor calidad de vida. la meta de Mirian es que su hijo sea profesional.
texts.en:
Mirian is 29, and the mother of a son. She lives in the village of Los Llanitos, and makes and sells homemade bread. Her customers prefer buying from her because of how delicious her bread is. In addition her price is reasonable.
Mirian sells her bread in the mornings, since in the afternoons she sells used clothing. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for making the bread.
Mirian works very hard to raise her son, and give him a better quality of life. Mirian's goal is for her son to be a professional.

loan.use: To buy flour, eggs, margarine, baking soda, firewood, vanilla and water.

loan.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra de 32 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada el fortn. Su negocio es una tienda ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda. Empez con esta actividad haces 3 aos, ya que tena poco capital ella pensaba ponerse otra clase de negocio, en la actualidad le va bien con este negocio. Su trabajo lo realiza sola, el horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm. No tiene dificultad, es soltera. Tienen 2 hijos uno de 12 y el otro de 16 aos, estudian en escuelas pblicas. Solicita este prstamo para la compra de mercadera como: leches, bebidas, arroz, azcar, etc. Su sueo es hacer su casa de cemento y agrandar muchos ms su negocio y poder ayudar a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sandra is 32, single, and lives in the area of the city called "Fortin." Her business is a store located in the rear part of her house.
She started this business three years ago. Since she had a little working capital, she thought of setting up some kind of business. Currently her business is going well. She works on her own, and her hours are 8:00am to 8:00pm, Monday to Sunday. Her life is good. She has two children, 12 and 16. They go to public schools.
She is applying for this loan to buy merchandise such as milk, drinks, rice, sugar, etc. Her dream is to have a house made of cement, and greatly expand her business, in order to be able to help her children complete their education.

loan.use: To buy drinks, milk, tuna, rice etc.

loan.name: Dina Luz

texts.es: La seora Dina es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 65 aos de edad y est casada. Lleva nueve aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, nos cuenta que las lleva a vender por las chacras. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 15 pantalones, 20 camisas manga larga, 10 polos, 10 blusas, 6 faldas, 6 buzos, 4 polares, 2 casacas, 10 pantalones para nios, 10 polos para nios. Las ropas de segunda mano tienen mucha demanda por las chacras porque muchos la utilizan para trabajar en el campo para que los proteja del calor, cada mes regresa para hacer negocio con su mercadera, cuando sus clientes no tienen dinero para pagar en efectivo lo hacen con aves de corral, los mismos que vende en la ciudad. Dina est tranquila porque cuando sale a otro lugar a vender su mercadera se distrae y le hace bien a su salud.
texts.en:
Dina is a member of the "Las Almendras" communal bank, located in Callera district, in Ucayali department. She is 65, and married. She has been working with loans from the Manuela Ramos institution for nine years.
She sells second-hand clothing. She tells us that she takes her merchandise to the countryside to sell. With her new loan of 2,000 nuevos soles she will buy: 15 pairs of pants, 20 long-sleeve shirts, 10 polo shirts, 10 blouses, 6 skirts, 6 tracksuits, 4 fleeces, 2 jackets, 10 pairs of children's pants, and 10 children's polo shirts.
There is a lot of demand for second-hand clothing in the countryside, because many people use it for working in the fields, and to protect themselves from the heat. Every month she returns to sell her merchandise. When her clients don't have money to pay cash, they do so with poultry, which she then sells in the city. Dina is content, because when she goes to another place to sell her merchandise she keeps herself busy and it's good for her health.

loan.use: To buy articles of clothing.

loan.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Marcelina tiene 52 aos de edad, tiene cinco hijos y vive en la ciudad de Cusco, Per. Marcelina se dedica a la venta de ropa, la socia Marcelina nos cuenta que viaja a la ciudad de Anta los das domingos para vender ropa. Ya son 10 aos que tiene el negocio y le va muy bien, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar mercadera como por ejemplo chompas, pantalones, camisas y otras cosas ms.
Marcelina pertenece al banco comunal Unin, Fuerza y Amistad de la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 52, and has five children. She lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. Marcelina sells clothing.
Marcelina tells us that she travels to the town of Anta on Sundays to sell clothing. She has had the business for ten years, and it's going very well. On this occasion she needs the loan to buy merchandise, such as sweaters, pants, shirts, and other clothing articles.
Marcelina belongs to the "Unin, Fuerza y Amistad" communal bank, under the Asociacin Arariwa institution. She is thankful for the opportunity she has been given, and promises to make her scheduled payments on time.

loan.use: To buy sweaters, trousers, shirts and other clothing items.

loan.name: Paris Group

texts.es: El grupo Pars lo conformaran tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la seora Mara Jos de 22 aos quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 4 aos. Ella est casada, su esposo tiene una pequea panadera familiar y tiene un nio de 3 aos y espera su segundo hijo. Ella invertir el crdito en ropa. Las otras integrantes son Vilgensa de 37 aos quien tiene una comideria e Ileana Patricia tiene una pulpera hace un ao.
texts.en:
The "Paris" group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people. One of them is Mara Jos, who is 22, and has been selling clothing for four years. She is married, has a three year-old son, and is expecting her second child. Her husband has a small family bakery. She will use the loan to buy clothing.
The other members are Vilgensa who is 37, and has an eatery, and Ileana Patricia who has had a small general store for a year.

loan.use: to purchase clothing for merchandise

loan.name: Monserrate Filadelfia

texts.es: Monserrate de 40 aos, vive en una zona periurbana llamada el fortn. Su negocio es un comedor que est ubicado en la parte delantera de su vivienda. Empez con esta actividad haces 6 aos, ya que su sector no haba comedor y entonces ella decidi ponerse uno. Su trabajo lo realiza sola, el horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 9:00am hasta las 14:00pm. Su dificultad es el polvo ya que su calle no est pavimentada, est unida y el esposo elabora de maestro de albail. Tienen 5 hijos uno de 1, 2, 8, 10 y 16, estudian en escuela y colegio pblicas. Solicita este prstamo para la compra de mercadera como: papas, bebidas, arroz, azcar, etc. Su sueo es hacer su casa de cemento y agrandar muchos ms su negocio y poder ayudar a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en: Monserrate is 40 years old and lives in a periurbarn area called the "fortn" ("fort"). Her business is an eatery located in the front part of her house. She started this business six years ago because her neighborhood didn't have an eatery, so she decided to start one. She does her work alone and the hours are Monday through Sunday from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. The obstacle she faces is dust, because her street is not paved. She is in a common law marriage and her husband works as a master bricklayer. They have five children who are 1, 2, 8, 10 and 16 years old. They attend public schools. She requests this loan to purchase goods such as potatoes, beverages, rice, sugar, etc. Her dream is to build a cement house, expand her business much more and help her children to finish their studies.

loan.use: to purchase potatoes, beverages, rice, sugar, etc.

loan.name: Julia

texts.es: La seora Julia es una D. nuestras clientas ya antiguas viene trabajando ya hace aos con nuestra institucin y paga puntualmente sus cuotas. Ella vive en la zona D. bajo Huayrapata es una zona aledaa D. la ciudad donD. vive con su esposo que se dedica como albail en provincias (comunidades), todos sus hijos ya son independientes con sus familias, La Sra. Julia tiene su tiendita D. barrio en su casa y los fines D. semana cocina comida (fricase D. chancho y pollo) lleva a la cancha que esta a unos diez cuadras D. su casa, sus hijos viven con sus familias en la casa D. la Sra. Julia y el espacio qued estrecho por ese motivo quiere hacer construir por lo menos un cuarto mas para estar mas cmodos, el prstamo lo utilizar para la compra D. material D. construccin y refaccin D. vivienda razn por el cual se solicita el financiamiento.
texts.en:
Julia is one of our old clients and has been working with our institution for some years and she makes her payments on time. She lives in the area below Huayrapata, an area bordering the city where she lives with her husband who works as a builder in the provinces (communities).
All her children are independent with their own families. Julia has a little neighborhood store in her house and on the weekends she cooks food (pork and chicken fricassee) that she carries to the sports park that is about ten blocks from her house. Her children live with their families in Julias house in a cramped space. This is why she wants to build at least another room in order to be more comfortable. The loan will be used for the financing of the construction materials for the renovation of her housing and this is the reason for which she is asking for a loan.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her house

loan.name: Liz

texts.es: Liz tiene 31 aos, es una mujer alegre y emprendedora, convive con su pareja con quiene tiene dos hijos, y por quienes se esfuerza para salir adelante. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, que compr con el apoyo de su pareja. El trabajo de Liz consiste en la venta de comida, es as que cada maana prepara desayuno y al medio da vende men en su local propio que se encuentra instalada en su casa, negocio que ejerce por ms de un ao, tiempo que le vali para hacerse conocida en la zona. Actualmente cuenta con el ayuda de una empleada que se encarga de la tener listos los productos para cocinar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso econmico que le da la tranquilidad de poder brindarle lo mejor a sus pequeos hijos, lo que no le gusta es que los precios de los productos suben de precio, y eso hace variar sus mrgenes de ganancia. Sin embargo no la amilana y ella sigue esforzndose gracias a que su restaurante es muy concurrido teniendo todas la ganas de ampliar su negocio. Este ser el sptimo crdito con MFP, en todo este tiempo le va bien con su grupo, porque ha demostrado ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el crdito solicitado, comprar arroz por sacos por que as podr obtener menos costos y mayor ganancia.
texts.en: Liz is 31 years old. She is a cheerful and enterprising woman. She lives with her partner with whom she has two children, and because of them she strives to get ahead. They live together in a house she owns, which she bought with support from her partner. Liz's work consists of selling food. Each morning she makes breakfast, and at noon she sells prepared food in the venue located in her home. She has been in this business for over a year and she has used this time to make herself known in the area. She currently has the help of an employee whose task is to get the goods ready for cooking. What she likes about her work is that it allows her to get an income that gives her peace of mind, since she is able to provide the best for her small children. What she doesn't like is when the price of the goods is up and that makes her profit margin vary. Still, she is undeterred and keeps on working hard, because her restaurant is in high demand and she has every intention of expanding her business. This will be her seventh loan with MFP. During all this time she has done well in her group, because she has proven herself to be responsible with her repayments. With the loan she requested, she will purchase sacks of rice so that she can get lower costs and higher profits.

loan.use: to purchase sacks of rice.

loan.name: Cristian Abel

texts.es: el joven Cristian tiene 20 aos de edad y vive en la aldea los Llanitos de Marcovia, Cristian es una persona emprendedora y dedicado a su negocio que es el servicio de moler maiz, el trabaja fuerte cada dia para forjarse un buen futuro, dice sentirse muy feliz ya que a su corta edad ya tiene negocio propio. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para el motor del molino.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young man who is 20 years of age and lives in the neighborhood of Los Llanitos de Marcovia. He is an enterprising individual who is dedicated to his service business of grinding corn. Cristian works hard each day in order to forge a good future. He says that he is very happy to have his own business at such a young age.

This loan will be used to buy spare parts for the motor of his grain mill.

loan.use: to buy spare parts for the motor of his grain mill.

loan.name: Doris Marina

texts.es: La seora Doris es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 51 aos de edad, tiene 2 hijos y est casada, su esposo trabaja como agente de seguridad. Son dos aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos y tiene un pequeo negocio de venta de ropas de segundo uso, negocio instalado en su casa, es poco lo que ahora tiene, pero en poco tiempo ir surtindolo con mas ropas. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles invertir en la compra de un fardo de ropas, luego seleccionar las ropas para ponerles precio. La ropas usada es una buena opcin para las personas de escasos recursos econmicos y para las personas que las venden es rentable. Una de sus hijas vive todava en su casa pero ya tiene su familia, son independientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Doris is a member of the Communal Bank Las Almendras (The Almonds) which is located in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 51 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband works as a security guard.

Doris has been working with the loan from Manuela Ramos for two years. She has a small business selling secondhand clothing from her home. The business she has now is small, but over time she plans to restock with more clothing.

With this new loan of 1000 PEN, she will invest in the purchase of a bundle of clothing. Later she will select the clothes that will be priced to sell. Used clothing is a good option for low-income people and a profitable venture for the people who sell them. One of her daughters still resides at home, but she has a family and lives independently.

loan.use: to buy a bundle of used clothing.

loan.name: Jos Alonso

texts.es:
El seor Jos vive junto a su esposa que se dedica a los oficios domsticos del hogar y un hijo de 22 aos de edad que trabaja en una gasolinera y estudia su ltimo ao de licenciatura en administracin de empresas y vive tambin con una hija de 21 aos de edad que trabaja como secretaria.
Don Jos es albail desde hace ms de 22 aos, inicio como ayudante de un albail, quien era amigo de sus padres, este le dio la oportunidad y le enseo el oficio. Desde entonces trabaja en su comunidad y en otras comunidades vecinas, as como en la ciudad donde ha realizado muchos trabajos y lo han recomendado.
Cuando su trabajo es por contrato, compra los materiales en la ciudad situada a 15 kilmetros de su comunidad. Las empresas ferreteras le hacen llegar los materiales hasta el lugar donde los necesita, cuando no es por contrato l les cobra a sus clientes.
Don Jos esta solicitando un prstamo a Fundacin Campo, para reparar el techo de su vivienda y la construccin de habitaciones para sus hijos. Con el prstamo l podr tener una vivienda segura, evitar la humedad dentro de la vivienda ya que esta le deteriora los muebles y evitara enfermedades por el exceso de humedad, al mismo tiempo permitir privacidad a los miembros de la familia y mayor comodidad.
l desea apoyar a sus hijos para que se superen, que estudien y sean profesionales y personas de bien.
En un futuro desea construir una casa para cada uno de sus hijos con el apoyo financiero de Fundacin Campo, comprar un vehculo o camin de pequea capacidad para utilizarlo en su trabajo y transportar las herramientas y materiales que necesita.
texts.en:
Jose lives together with his wife. She occupies herself with household work. Their 22-year old son works at a gas station and he is on his final year of his degree in business administration. They also live with a daughter who is 21 years old and she works as a secretary.
Jose has been a construction worker for 22 years and he started out as a contractor's assistant. He was a friend of his parents' and this gave him the opportunity and the training in the field. Since then he has been working in his community, in neighboring communities, and in the city. He has completed many projects and he has recommendations.
When his work is on contract, he buys the materials from the city, located 15 kilometers from his community. The hardware stores deliver the materials to wherever he will need them. When the works is not on contract, he charges his clients.
Jose requests a loan from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to repair the roofing on his house and to build bedrooms for his children. With this loan eh will be able to have a safe home, avoiding humidity within the house. This deteriorates the furniture and it will prevent illnesses born from excess humidity. At the same time it will grant privacy for the members of the family and greater comfort.
He wishes to support his children so that they improve themselves, so that they attend school and earn a career and be upstanding citizens.
In the future he wants to build a house for each one of his children with the financial support of Fundacion Campo. He also wants to purchase a vehicle or a small struck to use for his work and to transport the tools and materials that he needs.

loan.use: to repair the roofing of his home and to build bedrooms for his children.

loan.name: Marvin

texts.es: Marvin es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor quien se dedica a la venta Lotera desde hace 15 aos y tambin tiene una pulpera desde hace 10 aos la cual con ayuda de su esposa ha ido creciendo. Este crdito lo ocupar para ampliar la pulpera con la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de productos pero principalmente granos bsicos. l es casado y tiene tres nios de 15, 8 y 4 aos los tres van a clase.
texts.en:
Marvin is a hardworking and enterprising gentleman. He has been selling lottery tickets for 15 years. Marvin also has a store that he has managed for 10 years with the help of his wife.
His business has been growing, so he needs a loan to expand his store by purchasing a variety of products in bulk, especially basic grains. Marvin is married and has three children (ages 15, 8, and 4) who attend classes.

loan.use: to purchase a variety of products in bulk.

loan.name: Futuro En Desarrollo Group

texts.es: El grupo Futuro en Desarrollo lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. El coordinador es Jos Dolores de 38 aos quien tiene un taller de ebanistera desde hace 8 aos el cual inicio poco a poco ahora cuenta con 5 trabajadores. l es casado tiene dos hijos de 16 y 14 aos respectivamente. Los otros integrantes son Miguel de 46 aos quien se dedica a la venta de lea desde hace 10 aos y Martha Raquel de 22 aos vende ropa desde hace 3 aos.
texts.en:
The group Futuro en Desarrollo (Future in Development) consists of three hardworking and enterprising individuals. The coordinator is Jos Dolores, age 38, who has a cabinetmaking workshop. He started this business eight years ago with very little and now he has five workers. Jos is married and has two children, ages 16 and 14 respectively.

The other members are Miguel, who is 46 years old and has been selling firewood for 10 years, and Martha Raquel, who is 22 years old and has been selling clothes for 3 years.

loan.use: to purchase wood.

loan.name: Mayra

texts.es: La seora Mayra es socia D. banco comunal Las triunfadoras D. Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 47 aos D. edad, tiene 3 hjos y est casada. Hace 10 aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos D. Manuela Ramos, cuenta con un pequeo taller D. soldadura y su esposo es el que se encarga D. realizar los trabajos, todo su dinero lo invierte en su taller, porque siempre faltan herramientas, y si algunas D. sus maquinas se malogra, es necesario que lo arregle. Con su nuevo prstamo D. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 1 lata D. soldadura, 1 cortadora, 5 llaves, 1 paquete D. hoja D. cierra, 1 balD. D. grasa. Todas las ganancias que obtienen D. su trabajo lo distribuyen en las cosas que les falta y tambin ahorran algo D. dinero para alguna emergencia, su familia est mejorando econmicamente y eso les hace sentir bien, sus hijos estudian en un buen colegio y est bastante agradecida con Manuela Ramos porque han sido los que le han dado la mano para incrementar su negocio y mantenerlo.
texts.en:
Mayra is a member of the Las Triunfadoras communal bank in the Calleria district, Ucayali department. She is 47 years old, married, and has three children.
She has been working with the loans from Manuela Ramos for ten years. She has a small soldering shop, and her husband is the one who is in charge of doing the work. She invests all of her money in the shop because it always needs tools. If some of the machines break, they need to be fixed.
She will use her new loan for 3,000 sole to buy one can of solder paste, one cutter, five keys, one package of saw blades, and one bucket of grease. They use all of the income that they get from their work for the things that they need. They also save some of their money for an emergency.
It is improving financially, and this makes her feel good. Her children go to a good school, and she is very grateful to Manuela Ramos. They have given her a hand to expand and maintain her business.

loan.use: to buy soldering supplies.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to make improvements to her home

loan.name: Nora

texts.es: La Sra. Nora es casada tiene cuatro hijos que son dependientes D. la familia la Sra. vive en la zona Villa Nueva Potos en casa D. sus paps y su actividad principal es artesana en joyas hace mas D. 20 aos cuenta con una tienda por la zona central donD. venD. sus joyas, como ser: aretes , cadenas, ramilletes y prendedores para Seoras D. pollera, su esposo al igual que ella es artesano en joyas, tienen buena clientela por que realizan una joyas hermosas, la Sra. tambin pertenece al banco comunal FORTUNA TEJAR, la Sra. Nora necesita el crdito para la compra oro y plata por mayor ya que le estn haciendo una buena oferta y ella desea proveerse del material ya que estas fechas D. fin D. ao tendr mucha venta, es una persona con ganas D. superacin agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Nora is married and has four independent children. She lives in the Villa Nueva Potos area in her parent's home and has been a jewelry maker for 20 years. She has a store in the central area where she sells jewelry such as earrings, chains, corsages and brooches for women who wear skirts. Her husband is also a jewelry maker and they both have many customers because they make beautiful pieces of jewelry. She is also a member of the communal bank Fortuna Tejar. She needs the loan to buy wholesale gold and silver since she is being offered good prices and she wishes to have more materials since she will have more sales during the end of year holidays. She is a woman with a drive to succeed and is thankful for the help being offered by the institution.

loan.use: buy wholesale gold and silver.

loan.name: Emilia Assencion

texts.es: Emilia Assensin tiene 36 aos, su actividad es la venta de lea seca y cerdos. Hace ms de 10 aos que tiene este negocio, comenz con la crianza de cerdos y luego se dedic a comprar lea tiene 5 hijos de 16,14, 13, 11 y 8 aos respectivamente a pesar que no ha sido fcil sacar adelante a sus hijos ella siempre les est brindando lo necesario para que sean personas de bien. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de lea y cerdos. Sus amigos vecinos y familiares conocen muy bien los buenos productos que ofrece.
texts.en:
Emilia Assencin, age 36, has a business of selling dry firewood and pigs that has been in operation for more than 10 years. She started out selling pigs and later decided to add firewood. Emilia has five children (ages 16, 14, 13, 11, and 8). Even though it has not been easy to help her children get ahead, Emilia is always able to provide them what they need so that they can become good people.

This loan will be used to buy firewood and pigs. Her friends, neighbors, and relatives are very familiar with the products that she offers.

loan.use: to buy firewood and pigs.

loan.name: Aydalina Del Carmen

texts.es: Aydalina del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 38 aos quien tiene un taller de calzado. Este negocio lo inicio hace 10 aos junto a su esposo el cual maneja el taller mientras ella lo comercializa y hace poco tiene un tramo en el mercado el cual obtuvo con el crdito anterior. Este crdito lo utilizara para ampliar el tramo y condicionarlo para poder vender lo que produce ya que actualmente vende chinelas de hule. Adems otra parte del crdito ser para capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Aydalina del Carmen is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She is 38 years old and has a shoe workshop. Aydalina started this business 10 years ago with her husband. He manages the workshop while she is in charge of selling their goods. She has a space at the market that she obtained with her previous loan.

This loan will be used to expand her space and to equip it so that she can sell what they produce. At the moment, she is selling rubber flip-flops. In addition, part of the of the loan will be used as operating capital.

loan.use: to expand and equip her vending space at the market where she sells shoes.

loan.name: Santos Reniery

texts.es: El sr Santos tiene 30 aos de edad, es padre de 4 hijos y se dedica a la venta de pan blanco, su producto lo transporta en motocicleta y lo reparte en diferentes colonias y aldeas cercanas de la ciudad de Choluteca. todos los dias sale a las 5 de la maana para lograr terminar el recorrido de sus clientes. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para la moto que tiene malos y tambien para hacerle un mantenimiento, ya que esta motocicleta es el unico medio en que transporta sus panes. en sus tiempos libres visita la iglesia. Santos tiene como meta graduar a sus hijos y que sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Sr. Santos is 30 years old and the father of four children. He sells white bread and transports his products by motorcycle to different neighborhoods and the surrounding areas of the city of Choluteca. Every day he leaves at 5am so that he can complete the deliveries to his customers.

This loan will be used to buy spare parts for his motorcycle that is in bad condition. He will also pay for maintenance. The motorcycle is the only means for him to transport his products. In his free time, Santos attends church. His goal is to see his children graduate and become successful professionals.

loan.use: to pay for parts and maintenance for the motorcycle he uses to deliver bread.

loan.name: Mayra Lucia

texts.es: L. seora Mayra es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 25 aos de edad, est casada y tiene una hija. Son tres aos que viene trabajando con los prestamos de ManueL. Ramos, tiene una panadera, cuenta con un horno casero que puede cocinar hasta 40 latas de pan, tiene 2 personas trabajando con elL., uno para hacer los panes y L. otra persona, que es su esposo, es el que se encarga, junto con elL., a repartir los panes a las bodegas de las zonas. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprar: 5 sacos de harina, 5 casilleros de huevos, 1 lata de manteca, 2 kilos de levadura, 1 kilo de frutas confitadas, saco de azcar. Para las fiestas de fin de ao invertir en insumos para hacer los riqusimos panetones, tambin hacen biscochos. Debido a que elaboran pocos productos terminan rpido y les queda tiempo para atender a su hija. Estn trabajando para dar un futuro mejor a los hijos que vayan a tener..
texts.en:
Mayra is a member of the Communal Bank, "Las Triunfadoras (The Winners)" of Calleria District, Department of Ucayali. She is 25 years old, married and has one daughter.
For three years she has been working with ManueL. Ramos loans. Mayra has a bakery, where she has a home oven that can cook up to 40 pans of bread. She has 2 people working with her, one to make the bread and the other person, which is her husband, is the one responsible for distributing the bread to stores in the area.
With this new loan 1,500 nuevos soles, Mayra will buy: 5 bags of flour, 5 cartons of eggs, 1 can of butter, 2 kilos of yeast, 1 kilo of candied fruit, sack of sugar.
For the holidays at the end of the year Mayra will invest in ingredients for the delicious panettones. She also makes biscuits. Because she only makes a few products, they are produced quickly and leaves her time to care for her daughter. They are working to provide a better future for the children that they will have.

loan.use: to purchase flour, eggs, and butter.

loan.name: Rodrigo Antonio

texts.es: El seor Rodrigo sigue laborando en seguridad, sus dos hijos creciendo y cursando el ao escolar, su esposa sigue trabajando y ambos siguen haciendo las mejoras a su casa. Su casa hoy en dia toda de concreto, parte de estos logros fueron atraves del financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en varios creditos. Lo que para ellos ha sido de gran beneficios al mejorar la infraestructura de su casa. El no cuenta con inodoro y desea mejorar esta condicion por tal razon comprara inodoro,tubos para aguas negras, pegamento,cemento, arena, bloques y hacer esta obra. El cual sera para su familia de gran bienestar de salud, al realizar mas higiene.
texts.en: Rodrigo still works as a security guard. His two children are growing and attending school. His wife is still working and they're both still making home improvements. His house is currently made entirely of concrete. Part of this success came from the funding Afodemic has provided in various loans, which have helped them a lot as they improve the infrastructure of their home. He doesn't have a toilet and wishes to improve this condition. For that reason he will purchase a toilet, sewage pipes, glue, cement, sand and cinder blocks, and get it built. It will mean a lot to his family in terms of well-being and health, because they will get better hygiene.

loan.use: to purchase a toilet, sewage pipes, glue, cement and cinder blocks, and to start building so that his family will get better hygiene.

loan.name: Areli Del Carmen

texts.es: Areli Del Carmen tiene 33 aos, su actividad es una pulpera, tiene ms de 6 aos en este negocio lo aprendi por voluntad propia fue con el paso del tiempo que ella ha mejorado su actividad cada da. Ella empieza este negocio desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 9 de la noche, pues la mayora de sus clientes llegan a solicitarle variedad en sus productos. El crdito es para la compra de granos bsicos, detergentes, golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, sopas enlatados y papel higinico.
texts.en: Areli Del Carmen is 33 and has a general store. She has more than 6 years of experience in this business. She learned on her own will, and with the passing of time, she has gotten better at her trade every day. She works in her store from 7 in the morning until 9 at night. The majority of her clients have come to request from her variety in her products. The loan is to purchase basic grains, detergent, sweets, soft drinks, bread, cookies, canned soups, and toilet paper.

loan.use: purchase basic grains, detergents, sweets, soft drinks, bread, cookies, canned soup, and toilet paper.

loan.name: Monica Lisbeth

texts.es:
La seora Mnica es socia del banco comunal las triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 aos de edad, est casada y tien cuatro hijos. Son tres aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, ella se dedica a la venta al por menor de golosinas, lo hace en las afueras de un colegio (ambulante).
Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 bolsas de caramelo, 2 bolsas de chicle bola, 1 bolsa de chupetines, 3 cajas de galletas, 1 bolsas de tofes, 1 bolsa de chocolate, 1 caja de frunas, 1 caja de lentejitas. La venta es de lunes a viernes y el fin de semana se dedica a las tareas domesticas y a la atencin de sus hijas que tambin necesitan de su apoyo en algunas tareas, su esposo se encarga de casi todo los gastos de la casa, se desempea como chofer (transportista). Mnica est muy contenta ya que sus ventas le permite tener un ingreso ms en casa, tambin una de sus hijas est trabajando y aporta para algunos gastos de la casa...
texts.en:
Mrs. Monica is a member of the communal bank "The Triumphant" from the Calleria District, Ucayali Department. She is 40 years old, married, and has 4 children. She has been working with three loans from Manuela Ramos. She sells sweets by foot on the outskirts of a school.

With her new 1,700.00 Peruvian Soles loan she will buy: 3 bags of caramels, 2 bags of gum drops, 1 bag of lollipops, 3 boxes of cookies, 1 bag of toffees, 1 bag of chocolate, 1 box of fruits, and 1 box of lentils. She sells from Monday to Friday and on the weekends does house work and helps her children with their homework. Her husband is in charge of almost all of their living costs and is a chauffeur. Monica is very happy that her sales permit her have an extra income for their home. She also has a daughter who is working and helping pay for living costs.

loan.use: buy caramels and other sweets.

loan.name: Adela

texts.es: La seora Adela es socia D. banco comunal Las Triunfadoras D. Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 50 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos mayores de edad. Se dedica al negocio de las decoraciones, ya sea con telas o globos, depende D. gusto D. cliente, y para trabajar con comodidad tiene que invertir en la compra de insumos de primera calidad, de esa manera brindar un buen servicio. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 metros de tela color dorado, 3 metros de tela color rojo,3 metro de tela color verde limn, 3 metros de tela color naranja, 3 metros de tela color amarillo, 3 metros de tela color morado, 5 metro de tela color blanco, 10 metros de tela morado, 10 metros de tela color rosado. Al tener variedad de colores le va ser ms fcil realizar su trabajo contando con una gama de variedad. Este trabajo lo realiza con la ayuda de su hijo, quien es el que se encarga de transportar las cosas que necesitan para decorar el local solicitado.
texts.en:
Adela is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras, The Winners,' from the Calleria District, Ucayali Department. She is 50, married, and has two grown children.
She has a decorating business using fabric or balloons, depending on the tastes of her clients. To make her work more convenient, she has to invest in the purchase of the best quality materials to offer good service.
With her new loan of 1,000.00 Nuevos Soles she will purchase 3 meters each of gold, red, lime green, orange, yellow, and purple fabric. She will also purchase 5 meters of white fabric, 10 meters of purple fabric, and 10 meters of pink fabric.
Having a range of colors makes it easier for her to do her work. She does her work with the help of her son, who is in charge of transporting the decoration supplies to the area requested.

loan.use: purchase wholesale fabric

loan.name: Norma Lucia

texts.es: Norma Lucia se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general. Inicio con la intencin de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, a pesar de los problemas que se le han presentado Norma ha sabido mantener activo su negocio. Ella ofrece productos como ropa en general, calzado, bolsos, prenda de oro y plata, cosmticos, sabanas, manteles entre otros productos. El objetivo del prstamo es para la compra de materia prima necesaria y as sufragar la demanda que tiene con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Norma Lucia sells general merchandise for a living. She began with the intention of having our own source of income. In spite of the problems that she has faced Norma has managed to keep her business alive.
She sells products such as clothes, shoes, bags, gold and silver accessories, cosmetics, sheets and tablecloths among other items. The reason for the loan is to buy the supplies that she needs in order to meet her customers' demands.

loan.use: to buy clothes, shoes, bags, gold and silver accessories, cosmetics, sheets and tablecloths among other items.

loan.name: Luis Adan

texts.es: Luis Adn es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor de 34 aos quien es comerciante de ropa tpica y artesanas desde hace 6 aos. El con el crdito comprara mercadera en ropa, artesanas y para unos encargos que tiene. Luis es casado y tiene tres nios de 11, 8 y 3 aos los dos mayores estn en primaria.
texts.en:
Luis Adn is a hardworking man and entreprenuer who is 34 years old. He has been selling traditional clothes and handicrafts for the last 6 years. With the loan he will buy clothes, handicrafts and items to fill some orders he has.
Luis is married and has 3 children aged 11, 8 and 3 years. The 2 eldest children attend primary school.

loan.use: to buy merchandise, clothes and handicrafts in particular.

loan.name: Rosario Delpilar

texts.es: La seora Rosario es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, est casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo es trabajador independiente Lleva tres aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, tiene un moto car que le genera ingresos diarios, su esposo es quien lo trabaja. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 llantas, 3 cmaras, 1 galn de aceite, pago de mano de obra del tcnico, 1 juego de catalina, mantenimiento completo del vehculo. Son repuestos que necesita tener a la mano para cualquier imprevisto, con este vehculo su esposo trabaja todo el da, tambin lo utiliza para movilizar a toda su familia cuando lo necesitan, porque estn lejos de la ciudad y los pasajes cuestan caro. Parte del dinero que genera su moto car lo estn invirtiendo en hacer algunos arreglos en su hogar, para mayor comodidad para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Seora Rosario is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras del Distrito de Calleria which is located in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is married and has 2 children. her husband is self-employed.
She has been working for 3 years with the Manuela Ramos. She has a motorrickshaw which generates the daily income and which her husband operates. With the new loan of S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 3 tyres, 3 inner tubes, 1 gallon of oil, labour costs for a mechanic, 1 set of chainrings, complete vehicle service.
The spare parts need to be on hand for any eventuality. Her husband works with this vehicle every day. He also uses it to transport his entire family when necessary as they live far from the city and tickets are expensive.
They are investing some of the money generated by their vehicle in making some repairs to their home for the comfort of their children.

loan.use: to buy spare parts.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase tyres, plastic, pedals, chains and other products

loan.name: Marlon Ivan

texts.es: Marlon Ivan es un seor trabajador y emprendedor quien tiene una pequeo taller de metalrgica desde hace 15 aos. Este negocio lo inicio poco a poco ahora trabaja junto con un sobrino. El con el crdito comprara herramientas y materiales para realizar unos trabajos.
texts.en:
Marlon Ivan is a hardworking and enterprising man who has had a small metal workshop for the last 15 years. He set this business up little by little and now works alongside his nephew.
With the loan he will buy tools and materials to undertake some jobs.

loan.use: to buy materials and equipment for his metal workshop.

loan.name: Imelda Del Socorro

texts.es: Imelda Del Socorro tiene 56 aos su actividad es brindar el servicio de comida. Hace ms de 7 aos que tiene este negocio, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad. Inicio con comida rpida a pesar de que no era fcil aprendi a elaborar estos productos que sus clientes le solicitaban. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de verduras, carnes, pollos, granos bsicos, platos desechables, bolsas, entre otros productos. Imelda tiene una gran cantidad de clientes que siempre disfrutan de los platillos que realiza.
texts.en:
Imelda Del Socorro is 56 years old and has 4 grown-up children. She makes food and has had this business for more than 7 years. She started out by selling fast food. Even though it was not easy, she learned how to make the dishes her customers requested. The reason for the loan is to buy vegetables, meat, chicken, dry grains, paper plates, bags and more. Imelda has a large number of customers who always enjoy the dishes she makes.
.

loan.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken, dry grains, paper plates, bags and more.

loan.name: Glendy Karen

texts.es: La seora Glendy es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 30 aos de edad, est casada y tiene dos hijos menores de edad. Hace dos aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de bebidas gaseosas, inici su negocio con los S/. 300.00 nuevos soles que le prest Manuela Ramos. Tiene dos hijos menores en edad escolar, su negocio lo tiene instalado en su misma casa y no tiene que salir de ella para poder trabajar, no es un negocio que le deja grandes ganancias pero le permite estar con sus hijos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprar: 6 paquetes de gaseosas de varios sabores, 3 paquetes de agua mineral, 3 jabas de gaseosa en botellas retornables, 3 paquetes de sorbetes, 2 paquetes de bolsitas. Su esposo es administrador de profesin y es el que se encarga de mantener el hogar, los ingresos extras son por parte de Glendy para apoyar con algunos gastos pequeos que a veces necesitan.
texts.en:
Glendy is a member of the Ucayali Department of the Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria Communal Bank. She is 30 years of age, married and has two children under age. She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for the past two years, selling fizzy drinks. She started her business with a loan of S/. 300.00 new soles, given to her by Manuela Ramos.
She has two children under school age and runs her business from home so she doesn't have to leave the house to be able to work. The business does make her large profits but it enables her to be with her children.
With her new loan of S/. 1,500.00 new soles she will buy: 6 packs of fizzy drinks in a variety of flavours, 3 packs of mineral water, 3 crates of fizzy drinks in returnable bottles, 3 packs of sorbets and 2 bags of sweets.
Her husband is a manager by profession and he takes care of running the family home. Glendy 's additional income helps to cover certain other small costs that sometimes arise.

loan.use: to purchase fizzy drinks

loan.name: Maria Lucia

texts.es: La seora Mara es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 aos de edad, es madre soltera de cinco hijos,tiene a su cargo a dos de ellos. Son 3 aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comidas, desayunos y almuerzos todos los das se levanta muy temprano para salir a trabajar, y no de sus hijos le ayuda en la atencin al cliente. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprar: saco de arroz, saco de azcar, 1 galones de aceite, 1 paquete de fideos, condimentos, 1 racimo de pltano. Su trabajo se encuentra lejos de su casa, pero tiene que irse a trabajar para mantener a sus hijos que todava estn en casa, ha sido padre y madre para ellos. Solo quiere que Dios le de la salud necesaria para poder ver a sus hijos realizados y no tengan que pasar necesidades, agradece a Manuela Ramos por las cosas que hasta ahora ha logrado.
texts.en:
Seora Mara is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 48 years old and a single mother of 5 children. She is responsible for 2 of them.
She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 3 years. She sells food: breakfast and lunch every day. She gets up very early to go to work and none of her children help her attend to her customers.
With the new loan of S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy sack of rice, sack of sugar, 1 gallon of oil, 1 package of noodles, seasonings, 1 bunch of bananas.
Her place of work is far from where she lives but she has to go to work to take care of the children who still live at home. She has been both mother and father to them.
She just wants God to give her the health needed to see her children settled and without having to want for the basics in life. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for what she has been able to achieve so far.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loan.name: Jimena Patricia

texts.es: La Sra. Jimena se dedica a la cra de ganado vacuno, ella tiene experiencia en el rubro hace tres aos atrs, anteriormente ella viva en Espaa y con mucho esfuerzo lleg a Bolivia para hacer construir su casa, actualmente ella quiere hacer crecer su ganado para poder tener mejores ingresos, ya que con los gastos que tuvo y todo el sufrimiento que pas cuando estaba ausente de su familia, ella decide no volver a viajar, por esto ella vino para poder pedir un monto mnimo y pueda hacer crecer poco a poco su capital y mejorar su situacin econmica.
texts.en: Sra. Jimena breeds cattle. She has 3 years of experience in the business. She used to live in Spain and with a lot of hard work she came back to Bolivia to build her own house. Now she wants to expand her livestock farm in order to have a better income. What with the expenses she had and what she suffered when she absent from her family, she has decided not to travel again. This is why she came to ask for a minimum loan with which she grow her capital little by little and improve her financial situation.

loan.use: to breed cattle.

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: Jos Luis tiene 46 aos, su actividad que es brindar el servicio de sastrera, que atiende desde las 7 de la maana hasta las 9 de la noche tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad que ninguno est bajo su cargo. La mayora de sus clientes llegan a solicitarle variedad de prendas como pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y uniformes pues sus clientes siempre son exigentes en lo que solicitan. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de telas, botones, hilos, tijeras entre otros productos que son necesarios.
texts.en: Jos Luis is 46 years old and is a tailor. He works from 7 in the morning until 9 at night. He has 3 grown-up children, none of whom are under his care. Most of his customers order a range of garments such as trousers, shirts, skirts, suits and uniforms; his customers are very demanding with their orders. The reason for the loan is to buy fabrics, buttons, thread, scissors and other much-needed products.

loan.use: to buy fabrics, buttons, thread, scissors.

loan.name: Yaneht

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Yaneht; La socia tiene 30 aos de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene 1 hijo de 8 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la elaboracin de artesana la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de materiales para la elaboracin de artesana, ella vende a los turistas en un stand, la socia desea comprar materiales como piedras, alambre, ganchos para hacer aretes, collares y otros adornos, tambin compra chalinas de lana de alpaca bebe ya hechas y las vende, la socia desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de materiales para elaborar los diferentes trabajaos para la venta. La socia no gusta de fotos pero accede a tomarse una por tratarse de las condiciones requeridas. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yaneht is a member of the "Imasumac II" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Yaneht is 30 years old, single, and has an 8-year-old child. Her business is making handicrafts. She would like to invest this loan in buying materials for making handicrafts which she sells to tourists from a stall. She would like to buy materials such as stones, wire and hooks for making earrings, necklaces and other decorative items. She will also buy [pre-made] scarves made from baby Alpaca yarn and sell them. She would like to invest her loan in buying materials for making the different goods that she sells.
Yaneht does not like having her photo taken but she agreed to have one taken in order to comply with the required conditions.
Yaneht is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loan.use: to invest in buying materials for making her goods to sell

loan.name: Kelly

texts.es: Kelly tiene 46 aos, es una mujer alegre y entusiasta, es docente de profesin, actualmente lo ejerce, pero adems se dedica en la venta de perfumera. Es separada, vive en su propia casa con sus padres, sus dos hermanos, tiene un hijo que es mayor de edad y de vez en cuando la visita. Es as que el negocio de venta de cosmticos lo realiza por medio de catlogos y los ofrece amistades y familiares, dejndoles a crdito la mercadera. Y al cabo de 15 das realiza la cobranza. Tiene 3 aos y hasta el momento lo ha realizado sola, perole agrada por que as puede generarse un ingreso extra, adems que le permite tener tiempo para dedicarse a otra cosa. Ahora tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes y por ello tiene planes de crecer y abrir un local de venta de perfumera y cosmticos. Este ser su cuarto crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar invistiendo en su negocio. Con el crdito solicitado, comprar ms perfumes de diversas presentaciones a un menor precio y piensa comprar ms cosmticos para cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Kelly is 46 years old. She is a cheerful and enthusiastic woman. She is a teacher by profession and currently works in this job. However, she also sells perfumes. Kelly is separated and lives in her own home together with her parents and her two siblings. She has one grown-up son who visits her occasionally.
Kelly makes her cosmetics sales through catalogs. She sells to friends and family members, leaving her merchandise with them on credit. She collects payment two weeks later. Kelly has had her business for three years and, up to now, she has carried out her work on her own. However, she enjoys it because it allows her to make extra income and allows her to have time to spend on other things. She currently has many orders from her customers and, for that reason, she has plans to grow her business and open a sales location where she can sell perfumes and cosmetics.
This will be Kelly's fourth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support so that she can continue investing in her business. She will use the loan she has requested to buy different styles of perfume at a lower price. She also plans to buy more cosmetics to meet her customer demand.

loan.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics

loan.name: Jaimes Octavio

texts.es: El seor Octavio conviviente con la seora Esperanza ms de 12 aos, saben leer y escribir con 4 hijos dependientes que estudian, viven hace 10 aos atrs hacia el norte de Colomi comunidad Rodeo Alto-Candelaria como tambin tienen cabezas de ganado vacuno engorde y lecheras. El seor Octavio nos cuenta, el dinero que tena como ahorro lo est invirtiendo en construccin de su vivienda para vivir ms cmodos, son agricultores anualmente producen papa, papaliza, haba, oca, por este motivo el vino para sacar un crdito para reintegrar de la compra de terreno agrcola. Por ltimo el seor nos cuenta que se sienten muy alegres por haber conseguido una respuesta positiva y tener siempre un buen futuro por delante, ahora va tener terreno para sembrar en ms superficies ya que estaba cultivando en herencia de terreno de sus padres.
texts.en: Octavio has been living with his partner Esperanza for more than 12 years. They both know how to read and write and have four dependent children who are in school. They have lived in the north of Colomi, in a community called Rodeo Alto-Candelaria for the past ten years. They own some cattle (both for meat and milk). Octavio tells us that he is investing some savings that he had in building his house so that his family can live more comfortably. They are farmers and every year they grow potatoes, papaliza and oca (native tubers) and beans. He came to request a loan in order to buy a plot of farmland. Finally, Octavio tells us that they feel very happy to have received a positive response and to know they have a good future ahead of them. He will now have more land on which to grow his crops as the land on which he has done this up to now was an inheritance from his parents.

loan.use: to buy a plot of farmland

loan.name: Yessenia Del Rosario

texts.es: Yessenia Del Rosario tiene 23 aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms de 5 aos que tiene este medio de vida, inicio donde venda una variedad de golosinas y dulces ella es una mujer emprendedora pues tambin es una forma de ayudarle a su esposo a sufragar los gastos diarios del hogar. Empez con esfuerzo propio a pesar de que no tena muchos productos que ofrecer decide empezar con ciertos productos populares. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de polvos, cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, pintura de labios, pintura de uas entre otros.
texts.en: Yessenia Del Rosario is 23 years old. Her work is selling general merchandise. She has earned a living this way for more than 5 years. She began by selling a variety of sweets and snacks. She is an enterprising woman, and this is also a way of helping her husband cover the daily expenses of their household. She started with her own efforts, and in spite of the fact that she did not have many products to offer, she decided to start with certain popular items. The loan will be used to buy powders, creams, treatments, shampoo, lipstick, and nail polish, among other items.

loan.use: to buy powders, creams, treatments, shampoo, lipstick and nail polish, among other products.

loan.name: Vilma

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Vilma; La socia tiene 28 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 8, 3 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la elaboracin de artesana, la socia tiene un stand e el cual ofrece trabajos diversos como aretes, adornos, ceniceros, chalinas, tejidos, entre otros, en esta ocasin la socia est terminando de construir su vivienda y requiere el crdito para invertir en el estucado de su vivienda, ella desea poder estucar la fachada para que su casa luzca mejor. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales y el pago al obrero para hacer el estucado de su fachada en su vivienda. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the IMASUMAC II communal bank. This communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
Her name is Vilma, and she is 28 years old. She is married and has two children, aged 8 and 3. Her work is making handicrafts. She has a stand where she offers a variety of handicrafts including earrings, decorative objects, ashtrays, scarves and weavings, among other items. On this occasion, the borrower is finishing the construction of her home, and she needs the loan to invest in the stucco surfacing of her house. She wants to cover the facade with stucco so that her house will look better. The borrower is requesting the loan to invest in buying materials and paying for labor in order to put a stucco surface on her home.
The borrower is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on schedule.

loan.use: to invest in materials and labor to put a stucco surface on the outside of her home.

loan.name: Doris

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Doris; La socia tiene 28 aos de edad, la socia es soltera; La socia se dedica a la venta de jugos la socia tiene su stand en uno de los mercados en la ciudad, y la socia compra frutas para realizar los diferentes jugos diarios para los clientes que ella recibe, la socia en esta ocasin desea invertir el crdito en la compra de vasos, otra licuadora, coladores, servilleteros y otra mena jeria para implementar el negocio. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de mena jeria para implementar el negocio de venta de jugos. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Doris is a member of the "Imasumac II" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Doris is 28 years old and single. Her business is selling juice and she has a stand in one of the markets in the city. She buys fruit to make her different daily juices for her customers. On this occasion, she would like to invest her loan in buying cups, another blender, strainers, napkin holders and other utensils to equip her business. She is requesting this loan to invest in buying utensils to equip her juice business.
Doris is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loan.use: to invest in buying utensils to equip her juice business

loan.name: Piedras Blancas Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Piedras Blancas est conformado por las seoras Florinda y Mara Antelma van a comprar semilla, abono e insecticidas para cultivar elotes y maz, la seora Mara Nieves va a comprar papel higinico, jabn, huevo, queso, azcar, refrescos etc., la seora gloria va a comprar redes o chinchorros para la pesca, la seora Anglica va a comprar maz por bulto, la seora Leticia va a comprar pescado por kilo. La seora Mara Nieves tiene 43 aos de edad, ella es casada tiene 4 hijos, 3 estn estudiando, uno varn la secundaria e otro la universidad y su hija pequea la primaria, ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, solicito su prstamo para comprar canela molida, royal, guajillo, ajonjol, alpiste, carbonato, hojas para tamal, chiles pasilla, bultos de alimento para crianza de pollo y puerco, refrescoos, jabon, cloro, fabuloso, pino, papel higienico, ella inicio su negocio hace 25 aos es herencia de su suegro, su negocio es importante porque es un ingreso para la familia, a ella le gusta su negocio porque conoce a las personas y le gusta atender bien a sus clientes sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan a atender la tienda, las ganancias las utiliza para los gastos de la escuela de sus hijos, para el calzado, la comida y los uniformes de sus hijos, ella est planeando surtirse de mercanca por cajas y poner una zapatera. Sus sueos y esperanzas son poner su zapatera, remodelar la vivienda y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y que tengan un buen trabajo. Los integrantes del grupo agradecen a Kiva y a Fundacin Realidad su ayuda e inters para crecer nuestros negocios.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Piedras Blancas (White Stones).
Florinda and Mara Antelma are members who are going to buy seeds, fertilizer, and insecticides to cultivate corn.
Mara Nieves will buy toilet paper, soap, eggs, cheese, sugar, and soft drinks, etc.
Gloria will buy fishing nets.
Anglica is going to buy corn in bulk.
Leticia will buy fish by the kilo.
Mara Nieves is 43 years old and married. She has four children, and three of them go to school. One boy is in middle school, and the other attends the university. Her little daughter goes to elementary school. Mara Nieves has a grocery store. She requested her loan to buy ground cinnamon, baking powder, different types of chilies, sesame seeds, birdseed, carbonate, corn husks, bulk feed for raising chickens and pigs, soft drinks, soap, bleach, cleaning products, pine nuts, and toilet paper.
She started her business 25 years ago; it is an inheritance from her father-in-law. Her business is important because it is income for the family. She likes her business because she meets people, and she likes taking good care of her customers. Her children and her husband help her tend to the store.
She uses the income to pay for her childrens educational expenses, shoes, food, and her childrens uniforms. She is planning to stock her merchandise by purchasing by the case. She also plans to set up a shoe shop.
Her dreams and hopes are to set up a shoe shop, to remodel her house, and that her children finish their studies and get a good job.
The members of the group are grateful to Kiva and the Fundacin Realidad for their help and interest in making their businesses grow.
Janeth works as a domestic employee, and her husband is a carpenter who works with aluminum. She needs the loan for the cost of moving dirt and starting to build a room in her house. It is also to buy sand, bricks, and cement. She lives in her own house in the Las Lomas zone in the city of La Paz. Janeth is married and has four children.
This is the second time that she wishes to have a Kiva loan.

loan.use: to buy ground cinnamon, baking powder, different types of chilies, sesame seeds, birdseed, carbonate, corn husks, bulk feed for raising chickens and pigs.

loan.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito D. Huanchac en la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Maria; La socia tiene 55 aos D. edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 7 hijos D. los cuales an 5 D. ellos son estudiantes y ella los sigue apoyando con los estudios, la socia trabaja junto a sus esposo, la socia en un negocio familiar pero ella sigue trabajando en la regin como empleada pblica, la socia venD. joyas hechas por su esposo en la institucin en la que labora, la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra D. materiales para la elaboracin D. joyas, la socia comprara alambres, piedras, mostacillas, ganchitos, pies y todo ello para la elaboracin D. joyas como aretes, collares, pulseras entre otros. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra D. materiales para la elaboracin D. joyas. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas D. acuerdo al cronograma D. pagos.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the "Imasumac II" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.
Maria is 55 years old, married, and has seven children. Five of her children are still in school and she continues supporting them in their education. Maria works together with her husband in a family business but she also continues working as a civil servant. Maria sells jewelry maD. by her husband in the institution in which she works. She would like to invest her loan in buying materials for making jewelry. She will buy wire, stones, beads, hooks and other items she needs for making pieces of jewelry such as earrings, necklaces, bracelets, etc.
Maria is grateful for her loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loan.use: to invest in buying materials for making jewelry

loan.name: Domingo

texts.es: EL SR. DOMINGO E, TIENE 45 AOS DE EDAD, ES SOLTERO, APOYA A SUS PADRES QUE VIVEN CON EL, VIVEN EN LA COMUNIDAD DE TIN TIN DEL MUNICIPIO DE MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO DE COCHABAMBA. TRABAJA EN LA AGRICULTURA, PRODUCE PAPA, MANI Y FREJOL Y LOS VENDE EN EL MISMO LUGAR. DOMINGO ES UNA PERSONA RESPONZABLE EN SU COMUNIDAD, POR LA DEDICACION A SU TRABAJO Y POR LA ATENCION A SUS QUERIDOS PADRES QUE VIVEN CON EL Y ESTAN YA MUY VIEJITOS. EL CREDITO QUE HA SOLICITADO LOS VA INVERTIR EN LA COMPRA DE MAS SEMILLAS E INSUMOS, AUMENTAR MAS SUPERFICIES DE CULTIVO E INCREMENTAR SU PRODUCCION Y DE ESTA FORMATENER MAS INGRESOS Y MEJORAR LA CONDICION DE VIDA DE EL Y LA DE SUS PADRES.
texts.en:
Sr. Domingo is 45 years old and single. He supports his parents who live with him. They live in Tin Tin, in the municipality of Mizque in the department of Cochabamba.
He is a farmer and produces potatoes, peanuts and beans which he sells in the locality. Domingo is a responsible member of the community due to his dedication to work and for the care he gives his beloved parents who live with him and are very old.
He will invest the loan he has asked for to purchase seed and supplies to increase the area of cultivated land and increase his production and, in this way, increase his income and improve his and his parents living conditions.

loan.use: to buy seed and supplies.

loan.name: Cecilia

texts.es: La seora Cecilia es madre soltera, con una instruccin de nivel primaria, tiene un hijo de 5 aos de edad dependiente, viven con su hermana, casa propia en Colomi calle Barrientos entre Aroma ms de 4 aos. La seora costura ropa deportiva (chamarras, buzos, poleras y schords) en el mismo domicilio entrega a las unidades educativas como tambin a los mercados de Colomi y de la ciudad de Cochabamba a la vez cuenta con una actividad curtido de cuero (curtimbre), lo cual ella vino a solicitar un crdito para comprar una maquina recta para corte de cuero as mejorar y sacar producto terminado (derivados de cuero).
texts.en:
Seora Cecilia is a single mother with a primary level education. She has one dependent, a son 5 years of age. They have lived with her sister who owns her own house in Colomi, Aroma for more than 4 years.
Seora Cecilia sews sportswear (jackets, sweatshirts, t-shirts and schords) in the same house. She sells the items to educaional institutions and at the Colomi and Cochabamba markets. She also has a tanning business (tannery) which is why she came to ask for a loan as she wants to buy a machine for cutting leather straight and so enhance and make a finished product (leather products).

loan.use: to buy a machine for cutting leather straight.

loan.name: Katy Sanny

texts.es:
Katy Sanny naci en la ciudad del Cusco, tiene 32 aos de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la misma ciudad donde naci, ella trabaja en una de las municipalidad de la ciudad del cusco en el rea administrativa. Ya son varios aos que trabaja y le va muy bien, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para uso personal especficamente para la educacin, alimentacin, vestimenta de sus hijos.
Katy Sanny pertenece al banco comunal Unin, Fuerza y Amistad de la Asociacin Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Katy Sanny was born and lives in the city of Cusco. She is 32 years old and has 2 children. She works in one of the municipalities of Cusco in administration. She has been working for several years and she is doing very well. This time she needs a loan for personal use; specifically for education, food and clothing for her children.
Katy Sanny belongs to the commmunal bank Unin, Fuerza y Amistad which belongs to the Asociacin Arariwa. She is grateful for the opportunity afforded her by the bank and agrees to comply with the repayment schedule.

loan.use: to pay for education, food and clothing for her children.

loan.name: Bill

texts.es: Bill tiene 29 aos, es un joven emprendedor y muy entusiasta, es soltero no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus padres, junto a sus tres hermanos menores. El trabajo que realiza Bill es la elaboracin de pan de la mejor calidad, para lo cual cuenta con un espacio en la casa de sus padres, donde tiene los implementos necesarios como un horno moderno rotativo, amasadora y dems utensilios. Ya lleva en esta actividad 2 aos, tiempo con el cual ha logrado hacerse de una clientela fiel por el buen sabor de sus panes, adems cuenta con el apoyo de un maestro panadero y dos ayudantes para la elaboracin de la masa. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es la idea de poder realizarse como un empresario emprendedor, dar trabajo a otras personas y as ayuda con el desarrollo de su localidad, comenta que tiene otras ideas de negocio como abrir una heladera, pues el clima de la regin es favorable. Este sera su primer crdito con MFP, se siente contento con el apoyo y los nimos que viene recibiendo por parte de los miembros de su grupo comunal, y se compromete en ser puntual con sus pagos para as poder acceder a nuevos crditos de mayor cantidad. Con el dinero que solicita, comprar insumos para la panificacin como: harina por saco, mantequilla, azcar, as podr disminuir costos y mejorar sus mrgenes de ganancias.
texts.en: Bill is 29 years old. He is a very enthusiastic young entrepreneur. He is single with no children, and he lives in his parents' house together with his three younger siblings. Bill's work is preparing bread of the best quality. To do this, he has a space in his parents' house where he maintains the necessary equipment, such as a modern convection oven, a kneading machine and other tools. He has done this work for 2 years, and during this time he has been able to build up a loyal customer base, thanks to the good taste of his bread. He also has the support of a master baker as well as two assistants to prepare the dough. What he likes about his work is the idea of being able to achieve his dreams as a hard-working entrepreneur, provide jobs for other people, and thus help with the development of his town. He comments that he has other business ideas such as opening an ice cream shop, since the climate of the area is favorable for this. This will be his first loan with MFP, and he is happy with the support and the inspiration he has been receiving from the other members of his communal bank. He is committed to being punctual with his payments, so he can have access to new loans of greater quantity. With the funds he is requesting, he will buy supplies for breadmaking such as flour by the sack, butter, and sugar, so that he can reduce his costs and improve his profit margins.

loan.use: to buy flour by the sack, butter and sugar.

loan.name: Eliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Eliana; La socia tiene 40 aos de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 21, 19, 7 aos de edad, la socia se dedica a la preparacin del tradicional plato peruano el ceviche, la socia elabora el ceviche a base de pescado, ella mezcla diversos ingredientes como cebollas, limn, ajo, canchitas, camote, rocoto y otros ingredientes, la socia tiene su stand y ya es muy conocida en el centro comercial en el cual ella trabaja, la socia en esta oportunidad desea invertir el crdito en la compra de ingredientes como arroz para acompaar el palto con arroz chaufa y ceviche, la socia comprara dos sacos de arroz, pescado, sal al por mayor y otros productos menores que le dejan sus caseros en dos partes. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de arroz dos sacos grandes, sal un saco y el pago del pescado que le traen a la socia en avioneta.
La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the IMASUMAC II communal bank. This communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.
Her name is Eliana, and she is 40 years old. She is single and has 3 children, aged 21, 19, and 7. Her work is preparing the traditional Peruvian dish ceviche. She prepares her ceviche using fish, and she mixes in various ingredients such as onions, lime, garlic, canchitas [corn kernels], sweet potato, rocoto peppers, and other ingredients. She has her own stand, and she is very well-known in the shopping center where she works. On this occasion, the borrower wants to invest in buying ingredients such as rice to prepare plates of avocado with fried rice and ceviche. She will buy two sacks of rice, fish, and salt on a wholesale basis, and she will also buy some retail products that her suppliers will give her in two parts. The borrower is requesting the loan to invest in buying two large sacks of rice, one sack of salt, and paying for the fish which is brought in to her by small airplane.
The borrower is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on schedule.

loan.use: to invest in buying two large sacks of rice, one sack of salt, and fish flown in by small plane, among other supplies.

loan.name: Yenny

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco comunal IMASUMAC II; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Yenny; La socia tiene 30 aos de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 13, 8, 8 meses de edad, la socia se dedica a la atencin de sus tienda de abarrotes, la socia tiene su negocio en su misma vivienda y ella puede alternar los trabajos del hogar con la administracin de su tienda de abarrotes ella acomodo todo su comedor y cocina para dar paso a su negocio propio, la socia en esta ocasin requiere el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, al por mayor, azcar, harinas, sal, fideos, aceite, leche por cajas, y otros productos, para implementar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad. La socia agradece el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Yenny belongs to the Imasumac II communal bank. The bank is in the Huanchac district of the Cusco province and department. Yenny, age 30, is married and has three children. The children are 13, 8, and 8 months.
Yenny manages her grocery store. She has her business in her house. She is able to alternate her household chores with managing her grocery store. She has arranged all of her dining room and kitchen to make space for her own business.
Yenny now needs a loan to buy basic needs items wholesale like rice, sugar, flour, salt, noodles, oil, cases of milk, and other products for her grocery store. She is requesting the loan to buy basic needs items.
She is grateful for the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to buy basic needs products.

loan.name: Leonor

texts.es: La seora Leonor es una mujer que ha estado firme a pesar de la situacin que paso hace unos aos cuando falleci su esposo por lo que tuvo que salir adelante para poder sostener sus gastos. Desde que su esposo ya no esta con ella no hubo quien le diera mantenimiento a su hogar, puesto que las paredes y techo de su casa comenzaron a cuartearse cada da mas y por consecuencia se trasmina el agua en temporada de lluvia. Para arreglar las paredes y techo que estn en muy malas condiciones necesita comprar cemento, yeso, pintura y pagar mano de obra, de esta manera podr vivir tranquilamente ya que este problema puede hacer que su casa se destruya.
texts.en: Sra. Leonora is a woman who tackles her problems straight on. When her husband died a few years ago, she found a way to support herself. Without him around to take care of the house, though, cracks opened up in the wall and ceiling, growing little by little until the rain poured through. Sra. Leonora wants to borrow money now to pay for cement, plaster, paint and workmen to fix the problem. She wants to be confident that the problem doesn't end with her house falling down.

loan.use: to pay for cement, sand and labor.

loan.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. Maria has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy more canned goods, snacks and beverages. Maria has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Maria hopes to improve her business.

loan.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loan.name: Manuel

texts.es: El seor Manuel estudio hace aos para Maestro de educacin primaria en cual duro mas de 30 aos ofreciendo su servicio a impartir clases a alumnos de 1 ao hasta 6 aos, hace poco por su larga trayectoria lo pensionaron. La casa donde actualmente vive actualmente la compro con ahorros y que poco a poco le ha estado realizando variedad de mejoras para que viva cmodamente su familia. En este momento quiere el prstamo para colocar vitromuro en las paredes del bao para darle un aspecto higinico y bonito. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar vitromuro, pegamento y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en: Manuel holds a Master's degree in primary education and worked as a teacher, giving classes to students from 1 to 6 years old, for over 30 years. After a long career, he recently retired. He bought his current house with his savings and has been improving it little by little in order to make it more comfortable for his family. He would like a loan in order to tile the walls of the bathroom, to make it look more hygienic and attractive. For this project he needs to buy tile, grout and pay for the labor.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to fix his bathroom.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Porfirio naci en la ciudad de Cusco (Per), tiene 51 aos de edad y es casado fruto de esta unin tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, Porfirio vive en la misma ciudad donde naci. Porfirio trabaja en construccin civil y tiene un negocio familiar que consiste en venta de productos de primera necesidad. Ya son dos aos que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Porfirio requiere el prstamo para compra mercadera como por ejemplo arroz, azcar y muchas cosas ms.
El socio es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compaeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal la Chaska awi de la Asociacin Arariwa.
texts.en:
